0.title: What to do? Tofu!
0.description: With a few fridge basics and some simple prep, you're minutes away from tasty, meal-building blocks of savory tofu. Make a double batch and you'll have protein on hand for quick lunches all week long!

ingredients.0: 1 16 oz. package your favorite TJ's Tofu
ingredients.1: 1/3 cup TJ's Coconut Aminos or Soy Sauce

steps.0: Drain tofu and slice lengthwise into thirds. Press between 2 paper towels to soak up excess moisture. Cut the tofu slabs into 1-inch cubes.
steps.1: Place tofu in a shallow dish and coat with coconut aminos. Marinate for at least 15 minutes, turning the cubes periodically.
steps.2: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Arrange marinated tofu cubes in a single layer on baking sheet.  Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake 30 minutes, flipping tofu halfway through cooking. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.
steps.3: Add to salads, curries, soups, or anywhere you'd like the taste of tofu!

1.title: Fridge-Foraged Fried Rice
1.description: In search of a dinner adventure? Avoiding a trip to the store to restock? In either case, fridge foraging is the answer. This recipe gives you the basic building blocks for a fantastic fried rice, with plenty of leeway for ingredient substitutions. How much leeway? We tested a version using ketchup & balsamic glaze in place of tangy marinade-and it worked just fine!

ingredients.0: 1 tablespoon TJ's Soy Sauce
ingredients.1: 1 tablespoon TJ's Soyaki Sauce, Stir Fry Sauce, or other tangy marinade you might have sitting in your fridge
ingredients.2: 1 tsp TJ's Garlic Powder, if you've got it
ingredients.3: 1/4 cup TJ's neutral oil (Sunflower, Canola, Grapeseed, etc. will all work here)
ingredients.4: 1 generous cup any TJ's Vegetables you might have on hand (green/red/yellow onion, bell peppers, carrots, mushrooms, frozen peas/corn/edamame/broccoli), thawed if frozen, and chopped
ingredients.5: 3 or 4 cups cooked, day-old TJ's Rice

parsed_ing.4: Vegetables you might have on hand

steps.0: In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, marinade and garlic powder, set aside.
steps.1: Heat oil in large skillet or wok on medium heat. Fry chopped veggies in oil just until tender. Add rice to skillet, breaking up any clumps, and fry a few minutes more. Add eggs and stir until fully cooked. Add soy sauce mixture and stir to coat.
steps.2: Spoon fried rice into bowls and serve as-is, or top with avocado, sriracha sauce, crumbled bacon pieces, chopped scallions...

2.title: Pantry Pasta
2.description: Think you don't have enough ingredients on-hand for a delicious, make-it-in-minutes meal? Think again. If you've got pasta, a can of fish, garlic, olive oil & some spices-then you've got pantry pasta! We used farfalle & tuna in ours, but virtually any version of each ingredient will do. Improvise, improvise, improvise!

ingredients.0: 1 pound package TJ's Pasta
ingredients.3: 1 can of your favorite TJ's Fish, drained
ingredients.7: Grated Parmesan Cheese & Lemon wedges, for serving (optional)

steps.0: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain & toss with a splash of olive oil.
steps.1: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in empty pasta pot over medium heat. Add garlic, fish, and seasonings, and saute for a few minutes to form a savory paste.
steps.2: Turn off heat and add pasta back to pot. Toss to coat with fish mixture.
steps.3: Transfer pasta to serving bowls. Garnish with cheese and a squeeze of lemon and serve.

3.title: Double Elote Crispy Chicken Tenders
3.description: After all, the only thing better than elote is... Double Elote! So here you have it, folks - juicy, baked organic chicken tenders with an irresistibly crunchy, outrageously ranch-y, double elote crust. ¡Disfruta!

ingredients.0: 1 bag Organic Elote Corn Chip Dippers
ingredients.1: 1/4 cup TJ's Unbleached Enriched All-Purpose Flour
ingredients.2: 1/4 cup TJ's Everything But The Elote Seasoning Blend
ingredients.4: 2 package TJ's Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Tenders
ingredients.6: TJ's Organic Sriracha Ranch Dressing (for dipping)
ingredients.7: The zest of 1 TJ's Lime (optional dipping garnish)

parsed_ing.2: Everything But The Elote Seasoning Blend

corrected_ing.2: Everything But The Elote Seasoning Blend

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Coat baking sheet with cooking spray. Set aside.
steps.1: In a food processor, crush corn dippers and place in a shallow bowl. Set aside. In a second shallow bowl, add flour and elote seasoning and whisk together until evenly mixed. Set aside. In a third shallow bowl, whisk the eggs together. Set aside.
steps.2: Remove chicken from packaging. One by one, dredge each tender in flour mixture making sure chicken is thoroughly covered. Then dredge in eggs, allowing excess egg to drain. Then dredge in crushed corn dippers, lightly pressing so that chips adhere.
steps.3: Arrange chicken on baking sheet, making sure to leave some space between pieces.
steps.4: Place on center rack in oven and bake for 10 minutes. Use tongs to flip chicken tenders and bake for 5-8 more minutes, until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F and exterior is a light golden brown.
steps.5: Remove from oven and transfer tenders to a wire rack to cool slightly before serving.
steps.6: Serve with a side of Sriracha Ranch topped with lime zest.

4.title: Chimichurri Soup
4.description: We love a fancy culinary endeavor just as much as the next Joe, but when faced with all-too-brief lunch breaks and super-long days, we opt out of "fancy" in favor of "easy," every single time. But an easy meal doesn't have to equal a boring meal - this ready-in-ten, four-ingredient Trader Joe's Demo Station classic is proof positive. Soup's on...

ingredients.0: 2 packages TJ's Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Frozen Peruvian Style Chimichurri Rice

parsed_ing.0: Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup

corrected_ing.0: Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup

steps.0: In a large pot combine soup, rice, and corn.
steps.1: Stirring periodically, heat on low for about 10 min or until heated through.
steps.2: Serve warm, topped with cheese if desired. Enjoy!

5.title: Miso Shrimp & Veggie Stir-Fry
5.description: Trader Joe's Miso Vegetable & Brown Rice Saute Kit already comes with everything you need to make the kind of stir-fry you won't soon forget. But add shrimp to the mix, and, well... we can hear it now: "Oh, Shrimp & Veggie Stir-Fry, you make Miso happy..."

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Frozen Cooked Medium Shrimp
ingredients.2: 1 bag TJ's Miso Vegetable & Brown Rice Saute Kit

parsed_ing.2: Miso Vegetable & Brown Rice Saute Kit

corrected_ing.2: Miso Vegetable & Brown Rice Saute Kit

steps.0: Thaw shrimp according to package instructions. Set aside.
steps.1: Heat oil in saucepan over medium-high heat. Add all vegetables from bag and saute for 3 to 4 minutes, stirring frequently.
steps.2: Remove rice from packaging. Using your hands, break up/crumble rice into pan and mix with vegetables. Add shrimp right away, and saute for an additional 1 to 2 minutes, or until shrimp is heated through.
steps.3: Lower heat, add sauce, and stir until vegetables, shrimp, and rice are fully coated.
steps.4: Allow to cool slightly. Serve warm and enjoy!

6.title: Tempeh Crispy Noodle Salad
6.description: One of our favorite aspects of Thai cuisine is the meticulous-dare-we-say symphonic-balance of flavors. In a great Thai dish, sweet, sour, spicy, salty, and umami all come together for one truly fantastic feast for the senses. And it's precisely this elegant interplay of flavors that inspired our latest D.I.Y. salad kit, which we like to dress up with some marinated, steamed & pan-fried Trader Joe's Tempeh.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic 3 Grain Tempeh
ingredients.3: 1 package TJ's Peanut and Crispy Noodle Salad Kit

parsed_ing.3: Peanut and Crispy Noodle Salad Kit

corrected_ing.3: Peanut and Crispy Noodle Salad Kit

steps.0: Fill a pot with a few inches of water and bring to a boil. Place a steamer basket in pot. Place tempeh in steamer basket. Steam for 15 minutes.
steps.1: Remove from pot from heat. Remove tempeh from basket. Allow to cool slightly.
steps.2: Dice tempeh into small, bite-sized cubes.
steps.3: Combine tempeh cubes & coconut aminos in a small bowl. Toss to thoroughly coat tempeh in coconut aminos. Cover and let marinate for 10 minutes. Uncover and drain excess aminos.
steps.4: Heat small amount of oil in a medium-sized pan. Pan-fry tempeh for 3 - 5 minutes, stirring continuously until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
steps.5: In a large bowl, toss salad with dressing and toppings. Add tempeh and mix together.
steps.6: Divide among plates or bowls and enjoy!

7.title: Pulled Jackfruit Sandwich
7.description: How does one use Trader Joe's Green Jackfruit in Brine, you ask? It takes on a "meaty" texture, and, much like tofu, absorbs the flavors of sauces. Our favorite preparation involves cooking jackfruit in barbecue sauce, where it eventually shreds like pulled pork, ready to be piled on a warm Honey Wheat Hamburger Bun and crowned with crunchy cabbage.

ingredients.0: 2 cans TJ's Green Jackfruit in Brine
ingredients.1: 1 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce
ingredients.4: 1 package TJ's Honey Wheat Hamburger Buns
ingredients.5: 1 TJ's Yellow Onion, diced, for garnish
ingredients.6: 1 bag TJ's Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots
ingredients.7: 1/4 cup TJ's Mayonnaise (or TJ's Greek Yogurt)

parsed_ing.1: Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce
parsed_ing.6: Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots

steps.0: Prepare Pulled Jackfruit: Drain jackfruit and pat dry. Partially shred jackfruit chunks into smaller pieces. In a saute pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add jackfruit and saute for five minutes. Add BBQ sauce and water to pan and stir to evenly coat jackfruit. Cover pan and simmer on medium-low heat, 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally and pulling jackfruit apart as it becomes tender.
steps.1: Prepare Tangy Cole Slaw: While jackfruit cooks, in a large bowl, toss cabbage blend with mayonnaise and apple cider vinegar to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste and set aside.
steps.2: Prepare Sandwiches: Place a scoop of pulled jackfruit on the bottom of a bun. Top with diced onions, coleslaw, and bun top. Eat and repeat until satisfied!

8.title: Roasted Squash Salad
8.description: Our cold-pressed, unfiltered California Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil functions beautifully for all of your general cooking needs, but we like it best drizzled over simple salads like this one-where the oil's verdant notes of fresh-cut grass & tropical fruits can really "sing" alongside ingredients like peppery arugula, tangy goat cheese, & warm, sweet squash...

ingredients.0: TJ's Pumpkin Pie Pumpkin (seasonal) or your favorite TJ's squash
ingredients.4: 1 whole TJ's Chevre Goat Cheese Log (5 oz.)
ingredients.5: 1/3 cup TJ's Raw Pumpkin Seeds, dry toasted
ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons TJ's California Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.7: TJ's Canola Oil Spray (to grease sheet pan)

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a sheet pan with parchment paper and spray lightly with canola oil spray.
steps.1: Using a sharp knife, remove top of pumpkin and cut pumpkin in half lengthwise. Then use a sharp spoon or ice cream scoop to scrape out all of the seeds and strings.
steps.2: Brush the pumpkin flesh with melted butter and cover in brown sugar.
steps.3: Place pumpkin flesh-side down on the lined baking pan and pierce a few times with a fork.
steps.4: Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a fork easily pierces the skin. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.
steps.5: Using your ice cream scoop or spoon, scoop pumpkin flesh from the skin and place it into a bowl. Lightly mash.
steps.6: Place arugula in a medium bowl and place cooked pumpkin on top. Add cheese (hand-tear the log into smaller pieces as desired, add pumpkin seeds, and drizzle with olive oil. Enjoy immediately.

9.title: Citrus Garlic Chicken Tacos
9.description: Trader Joe's Cuban Style Citrus Garlic Bowl is packed with marinated chicken thigh meat served over turmeric-seasoned rice, black beans, chopped plantains, peppers, and onions, tossed in a bright, citrus & garlic, mojo criollo sauce. Outside of the bowl, it just so happens to make a zesty and flavorful base for chicken tacos with a Cuban twist - perfect when you're running low on time and want a quick meal!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Cuban Style Citrus Garlic Bowl

steps.0: Remove outer packaging of Cuban Style Citrus Garlic Bowl and pierce film. Microwave on high 4 to 5 minutes or until heated through. Stir and set aside.
steps.1: Fill tortillas with warmed Cuban Style Citrus Garlic Bowl. Garnish with salsa, sliced jalapenos, and cilantro.
steps.2: Enjoy!

10.title: Harvest Grain Sweet Potatoes
10.description: Greens don't need be the foundation of a salad.  Nutty, ancient grains give flavor, subtle crunch, and a slightly chewy texture to complement squash, cranberries and pecans. Makes a great potato topper!

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Murasaki Sweet Potatoes
ingredients.2: TJ's Organic Crumbled Feta or TJ's Crumbled Goat Cheese (garnish)

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F.
steps.1: Prick sweet potatoes all over with a fork and place on a lined baking sheet.
steps.2: Bake for 45- 50 minutes or until tender and a fork can be easily inserted in the thickest part of the potato.
steps.3: Let cool slightly, cut potatoes partially open (length-wise) with a knife. Loosely "stuff" and top with salad. Sprinkle with cheese crumbles (optional) and serve immediately. Enjoy!

11.title: Thai-Style Peanut Pumpkin Soup
11.description: Salad dressing - yep. Dipping Sauce - of course. Soup - uh...? Believe it or not, Trader Joe's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette is the star ingredient in this delicious soup, lending an ordinary soup a truly unique burst Thai-style flavor. Mixed with organic pumpkin & organic coconut cream, this recipe makes a wonderful quick, comforting lunch or dinner. Add noodles or stir-fried veggies for extra heartiness.

ingredients.0: 2 cans TJ's Organic Coconut Cream
ingredients.4: TJ's Thai Lime and Chili Cashews, crushed, for garnish (optional)

steps.0: Pour the coconut cream in a large pot and heat over medium heat, whisking frequently, for 5 minutes or until smooth.
steps.1: Add the pumpkin and vinaigrette and bring to a simmer. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Garnish with fresh basil and cashews and serve.
steps.2: Recipe Credit: Our excellent Crew Members at store #136 in Vancouver, WA!

12.title: Beef-less Tacos
12.description: If you're looking for protein alternatives, look no further than Trader Joe's Beef-less Ground Beef. It has a hearty meat-like consistency, it's pre-cooked for convenience, and it's incredibly versatile.  An absolute hit simmered with diced mushrooms and our Spicy Taco Sauce - check out the recipe below for a delicious meatless taco or burrito filling, with just the right amount of heat.

ingredients.0: 1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons TJ's Organic Spicy Taco Sauce
ingredients.5: 1/2 head of TJ's Iceberg Lettuce, shredded

steps.0: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add diced mushrooms to skillet and let cook undisturbed for 5 minutes, until most of the moisture has evaporated. Add beef-less beef and taco sauce to skillet and saute another 5-7 minutes, until heated through.
steps.1: To serve, scoop filling into a warm tortilla and top with lettuce, tomato and cheese. Fold as you like and serve with more taco sauce for drizzling.

13.title: Bacon, Apple, and Butternut Squash Salad
13.description: In honor of squash season, Trader Joe's Leafy Greens Salad Kit presents bright orange Butternut as its centerpiece. As for the Leafy Greens part, that's a base of baby spinach, peppery arugula, Lolla Rosa, radicchio, and light-green frisee. Spiral-cut Squash is the real star of the show, though, strutting its pop of bright-orange color, and sporting that characteristic sweet, nutty flavor. We've dressed up this Salad Kit by adding uncured bacon and crunchy, sliced apples for a refreshingly filling lunch.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJs Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, microwaved according to package instructions
ingredients.1: 2 bag TJs Leafy Greens with Butternut Squash Salad Kit (seasonal)
ingredients.2: 2 of your favorite TJs Apples, sliced

parsed_ing.0: TJs Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, microwaved according to package instructions
parsed_ing.1: TJs Leafy Greens with Butternut Squash Salad Kit

steps.0: Cut bacon into small pieces, set aside.
steps.1: In a serving bowl, toss salad with dressing, included toppings, apple, and bacon pieces. Divide among plates of bowls and enjoy!

14.title: Shrimp Burger Salad
14.description: Trader Joe's Shrimp Seafood Burgers are made of 70% farm-raised, Pacific White Shrimp and 23% wild-caught Pollock, held together with rice flour and sunflower oil. They are seasoned with garlic powder, dried basil, salt, and black pepper, which makes for juicy and delicious Seafood Burgers-whether you grill, bake, or pan fry them. In this recipe we've ditched the bun and used these Burgers to make a quick and refreshing salad, perfect for a protein packed lunch.

ingredients.0: TJ's Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 2 - 4 tablespoons TJs Carrot Ginger Miso Salad Dressing

parsed_ing.3: 4 tablespoons TJs Carrot Ginger Miso Salad Dressing

steps.0: Preheat a skillet to medium heat and add a little oil. Cook burgers for 4 to 5 minutes per side, until the shrimp turn opaque and reach an internal temperature of 145°F. Let cool slightly and set aside.
steps.1: Divide spring mix among plates. Top each salad with a burger, sliced radish, and a drizzle of dressing. Enjoy immediately.

15.title: Sloppy Joe Sliders
15.description: Trader Joe's Turkey Bolognese Sauce is a concoction of tomato, ground turkey, onions, carrots, celery, butter, garlic & spices. It makes a protein-packed topping for a quick pasta dish but can also be utilized as a flavorful filling in this classic camp recipe for Sloppy Joe Sliders.

ingredients.0: TJ's Olive Oil

steps.0: Add a small amount of oil to a large saucepan, saute diced green pepper over medium heat, stirring occasionally until softened about 5 minutes.
steps.1: Remove each Bolognese tray from its carton and microwave separately. Cut open end of film to vent. Microwave on defrost for 3 minutes. Take out of the microwave and partially remove from film and stir gently. Put back in the microwave and continue to microwave on high setting for 2 - 3 minutes or until sauce is fully cooked to a temperature of 165°F.
steps.2: Mix Bolognese, ketchup and bell pepper together with a spatula in the large saucepan.
steps.3: Cut aloha rolls in half, spoon mixture onto rolls to make a sandwich and enjoy.

16.title: Crispy Tofu Sesame Salad
16.description: A bright combo of veggies makes up the crisp and flavorful base of Trader Joe's Sesame Crunch Chopped Salad Kit, including: Savoy and Red cabbages, and sweet carrots, with a special appearance by Chinese cabbage, aka Bok Choy. Further contributing to the Crunch of this Kit are some important components: Cashews add a nutty, buttery crunch, Nori flakes (seaweed) contribute their thin crispness and salty, ocean-y flavor, and of course, there's some of this Salad's namesake component: crunchy, sesame-spiked sticks.Dressed with the included toasted sesame ginger vinaigrette, this Kit packs loads of flavor and is an absolute cinch to prepare. Round it out with some crispy, stir-fried tofu and sweet mandarins, and you've got a light yet filling meal option for lunch or dinner.

ingredients.0: 2 tablespoons TJ's Grapeseed Oil or Sunflower Oil
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Organic High Protein Super Firm Tofu, torn into chunks
ingredients.3: 1 TJ's Sesame Crunch Chopped Salad Kit
ingredients.4: 1 can TJ's Mandarin Oranges in Light Syrup, drained

parsed_ing.1: Organic High Protein Super Firm Tofu

steps.0: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high until sizzling. Carefully add tofu to pan (use tongs or a slotted spoon to avoid oil spatter) and stir fry for 7-10 minutes, until golden brown. Transfer tofu to a paper-towel lined plate and season with salt & pepper, set aside.
steps.1: In a serving bowl, toss salad with included dressing and toppings. Add tofu and mandarins and gently toss to combine. Enjoy immediately.

17.title: BABP (Bacon, Apple & Brie Panini)
17.description: Cutting back on sugar and salt shouldn't mean you miss out on bacon's savory splendor, which is why we've developed Trader Joe's No Sugar Dry Rubbed Uncured Bacon. Our supplier starts with pork that was raised crate free, completely vegetarian fed, and strictly without the use of antibiotics or hormones, then covers it in a dry rub composed of sea salt and spices like fenugreek, white pepper, and allspice - and, notably, no sugar.Once the dry rub has had time to set in, the bacon is then slow smoked over a blend of smoldering natural hardwood for seven to eight hours, so all you have to do is crisp it in a pan or bake it in the oven to unlock its savory, smoky goodness. Whether you enjoy this No Sugar Dry Rubbed Uncured Bacon with eggs for breakfast, on a panini for lunch, or crumbled atop a salad at dinnertime is entirely up to you.

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Ciabatta Rolls, sliced, OR 8 slices of your favorite TJ's Bread
ingredients.3: TJ's Triple Cream Brie OR Fromage Pave, thinly sliced
ingredients.5: TJ's No Sugar Dry Rubbed Uncured Bacon, cooked according to package directions

parsed_ing.5: No Sugar Dry Rubbed Uncured Bacon

steps.0: Heat grill pan or Panini press to medium-high. Butter one side of each slice of bread or the outsides of two panini roll pieces. If including, spread mustard on the unbuttered side of one slice of bread or roll.
steps.1: Place brie slices in a single layer on the un-buttered side of both pieces of bread or roll. Place thinly sliced apple on one piece of bread atop brie. Top with as much bacon as you deem necessary. Put the two sides of the roll together and place into a panini press or in a grill pan and press down. Grill until lightly browned on both sides. Serve at once.

18.title: Caprese BLT
18.description: Beautiful, lip-smacking, tantalizing. Brilliant, luscious, toothsome. Bacon, lettuce, tomato! However you translate the acronym, this recipe mash-up of a favorite summer salad and a lunchtime diner classic is equal parts refreshing and filling, thanks to aromatic basil, tangy balsamic glaze, and savory, crunchy bacon. Cool, creamy Trader Joe's Pre-Sliced Mozzarella Log gets a starring role in the center of the sandwich, proving once and for all that a caprese doesn't have to be limited to a salad plate.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Dry Rubbed Bacon OR TJ's Uncured Fully Cooked Bacon
ingredients.1: TJ's Gluten Free Whole Grain Bread
ingredients.2: TJ's Fresh Pre-Sliced Mozzarella Cheese Log
ingredients.4: TJ's Fresh Basil, rinsed and dried

steps.0: If using fully cooked bacon, microwave bacon according to package directions, and skip down to toasting bread.
steps.1: If using dry rubbed bacon, preheat oven to 400°F. Place a wire rack on a large rimmed baking sheet. Arrange bacon evenly on wire rack. Place sheet on center rack of oven and bake 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Tear bacon pieces in half, set aside.
steps.2: Toast 8 slices of bread to desired doneness. Layer basil and baby lettuce on toasted bread, followed by bacon, mozzarella, and tomato. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and top with another piece of toasted bread. Repeat steps to build 3 more sandwiches. Enjoy immediately!

19.title: Carnitas Bowl
19.description: With a recipe that's more than 50% jalapenos, Trader Joe's Jalapeno Sauce is hot without being overwhelmingly spicy, and smooth and creamy without any dairy (in fact, it's vegan!). Drizzle it over eggs for breakfast. Employ it as a replacement for traditional enchilada sauce in an enchilada bake at dinnertime. Or, use it to add some verve to your favorite grilled protein or veggie bowl.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Fully Cooked Traditional Carnitas
ingredients.1: 2 bags TJ's Frozen Organic Jasmine Rice
ingredients.2: 1 can TJ's Organic Black Beans, rinsed and drained
ingredients.6: TJ's Fresh Cilantro, sliced Jalapeno, and sliced Lime, for garnish (optional)

steps.0: Microwave carnitas according to package directions. Shred with forks, set aside.
steps.1: Microwave rice according to package directions. Divide among four serving bowls. Top bowls with carnitas, black beans, pico de gallo, and guacamole.  Drizzle generously with jalapeno sauce. Garnish with fresh cilantro, sliced jalapeno, and a squeeze of lime, if using. Enjoy!

20.title: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
20.description: For a picnic-perfect spread, start with crispy Trader Joe's Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts and cool, spicy slaw on a toasted bagel. Garnish with sriracha mayo and spicy pickle chips, and wash it down with an ice-cold glass of Trader Joe's French Market Sparkling Pink Lemonade. And don't forget the lawn games!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Plain Bagels, sliced in half
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots
ingredients.5: TJ's Organic Kosher Hot & Spicy Dill Pickle Chips

parsed_ing.2: Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots
parsed_ing.5: Organic Kosher Hot & Spicy Dill Pickle Chips

corrected_ing.2: Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots
corrected_ing.5: Organic Kosher Hot & Spicy Dill Pickle Chips

steps.0: Position oven racks in upper and lower thirds of oven. Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange chicken tenderloin breasts on a large baking sheet. Place baking sheet on upper rack of oven and bake 10 minutes.
steps.1: Arrange bagel halves, cut side down, in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Move the baking sheet of chicken to lower rack of oven. Place baking sheet of bagels on top rack. Bake another 15-20 minutes, until bagels are toasted and internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove chicken and bagels from oven.
steps.2: While chicken and bagels bake, add 2 tablespoons each of mayonnaise and sriracha to a small bowl. Mix and set aside.
steps.3: Add remaining mayonnaise and sriracha to a medium bowl. Add cabbage & carrots to bowl and toss to combine. Set aside.
steps.4: To assemble sandwiches, slather prepared sriracha mayo mixture on both bagel halves. Place a generous handful of slaw on bottom half of bagel, followed by two chicken tenderloin breasts and a few pickle chips. Top with other bagel half. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.

21.title: Double-Dressed Arugula & Burrata Salad
21.description: For fans of the stuff, seeing Burrata on a restaurant menu is known to elicit shrieks of excitement and anticipation. With its fresh aroma and utterly creamy texture, this soft Italian cheese is the ideal counterpoint to other appetizer favorites like salty prosciutto and tangy bruschetta. And when said fans find the stuff in the cheese case at their neighborhood Trader Joe's, for a fraction of the menu price? Let's just say if you're not yet a fan of Burrata, you soon will be!Break open a ball of Trader Joe's Burrata, and you'll be delighted to discover soft, stretchy curds comingling with rich cream in its center, greeting you with a slightly sweet, milky aroma. Creamy and almost cloud-like, it's a cheese-lover's dream, with only the simplest accompaniment needed to allow it to shine. Looking for palatable partners? How about fresh cantaloupe slices and balsamic vinegar? Perhaps some heirloom tomatoes and arugula? Or maybe on pizza, with tangy tomato sauce, basil, a glug of extra virgin olive oil, and a few cracks of sea salt...

ingredients.0: 1/2 teaspoon minced TJ's Garlic
ingredients.3: 1/4 cup TJ's California Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.5: 4 large TJ's Heirloom Tomatoes OR Kumato Tomatoes, sliced into small wedges

parsed_ing.3: California Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps.0: In a small bowl, mash garlic and salt together with the back of a spoon to form a paste. Set aside. In a separate bowl, whisk together lemon juice and olive oil. Slowly add the lemon juice and olive oil to the garlic paste and whisk until emulsified.
steps.1: In a large, shallow serving bowl, toss arugula with lemon dressing. Arrange tomato wedges atop arugula. Remove cream-filled burrata balls from container, arrange atop arugula and gently break them open with your hands. Drizzle salad with balsamic glaze. Serve immediately.

22.title: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
22.description: As grilling season rapidly approaches, you may be imagining the steaks, ribs, and chicken that'll be hitting the barbie... but as much as backyard BBQs are about the meats, they're also about the sides-and coleslaw is compulsory! Accordingly, we've created Trader Joe's Organic Coleslaw Kit including all you need to whip up a fresh, classic salad that has surprisingly many uses beyond being just a BBQ side dish. We especially enjoy it as a crunchy counterpoint, piled on a saucy sandwich with Trader Joe's Pulled Pork in Smoky BBQ Sauce.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic Cole Slaw Kit (seasonal)
ingredients.1: 2 trays TJ's Pulled Pork in Smoky BBQ Sauce

parsed_ing.1: Pulled Pork in Smoky BBQ Sauce

steps.0: Place cole slaw in a medium bowl. Toss with dressing packet, set aside.
steps.1: Microwave pulled pork according to package directions. Use a fork to split rolls. Pile pulled pork and cole slaw on bottom half of roll and top with the other half. Enjoy!

23.title: Tikka Masala Burritos
23.description: Trader Joe's Chicken Tikka Masala boasts chunks of roasted chicken served in a creamy, mildly spicy, tomato-based, curry flavored sauce. Our Chicken Tikka Masala was so favored for so many years, in fact, that we developed a vegan version to live alongside it in our frozen case. With a base of soy protein in place of meat, and bathed in an equally flavorful, slightly spicy sauce, Trader Joe's Vegan Tikka Masala skyrocketed to fame and earned a coveted spot in our Customer Choice Awards, right alongside its meat-based counterpart.While either of these Indian entrees are incredible served as-is, they're cleverly complemented in the company of organic peas, creamy yogurt, tangy mango chutney, and freshly chopped cilantro. Wrap it all up in your favorite Trader Joe's tortilla, and it's Tasty City, population: you.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Chicken Tikka Masala OR Vegan Tikka Masala
ingredients.2: 1/2 cup TJ's Organic Peas, heated according to package directions and drained

steps.0: Remove tikka masala tray from carton and puncture film 2 to 3 times. Microwave on high for 3 minutes. Carefully peel back film enough to gently stir sauce. Heat an additional 1 to 11/2 minutes to an internal temperature of 165°F. Carefully remove film; set aside.
steps.1: Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or directly over flame. Remove from heat and lay tortillas on a clean work surface. Divide rice and tikka masala between tortillas. Top each with peas, a few dollops of yogurt and chutney, and cilantro.
steps.2: To roll, pull half of the tortilla closest to you up to meet the top half, then pull the tortilla and fillings back toward you. Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla, then roll tightly until closed. Enjoy!

24.title: Quinoa Veggie Burgers with Avocado Tzatziki
24.description: For more than 20 years, our Customers' love of Tzatziki has remained tried & true. So our Buyer had a thought: why not combine this TJ's classic with something new? Perhaps, she thought, with a food that's rich and creamy, filled with healthy fats, and seemingly hipper than ever: the avocado. She tinkered with the recipe for months-settling on a 30% freshly diced avocado base and ultimately adding some diced jalapenos to the list of inclusions-and now we're pleased to offer Trader Joe's Avocado Tzatziki Dip, the [tangy, creamy, and totally addictive] fruit of her labor. It's pleasantly creamy, almost-fluffy texture makes it the ideal counterpoint to crunchy chips or carrot sticks, and begs to be slathered on burgers, sandwiches, and pita pockets...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Quinoa Cowboy Veggie Burgers
ingredients.3: 1/2 TJ"s Red Onion, very thinly sliced

steps.0: Preheat oven to 450°F. Remove burgers from packaging and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 5 minutes or until browned. Carefully flip and continue to bake an additional 5 minutes, or until heated through and well browned. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.
steps.1: Place burger patty on bottom of hamburger bun. Top with a generous swipe of Avocado Tzatziki dip, followed by sliced red onion and cilantro. Top with hamburger bun and serve immediately.

25.title: Falafel Wraps with Amba Mango Sauce
25.description: Ripe mangoes and green mangoes are fermented then simmered with garlic, salt, turmeric, paprika, and a host of Indian spices to create Trader Joe's Amba Mango Sauce. Modeled after a common condiment used all over the Middle East and throughout India, the finished product has a deep-yellow color with a thick, very smooth texture. The flavor is savory and complex, with some considerable heat. We've put Trader Joe's Amba Mango Sauce in a stand-up pouch with a screw-top lid so you can easily drizzle it on chicken kebabs or turkey burgers. In addition to meats, it also makes a distinctive dressing atop roasted eggplant, zucchini, and salads. Or, try it with Trader Joe's Fully Cooked Falafel, in a pita with Cruciferous Crunch for lunch!

ingredients.0: Your favorite TJ's Pita or Flatbread
ingredients.1: 1 bag TJ's Falafel, heated according to package directions

steps.0: Place a handful of cruciferous crunch on a flatbread or in a pita. Nestle 2 or 3 falafel in the flatbread and top with a generous drizzle of amba sauce. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Serve with more amba sauce on the side for dipping.

26.title: Creamy Chicken Gnocchi Soup
26.description: This recipe for Creamy Chicken Gnocchi Soup comes straight from a Crew Member's kitchen. Simmer Trader Joe's Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup with a package of shelf-stable Gnocchi and a container of shelf-stable Whipping Cream (shout out to pantry essentials!), and you could be serving it in your kitchen in 10 minutes-yes, you read that right. Serving Trader Joe's Organic French Rolls with a bowl of this creamy, chicken dumpling-esque soup isn't required, but it's absolutely recommended.

ingredients.0: 2 tubs TJ's Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup

steps.0: Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium and bring to a simmer. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Garnish with fresh thyme and serve.

27.title: Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup
27.description: Think pasta salad is reserved for spring and summer? This recipe, and our recipe taste-testers, beg to differ. It's a bright soup with the power to beat the winter blahs, made substantial with Trader Joe's Mediterranean Pasta Salad. Tangy Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken adds protein and zingy flavor, balanced by briny feta and olives in the pasta salad. A quick simmer in savory Organic Chicken Stock, and you'll have the sights and smells of the sunny Mediterranean filling your soup bowl...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken or Balsamic Chicken
ingredients.1: 2 tubs TJ's Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad

steps.0: Use forks to pull apart chicken and shred into pieces. Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan and heat over medium high. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer 8 minutes. Serve hot with a squeeze of lemon.

28.title: Channa Masala Tomato Soup
28.description: A veteran of our line of frozen Indian entrees, Trader Joe's Channa Masala is moderately spicy, belly-warming, and undeniably comforting-basically everything you're looking for when it comes to cold weather cuisine. Paired with full-flavored Organic Roasted Tomato & Red Pepper Soup, it's ready before you can ask "What's for lunch?" (Well, almost.) Don't forget to warm up Trader Joe's Malabari Paratha for dipping!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic Low Sodium Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup
ingredients.2: TJ's Greek Yogurt or Sour Cream and chopped parsley, for garnish (optional)
ingredients.3: TJ's Malabari Paratha, cooked according to package directions, for dipping (optional)

parsed_ing.0: Organic Low Sodium Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup

steps.0: Add soup to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium-low, stirring occasionally.
steps.1: While soup heats, microwave channa masala according to package directions; stir.
steps.2: Divide soup among 4 shallow serving bowls. Divide channa masala and gently spoon atop center of soup. Garnish with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkle of chopped parsley. Enjoy!

29.title: Crunchy Pita Salad
29.description: Trader Joe's Organic Rose Vinaigrette is light, tangy, and slightly floral, just like its namesake wine varietal. Made with organic sunflower oil, organic red wine vinegar, and organic rose wine vinegar, it has savory depth thanks to dried garlic, organic dried basil, organic dried oregano, with a bit of organic agave syrup to sweeten the deal. It's fantastic tossed with hot pasta and halved cherry tomatoes for a light supper. In this recipe modeled after Lebanese fattoush salad, we've paired this Rose Vinaigrette with crisp salad greens and cucumbers, tangy tomatoes, sharp red onion, and fresh herbs. Crunchy pita chips are coated in olive oil to retain their crisp texture atop the dressed greens, and a squeeze of lemon lends extra brightness.

ingredients.0: 4 handfuls TJ's Pita Chips, broken into pieces
ingredients.1: 1-2 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.2: 2 TJ's Organic Romaine Hearts, chopped into strips
ingredients.5: 1/2 package TJ's Organic Cherry Tomatoes, halved

steps.0: Add pita chips and olive oil to a medium bowl and toss to coat; set aside.
steps.1: Add romaine and 2 tablespoons dressing to a large bowl, toss to combine. Add more dressing to taste. Top with cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, and pita chips. Garnish with a squeeze of lemon and a few grinds of salt & pepper. Enjoy immediately, as-is or topped with grilled chicken or tempeh.

30.title: Corn Chip Dipper Chili Pie
30.description: If you're wondering why Trader Joe's Organic Corn Chip Dippers made our not-scientific-but-still-pretty-accurate list of Crew Member Favorites, you probably haven't tried these delightfully crunchy, dippable chips-something you should change very soon. They're made with a mere three ingredients: organic corn, organic sunflower oil, and salt. That's it! On top of their simple ingredient list and captivating crunch, they function perfectly as the edible little corn version of a spoon. Dip them into queso, salsa, or guac. Or use the bag as a bowl of sorts, and top these Dippers with warmed turkey chili, shredded cheese and hot & sweet jalapenos for comforting, cold weather fare that's ready in mere minutes!

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Organic Corn Chip Dippers
ingredients.1: 1 can TJ's Turkey Chili, heated according to package directions
ingredients.2: TJ's Shredded Three Cheese Mexican Blend

steps.0: Lay the closed bag of corn chip dippers flat on a clean work surface. Using a sharp pair of scissors, cut the corn chip dipper bag in half crosswise, so that each half of the bag contains dippers (even the portions out if necessary). Roll the cut edges of each side down to create "bowls."
steps.1: Top the dippers with warmed turkey chili, cheese, and jalapenos to taste. Dig in!

31.title: Roasted Veggie Bowl
31.description: By combining the bright, zesty tomato and pepper flavors of a traditional chunky salsa with the texture and nuttiness of finely chopped pepitas, has created a savory synthesis of seed and spice. Each bite carries the delicate sweet heat of pureed bell pepper and chipotle spices, making this one seriously satisfying salsa for scooping with tortilla chips or drizzling atop a hearty roasted veggie bowl.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Frozen Brown Rice, microwaved according to package directions
ingredients.1: 2 cups of your favorite roasted vegetables, cold or warm (we used Brussels Sprouts & Delicata Squash, feel free to sub in whatever you have on hand)

parsed_ing.1: of your favorite roasted vegetables, cold

steps.0: Divide rice among two serving bowls. Top each bowl with roasted veggies, a handful of kale and half an avocado. Drizzle with salsa and enjoy.

32.title: Sweet Kale Slaw Turkey Burger
32.description: Trader Joe's Turkey Burgers are made using fresh, white & dark turkey meat, a combination that ensures juicy, flavorful burgers. You can cook them on the stovetop or grill-from frozen, even!-in just a few minutes. Paired with crunchy kale slaw and sweet potato chips, dinner doesn't get much easier than this-and you don't have to sacrifice quality or taste for the sake of convenience and value.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Turkey Burgers
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Broccoli Kale Slaw Complete Salad Kit
ingredients.4: TJ's Ridge Cut Sweet Potato Chips (optional)

parsed_ing.2: Broccoli Kale Slaw Complete Salad Kit

steps.0: Add oil to a grill pan or skillet and turn heat to medium-high. Cook turkey burgers according to package directions; remove from heat.
steps.1: In a medium bowl, toss salad with included toppings and dressing. To assemble, place turkey burger on bottom half of bun. Top with slaw and top half of bun, and serve with sweet potato chips.

33.title: Pesto Portabella Burger
33.description: The kale in Trader Joe's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto gives it some serious depth, while the basil infuses it with freshness, and the cashew butter lends it enough creaminess to leave you saying, "Parmesan? Who needs Parmesan?!" Aside from the obvious pasta pairings, it makes a splash as a spread on burgers and sandwiches, too.

ingredients.0: 2 packages TJ's Portabella Mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth, stems removed
ingredients.4: 2 TJ's Roasted Red Bell Peppers, thinly sliced
ingredients.5: 4 of your favorite TJ's Artisan Rolls, baked according to package directions
ingredients.7: TJ's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto

steps.0: Preheat grill to medium-high. Brush mushrooms with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, gill side-down for 5 minutes; flip mushrooms and grill another 3-5 minutes until tender. Remove from heat and place provolone on top to melt.
steps.1: Slice rolls in half lengthwise. Generously slather bottom half of a roll with pesto. Top with mushroom, bell pepper, spring mix, and top half of roll. Repeat with remaining ingredients and enjoy immediately.

34.title: Buffalo Fig Burger
34.description: Lusciously velvety, our Fig Butter is full of rich, ripe figs, cooked down with sugar and a bit of lemon to balance the sweetness. It's a shining star as a glaze for chicken, a supreme spread for cheese boards, and a sweetly craveable counterpoint atop savory buffalo patties.

ingredients.0: 2 packages TJ's Ground Buffalo Burgers, thawed according to package directions

steps.0: Preheat a grill to medium-high. Season burgers with salt and pepper. Grill burgers according to package directions; remove from heat and let rest 5 minutes.
steps.1: To assemble, place a burger on the bottom half of a bun. Top with goat cheese crumbles, tomato, arugula and onion. Generously slather fig butter on top half of bun and place on burger. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immediately.

35.title: Veggie Burger with Almond Butter Turmeric Slaw
35.description: With an impressive 26 grams of protein per patty (shout out to pea protein!), Trader Joe's Hi-Protein Veggie Burger offers a texture that's surprisingly... "meaty." It's seasoned with garlic, sea salt and black pepper, making it a good-eating burger that plays well with toppings, such as the grilled sweet potato slabs and almond butter turmeric slaw in this recipe.

ingredients.0: 2 packages TJ's Hi-Protein Veggie Burgers
ingredients.2: 2 TJ's Sweet Potatoes, peeled and sliced into 1/4" rounds
ingredients.4: 1 bag TJ's Organic Shredded Cabbage & Carrots
ingredients.5: 1-2 tablespoons TJ's Almond Butter Turmeric Salad Dressing

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F. Place burgers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake 20 minutes on center rack of oven, flipping burgers halfway through cooking; remove from heat.
steps.1: While burgers bake, in a small bowl, toss sweet potato rounds with olive oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Heat a grill pan to medium-high. Grill sweet potatoes 3-4 minutes per side; remove from heat.
steps.2: In a medium bowl, toss shredded cabbage with salad dressing; set aside.
steps.3: To assemble: place a veggie burger on the bottom half of a hamburger bun. Top with sweet potato rounds, slaw, sliced avocado, and top half of bun. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immdiately.

36.title: Meatless Meatball BBQ Subs
36.description: Trader Joe's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauceis a grill's best friend. Its tangy, sweet-smokiness instantly ups the ante on grilled meat, ribs, and chicken, commanding center of the plate attention with the flick of a basting brush. But you don't need to fire up the grill to get your fill-try replacing the marinara in a classic meatball sub with a drizzle of this Organic BBQ Sauce for a rib-sticking supper that's ready in no time.

ingredients.0: 2 bags TJ's Meatless Meatballs
ingredients.1: 1 bottle TJ's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Gourmet White Hot Dog Buns

parsed_ing.1: Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce

steps.0: In a large microwave safe dish, microwave meatballs according to package directions. Pour BBQ sauce over meatballs just to cover, and stir to combine. Continue to microwave on half power at 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until sauce is warmed through.
steps.1: Open hot dog buns and arrange on a large baking sheet. Fill each bun with 4 meatballs and top with warmed sauce and a slice of provolone.
steps.2: Heat broiler to high. Broil subs 3-5 minutes, until cheese is melted and brown, and buns are golden (depending on your broiler, you may have to cover empty side of bun with foil to prevent burning). Remove subs from oven and let cool slightly. Top with diced red onion and enjoy.

37.title: Cool & Spicy Noodle Salad
37.description: Do you tend to avoid traditional (read: heavy on the palate) pasta dishes due to the carb-induced slumber often left in their wake? Then try this Cool & Spicy Noodle Salad, a savory, peanut-y side dish that's a little bit Thai, a little bit Italian, and a whole lot of energizing flavor. All that's required of you is to prepare Trader Joe's Organic Yellow Lentil & Brown Rice Spaghetti, toss it with the rest of your ingredients, and let it chill (feel free also to let yourself chill, while you wait). The result is a versatile side dish that wows on its own, and pairs masterfully with grilled chicken breast or salmon, pan-fried tofu, sauteed veggies...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic Yellow Lentil & Brown Rice Spaghetti
ingredients.3: 2 TJ's Red Bell Peppers, cored and very thinly sliced
ingredients.4: 1 cup TJ's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette, plus more to taste
ingredients.5: Handful Fresh cilantro, rinsed and chopped (optional)
ingredients.6: Handful of TJ's Half Salted Peanuts, crushed (optional)

parsed_ing.0: Organic Yellow Lentil & Brown Rice Spaghetti

steps.0: Prepare pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, prepare a large bowl of ice water. Transfer cooked, drained pasta to ice water to cool. Drain pasta thoroughly and add to a very large mixing bowl.
steps.1: Add cabbage, carrots, bell peppers and vinaigrette to pasta. Gently toss to combine. Adjust dressing to taste and add cilantro, if desired. Cover and chill 30 minutes. Garnish with crushed peanuts prior to serving.

38.title: Falafel Waffles
38.description: These savory waffles will WOW at breakfast, lunch or dinner.

ingredients.0: 2 cups TJ's Falafel Mix
ingredients.5: TJ's Roasted Red Peppers, drained and chopped

steps.0: In a large bowl, combine falafel mix and water. Cover and let sit 1 hour. Stir in 1 tablespoon sunflower oil.
steps.1: Preheat waffle iron. Scoop 1/3 of the batter onto the center of the waffle iron and spread evenly with a spatula toward the edges. Close waffle iron and cook 12 minutes, until golden brown. Remove waffle from iron and repeat process two more times (you'll end up with three large waffles).
steps.2: To serve, garnish waffles with chopped peppers and parsley, a drizzle of tahini and a squeeze of lemon.

39.title: Griddled Pepper Jelly & Cream Cheese
39.description: A bit of heat, a bit of sweetness, a lot of cream cheese. This 'wich is especially excellent when cut into triangles and served as an appetizer.

ingredients.0: 6 slices TJ's Multigrain Bread
ingredients.1: 1 jar TJ's Hot & Sweet Pepper Jelly
ingredients.2: 1 block of TJ's Cream Cheese, cut into 1/4" slices

steps.0: Heat skillet over medium heat. Divide butter and spread evenly on slices of bread. Place one slice butter-down on skillet. Immediately place slices of cream cheese onto bread, enough to cover (about five). Top cream cheese with pepper jelly. Place second slice of bread on top with butter facing up.
steps.1: Let cook for 3-4 minutes, until bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes, until bottom is golden brown and the cream cheese has softened.
steps.2: Transfer sandwich to a cutting board and cut into triangles, or your preferred shape.
steps.3: Cook remaining two sandwiches in the same manner. Serve immediately.

40.title: Cocoa Peanut Butter Bacon Bagel
40.description: Yes, bacon. Don't be afraid of this bold combo - one bite and this sandwich's sweet-savory flavors will have you sold.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Pretzel Bagel
ingredients.2: 2 tablespoons TJ's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter
ingredients.3: 2 slices TJ's Uncured Dry Rubbed Sliced Bacon, cooked

steps.0: Slice bagel in half and toast until warm. Spread Cocoa Almond Spread over one side of bagel and peanut butter over the other. Cut slices of bacon in half and arrange on one side of bagel. Sandwich the sides together and cut in half. Serve immediately.

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Falafel Mix
ingredients.4: Your favorite TJ's Hummus, Salad Greens, and Flatbread (Flatbread, Naan, Malabari Paratha, etc.) for serving (optional)

steps.0: Combine falafel mix and water in a medium sized bowl; cover and set aside for one hour.
steps.1: Roughly divide falafel dough into 9 sections. Holding one piece of dough in your palm, press a teaspoon of feta into the center and mold the dough around it to conceal the feta. Repeat with remaining dough (you should have 9 dough balls).
steps.2: Fill a 3-quart stockpot with sunflower oil, about four inches high. Turn heat to medium-high and heat oil to 300°F.
steps.3: Working in batches, use a long-handled slotted spoon to gently lower dough balls into oil. Fry until floating and dark golden brown, 2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate and cool 2 to 3 minutes before serving. Serve as an appetizer with your favorite hummus, or atop a bed of greens or in a toasted flatbread for a meatless meal.

42.title: Grilled Tempeh with Mexican Style Corn & Quinoa Salad
42.description: Trader Joe's Mexican Style Corn & Quinoa Salad is our tribute to esquites, the beloved Mexican street food made from kernels of grilled corn mixed with mayonnaise, cotija cheese, and lime juice. We take the corn, cotija, and lime juice (and sub out the mayonnaise for a poblano-cilantro dressing), and add in some crunchy kale & cabbage, tart grape tomatoes, and a hearty quinoa & brown rice blend.The result is a fresh, flavorful, anytime salad that works just as well as a meal as it does a side dish. If you're looking for extra protein, try adding hearty slices of grilled tempeh to the mix!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic 3 Grain Tempeh
ingredients.2: 1 container TJ's Mexican Corn & Quinoa Salad

steps.0: Fill a pot with a few inches of water and bring to a boil. Slice tempeh crosswise, about 1/2 inch thick. Place tempeh in steamer basket in pot, cover and steam 15 minutes. Remove from heat and allow tempeh to cool slightly.
steps.1: Heat a grill pan or grill to medium high heat. Brush tempeh slices with sunflower oil. Grill tempeh 2-3 minutes per side and remove from heat.
steps.2: Add salad and dressing to a large bowl, toss to combine. Divide salad between two plates and top with grilled tempeh. Serve immediately.

43.title: Chicken-less Pineapple Salad
43.description: One of the best things about Trader Joe's Chicken-less Mandarin Orange Morsels is that if you didn't know they weren't chicken, you'd probably think they were chicken. They're as tender and juicy as can be, and once you coat them in that beloved orange sauce (which comes in a separate packet), you'll taste nothing but citrusy, gingery, garlicky goodness. Plate them atop sauteed Cruciferous Crunch and you'll have a meatless meal on the table in under 15 minutes.

ingredients.0: 2 tablespoons TJ's Sunflower Oil
ingredients.1: 1 bag TJ's Chickenless Mandarin Orange Morsels
ingredients.2: scant 1/3 cup TJ's Pineapple Tidbits, defrosted

steps.0: Divide cruciferous crunch between two plates, set aside. Heat oil in a nonstick pan over medium heat. Add morsels to pan and cook 6-8 minutes, turning regularly to avoid browning. Add mandarin orange sauce packet and pineapple to pan and cook 2 minutes, stirring to coat. Remove pan from heat. Divide morsels and pineapple among prepared plates and serve immediately.

44.title: Turkey Salad Sandwich
44.description: With turkey breast meat, dried cranberries, apples, pecans & sage, our ready-to-eat Turkey Cranberry Apple Salad allows you to enjoy the flavors of Thanksgiving leftovers without cooking the entire meal.

ingredients.0: 1 container TJ's Turkey Cranberry Apple Salad (seasonal)
ingredients.1: 6 slices of your favorite TJ's Multigrain Bread (toasted or untoasted, your call)
ingredients.2: 3-4 leaves TJ's Organic Romaine Hearts, rinsed and torn into pieces

steps.0: Divide turkey cranberry apple salad among three slices of bread. Top each with romaine and another slice of bread. Enjoy!

45.title: Delicata Squash Pasta Salad
45.description: Rich, roasted delicata squash, tangy feta with pomegranate seeds, and al dente pasta set the stage for a hearty meal.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's Delicata Squash, halved lenghtwise and de-seeded (or substitute 3 cups of your favorite peeled & cubed squash)
ingredients.4: 1 package TJ's Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta

parsed_ing.4: Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Slice squash 3/4 inches thick and toss with olive oil, salt and pepper. Arrange on a large baking sheet and roast for 30-35 minutes until fork tender, tossing halfway through cooking.
steps.1: While squash cooks, prepare pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and rinse under cold water to halt the cooking process. Divide baby lettuce among four plates and top with pasta. Top each salad with crumbled feta and pomegranate seeds. Drizzle vinaigrette atop each salad and serve immediately, with more dressing on the side.

46.title: Grilled Blue Cheese, Apricots & Spicy Pecans
46.description: This blues-y composition (made flowing with mozzarella) gets jazzy with inflections of bright dried apricots and spicy pecans. You'll be singing for more!

ingredients.0: I slice of your favorite TJ's Multigrain Bread
ingredients.2: 3 Tbsp TJ's Caved Aged Blue Cheese, crumbled
ingredients.4: 2 Tbsp TJ's Sweet and Spicy Pecans, chopped

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F.
steps.1: Lightly toast bread (light setting on toaster) or about 1 to 2 minutes each side in the oven).
steps.2: Mix blue cheese, apricots and pecans together. Set aside.
steps.3: Place arugula on toast, top with mozzarella, and then with the blue mixture. Place in oven and toast until all cheese is melted, apricots are warm and pecans are slightly toasted; about 6 to 8 minutes. Adorn with extra apricots and/or pecans. Serve right away.

47.title: Sausage & Veggies
47.description: Veggies seem to be at their most craveable when roasted. Paired with Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage and Rice Medley, they make for a filling, fantastically prepped meal you can enjoy all week long.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's Russet Potatoes, rinsed and dried
ingredients.1: 1 TJ's Yellow Onion, rinsed and dried
ingredients.2: 3 TJ's Whole Organic Carrots, rinsed and dried
ingredients.3: 1 bag TJ's Tricolor Peppers, rinsed and dried
ingredients.4: 1 bag TJ's Organic Broccoli Florets, rinsed and dried
ingredients.5: 1 package TJ's Spicy Italian Chicken Sausages (or your favorite TJ's fully cooked chicken sausage)
ingredients.6: 3 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided

steps.0: You will need 5 microwave-safe food storage containers for daily meal prep.
steps.1: Adjust oven racks to upper and lower level of oven. Preheat oven to 400°F and line two large baking sheets with parchment paper; set aside.
steps.2: Cube potatoes, onion and carrots. In a large bowl, gently toss cubed veggies with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Spread veggie mixture evenly on baking sheet. Bake on upper rack of oven for 10 minutes.
steps.3: While potatoes, onion and carrots are baking, roughly chop peppers and broccoli. Slice sausages. In a large bowl, gently toss peppers, broccoli and sausages with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Spread mixture evenly on second baking sheet and set aside.
steps.4: After 10 minutes, move the baking sheet with veggie mixture to the bottom rack of oven. Place the sheet with the sausage mixture on the upper rack of oven. Bake 20-25 minutes, until veggies are fork-tender. Remove both sheets from oven and set aside to cool.
steps.5: Assemble meals: Microwave rice according to package directions. Combine the veggie and sausage mixtures in a large bowl, tossing gently to combine. Lay out five food storage containers. Divide rice evenly among containers. Divide veggie sausage mixture evenly among containers. Cover and refrigerate until ready to eat.
steps.6: To reheat: Remove lid from container and place in microwave. Heat in one minute increments, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Enjoy!

48.title: Classic Cobb Salad
48.description: Trader Joe's Cage-Free Hard-Cooked Eggs, Fullly Cooked Uncured Bacon, and Blue Cheese Crumbles contribute to this quick, uncomplicated yet filling salad that's loaded with toppings-which is always the best part of a salad, anyway.

ingredients.0: 1/2 package TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Romaine Hearts, rinsed and chopped
ingredients.2: 16 oz. TJ's Grape Tomatoes, rinsed and halved
ingredients.3: 5 Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs, quartered
ingredients.7: 1 bottle TJ's Red Wine & Olive Oil Vinaigrette OR 1 jar TJ's Chunky Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients.8: 5 food storage containers for daily meal prep

parsed_ing.8: storage containers for daily meal prep

steps.0: Microwave bacon according to package directions. Chop bacon into bite sized pieces. Line up your food storage containers and lay a bed of romaine at the bottom of each. Divide bacon, tomatoes, eggs, and chicken evenly among containers. Top each salad with 2 tablespoons blue cheese. Measure 2 tablespoons dressing into each sauce container. Cover and refrigerate until ready to eat. Save avocado and slice fresh each day.
steps.1: When ready to eat, slice 1/3 of an avocado atop salad and drizzle with dressing. Enjoy!

49.title: Protein Box
49.description: Pump up your protein intake by building a simple, pre-prepped snack box, consisting of fresh produce, Cage Free Hard-Cooked Egg, and Peanut Butter with Flax & Chia Seeds. (And though it might not be "dessert" in the strictest sense, the cheese is, undoubtedly, a treat.)

ingredients.0: 5 TJ's Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs

ingredients.4: 1 jar TJ's Peanut Butter with Flax & Chia Seeds

steps.0: You will need food storage containers for ingredients and daily meal prep, and 5 small sauce containers for peanut butter.
steps.1: Prep components:Trim ends of celery and slice into thirds. Slice cheese into 1-inch cubes. Measure 2 tablespoons peanut butter into each of the small sauce containers. Halve eggs. Refrigerate prepped ingredients in separate food storage containers until needed.
steps.2: Assemble protein box: Each morning, place the following in your box: two egg halves, 6-7 carrots, 5-6 celery sticks, 5-6 cubes of cheese, 2 tablespoons of peanut butter, and one apple.

steps.2: To assemble tacos, layer tortilla with carnitas, salsa, diced onions and a drizzle of crema. Garnish with chopped cilantro and lime wedges, and serve.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Corn Tortillas

steps.0: Remove soy chorizo from casing. In a large skillet over medium heat, add soy chorizo, breaking it up into pieces as it cooks, about 8-10 minutes. When soy chorizo reaches 165°F, remove from heat.
steps.1: To prepare tortillas, heat a griddle or grill pan to medium-high heat. Fill a shallow bowl or plate with water. Dip each side of tortilla in water and immediately place on grill pan. Warm tortilla 1 minute each side, then place in foil to keep warm. Repeat for each tortilla.
steps.2: Slice avocados into half-inch thick pieces. Cook on grill pan for about a minute on each side and remove from heat. When cool enough to handle, gently slice peels away from grilled avocado pieces.
steps.3: To assemble tacos, layer tortillas with soy chorizo, grilled avocado, salsa, and a drizzle of crema. Serve with lime wedges, if desired.

52.title: Channa Masala Pasties
52.description: The national dish of Cornwall, England, the pasty (PASS-tee) is a hand-held, sturdy pastry crust wrapped around a hearty filling. It's portable, edible packaging and the fact that utensils weren't required to enjoy it made it the meal of choice for Cornish tin miners. While it's traditionally filled with meat & potatoes, the pasty filling is limited only by your imagination-roasted veggies, chicken and green chile, sweet pumpkin, stewed cinnamon apples... This particular recipe embraces a less than traditional filling, in the form of Trader Joe's Channa Masala. Moderately spicy and ready to heat and eat, it makes savory pasty preparation easy as pie.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Pie Crusts, thawed according to package directions
ingredients.1: 2 trays TJs Channa Masala, microwaved according to package directions

parsed_ing.1: TJs Channa Masala, microwaved according to package directions

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper; set aside.
steps.1: Working in two batches, unroll softened dough and smooth together any cracks with your hands. Remove top layer of plastic film and cut dough into quarters. Place a piece of dough on lined baking sheet and top with 1/4 cup channa masala. Starting at one corner and working around the edge of the dough, gently pull dough up toward center, pinching and folding edges to create a dumpling. Repeat with remaining dough and filling (you'll end up with 8 pasties on the baking sheet).
steps.2: In a small bowl, thoroughly whisk the egg. Using a pastry brush, evenly brush the tops of the pasties with whisked egg. Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake for 30 minutes, until crust is golden. Allow to cool 5 minutes. Enjoy on the go, or at the table with mixed greens and Cumin-y Riced Cauliflower on the side.
steps.3: Freezing/Reheating Instructions: Wrap leftover pasties in cling wrap and toss in the freezer. To reheat, remove cling wrap and place pasty on a microwave safe dish. Heat at 50% power for 1 minute, then at full power for 1 minute. Allow to cool slightly before serving.

Garnish with fresh basil, if desired, and serve.

55.title: Irish Tacos
55.description: Yes, you read that correctly. We've swapped tortillas for boxty-Irish potato pancakes-made with TJ's Shredded Hash Browns and topped these tacos with a festive garnish.

ingredients.3: 3 cups TJ's Frozen Hash Browns, thawed

steps.0: Prepare Boxty Pancakes: Mix hash browns, flour, eggs, heavy cream, chives, and salt in a bowl. Heat butter in nonstick pan on medium high heat until melted. Use 1/4 cup measurer to spoon batter into pan. Flip when browned on one side (about 2 minutes), and remove when browned on second side.
steps.1: Assemble Tacos: Place a banger atop each pancake and garnish with sliced peppers and Cruciferous Crunch. Drizzle tacos with gravy and serve immediately.

56.title: Antipasti Bowl
56.description: These hearty bowls are a cinch to assemble and scale up for a large group. You can lay the ingredients out for guests so they can build bowls to their liking, while you relax and enjoy the party.

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Quick Cook Farro
ingredients.2: 1/3 cup TJ's Balsamic Vinaigrette, plus more for serving

ingredients.5: 1/2 jar TJ's Pitted Greek Kalamata Olives

ingredients.8: 1 package Columbus Reduced Sodium Italian Dry Salame

steps.0: Add farro and 3 cups water to a saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover pan and simmer 10 minutes. Drain farro into a colander and rinse under cold water for 1 minute. Add farro and vinaigrette to a medium bowl and stir to combine. Set aside.
steps.1: Divide butter lettuce among serving bowls and top each with a scoop of farro. Top each bowl with peppers, artichoke halves, olives, mozzarella and salame and serve immediately.

57.title: Sam’s Sweet Potato Soup
57.description: First things first: who the heck is Sam? Why, a Trader Joe's Crew Member, of course! A Trader Joe's Crew Member who just so happens to have a boiling passion for vegetarian soups. Sam savors and slurps soups of all sorts, but she's especially a sucker for soups with sweet potatoes-and her signature Sweet Potato Soup will sweep you off your feet and send you searching for your slippers. This is the kind of warm, hearty soup that winter nights were made for, and it's also a cinch to make. Its ingredients are simple (veggie broth, couscous, Sweet Potatoes, kale, et al) but its flavor is surprisingly complex. And the secret, Sam says, is in the seasoning-the Trader Joe's Taco Seasoning, to be precise.

ingredients.0: 2 tablespoons Avocado Oil
ingredients.2: 2 medium Sweet Potatoes, peeled and cubed
ingredients.5: 6 cups TJ's Low Sodium Vegetable Broth

steps.0: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and sweet potato and saute 5 minutes. Add couscous and saute 5 minutes to toast. Add 2 tablespoons water to pot, cover and cook 3 minutes.
steps.1: Remove lid and add vegetable broth and taco seasoning. Reduce heat and simmer until sweet potatoes are fork-tender, 25-30 minutes. Add kale and simmer 5 minutes more until wilted. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Ladle soup into large bowls and serve with crusty bread for dipping.

58.title: Grilled Sharp Cheddar, Applewood Bacon, & Shaved Sprouts
58.description: Grindy! This delicious beast marries applewood smoked bacon, sauteed sprouts and flowing sharp Cheddar on a crispy multigrain crust.

ingredients.0: 1/2 cup TJ's Shaved Brussels Sprouts, lightly sauteed
ingredients.1: 2 slices TJ's Multigrain Sliced Bread or TJ's Sprouted Wheat Sourdough Bread
ingredients.4: 2 slices TJ's Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon, cooked

steps.0: Spray one side of each slice of bread with canola oil, and place the slices (sprayed-side down) on a clean working surface.
steps.1: Divide the cheese and pile evenly on each slice of bread. On each slice, place two strips of bacon. On one slice, add the sauteed sprouts. Carefully sandwich the two sides together.
steps.2: Heat a large fry pan or griddle over medium heat until hot. Place the sandwich on the pan and reduce the heat to medium-low. After about a minute, cover the pan with a large lid, and let it cook for about 2-3 minutes more, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes (covering again after 1 minute to encourage the melt), until bottom is golden brown and the cheese is melting.
steps.3: Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half. Serve immediately.

59.title: Grilled Caprese on Cauliflower Crust
59.description: Carb conscious, cutting out gluten, covet the capabilities of cauliflower - we've sandwiched it all in this Grilled Caprese, along with layer upon layer of fresh tastes and textures. So good!

ingredients.0: 2 bags TJ's Frozen Riced Cauliflower

steps.0: Cauliflower Crust
steps.1: Preheat oven to 425º.
steps.2: Pour cauliflower into a pyrex pie dish; microwave on high for 5 minutes; take out and stir-repeat 3 times (total time in microwave = 20 minutes). Spread the heated cauliflower over a large piece of parchment paper or clean dish towel and let cool completely.
steps.3: Add eggs, salt and pepper to a large mixing bowl and whip. Pour in cauliflower and cheese; mix well.
steps.4: Line a quarter-sized sheet pan (about 9 1/2" x 13" x 1") with parchment paper and spread the cauliflower mixture evenly across the pan. Place in oven for 25 minutes; remove when the cauliflower is baked to a golden brown on top. Allow to cool completely in the pan.
steps.5: Cut into sandwich slices. Use right away or refrigerate or freeze until ready to use. (Once refrigerated or frozen, place in a 350ºF oven for 6 to 10 minutes to bring to room temperature before serving or using in recipes.)
steps.6: Grilled Caprese
steps.7: Taking two slices of the prepared Cauliflower Crust, spray one side of each slice of crust with canola oil, and place the slices (sprayed-side down) on a clean working surface.
steps.8: On each crust, layer on two slices of mozzarella. On one crust, atop the cheese, layer the tomato, and the basil. Carefully sandwich the crusts.
steps.9: Heat a large fry pan or griddle over medium heat until hot. Place the sandwich on the pan and reduce the heat to medium-low. After about a minute, cover the pan with a large lid, and let it cook for about 2-3 minutes more, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes (covering again after 1 minute to encourage the melt), until cheese is melting.
steps.10: Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half. Serve immediately.

The ten minute, no-cook prep offers a welcome vacation from the stove on a busy weeknight. Take a bite, close your eyes, and you can almost taste the sunshine...

But in this recipe, the corn comes back, only this time, it's off the cob... Pop Goes the Elote!

ingredients.0: 1/4 cup TJ's Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 3 tablespoon TJ's Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend

parsed_ing.3: Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend

corrected_ing.3: Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend

steps.0: In a 3-quart pan, pour in oil to cover the bottom.  Add 2-3 kernels of corn to pan, cover and heat. When these kernels pop, add the remaining popping corn, then cover and shake pan over medium heat until popping stops.
steps.1: Remove from heat. Pour melted butter and sprinkle seasoning over popcorn. Mix until thoroughly covered.
steps.2: Let popcorn cool slightly and enjoy!

79.title: Blood Orange & Butter Lettuce Salad with Avocado, Fennel & Feta
79.description: From its soft, butter lettuce base to the blood orange vinaigrette you'll dress it with, there's something downright romantic about this Blood Orange & Butter Lettuce Salad with Avocado, Fennel & Feta. Individually, its components are as different as can be. But-as in any healthy relationship-when they come together, they complement each other beautifully. Buttery, diced avocados brush against tangy slices of citrus... Crunchy, salted pecans offset creamy, crumbled feta... Crisp, flavorful fennel (yes, fennel!) plays off smooth, mild lettuce... Need we go on?

ingredients.0: 2 teaspoons TJ's Shallots, minced
ingredients.2: 2 tablespoons TJ's Organic Raw Apple Cider Vinegar
ingredients.5: 2 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.8: 1 cup TJ's Roasted & Salted Pecan Halves
ingredients.10: 3 tablespoons TJ's Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese

steps.0: Vinaigrette:
steps.1: Place minced shallots in a small bowl. Squeeze the juice from one blood orange over the shallots. Add vinegar, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 10 minutes while you prep your salad. After 10 minutes, whisk in the olive oil. Set aside.
steps.2: Salad:
steps.3: Using a sharp knife, remove stems & fonds from fennel and slice in half vertically. Using only 1/2 of the bulb, cut out the core. Slice into thin bite-sized strips. Set aside.
steps.4: Peel the remaining four blood oranges. Slice them into rounds or bite-sized pieces. Set aside.
steps.5: Chop pecans. Set aside.
steps.6: Dice avocado. Set aside.
steps.7: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, fennel, blood oranges, pecans, avocado, feta, and 1/2 of the vinaigrette and lightly toss.
steps.8: Serve with the remainder of the vinaigrette on the side. Enjoy!

80.title: Tastes Like Chicken Vegan Cauliflower Steaks
80.description: Chicken-flavored seasoning salt has been a hot food trend in Australia for a few years now. When our Buyer first tried it, sprinkled over a basket of hot fries, she knew she had to bring it to Trader Joe's. But we've upped the ante. We've made ours 100% vegan. Yes, vegan.Made from a blend of sea salt, onion & garlic powder, turmeric, and a handful of other spices, Trader Joe's Vegan Chicken-less Seasoning Salt adds a blast of "bullion" to anything you shake it on-like hefty slices of cruciferous cauliflower. Just mix with Trader Joe's Extra Virigin Olive Oil, then brush & bake... And voila! You've got yourself some mighty, meaty cauli-"steaks" that taste like chicken, but are anything but!

ingredients.0: 1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.1: 2 teaspoons TJ's Vegan Chicken-less Seasoning Salt

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Lightly spray a sheet pan with canola oil spray, set aside.
steps.1: In a small bowl, mix together olive oil and seasoning. Set aside.
steps.2: Rinse cauliflower and remove leaves. Trim bottom of the cauliflower stem, but make sure to keep the core intact. Cut into thick (1" or so) slices.
steps.3: Arrange cauliflower slices on sheet pan. Brush half of the oil mixture on cauliflower. Carefully turn cauliflower slices over and brush on the remaining mixture.
steps.4: Place on middle rack in oven and bake for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is easily pierced with a fork.
steps.5: Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Serve warm and enjoy!

81.title: Sriracha Furikake Tofu Fries
81.description: If you've been to a poke bar, you're likely familiar with Furikake-it's a multi-purpose Japanese seasoning that's a fan favorite on the fast-fish scene. But Furikake isn't just for fish, folks-as you'll soon find, it's for "fries," too! Baked Tofu Fries, that is...

ingredients.0: TJ's Canola Oil Spray
ingredients.1: 2 packages TJ's Sriracha Flavored Baked Tofu
ingredients.2: 2 large TJ's Eggs, egg whites separated

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a sheet pan with parchment paper and spray lightly with canola oil spray.
steps.1: Cut tofu into thin, "fry-sized" strips.
steps.2: Place egg whites in a small bowl.
steps.3: In a medium bowl, combine breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and furikake and toss together.
steps.4: One by one, dredge tofu strips in egg whites, making sure every side is covered. Briefly hold each strip over bowl and allow excess to drip off. Roll egg white-covered strip in the breadcrumb/furikake mix until all sides are thoroughly covered. Place on greased baking sheet. Repeat until all tofu strips are properly coated and placed on baking sheet, a few inches apart.
steps.5: Once all tofu strips are placed on sheet, lightly spray them with canola oil spray.
steps.6: Place sheet in center rack of oven and bake for about 25 minutes or until golden brown.
steps.7: Remove from oven, let cool, enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1/2 cup TJ's Organic Reduced Sugar Raspberry (or Strawberry) Preserves

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F.
steps.1: Prepare sauce: In a sauce pan over medium heat, add raspberry preserves and sweet chili sauce. Heat until sauce begins to bubble, about 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat.
steps.2: Place meatballs in a 9x9 baking dish and cover with warm sauce mixture. Place dish in oven and heat for 40 minutes, or until meatballs are heated to 165°F and sauce is hot. Alternatively, use a slow cooker to heat meatballs and sauce, about 5-6 hours on low, or 2-4 hours on high until heated through.

83.title: Honey Roasted Feta
83.description: A Feta of this quality deserves to be savored. Made for us by 4th generation Israeli cheesemakers, it's creamy yet crumbly, totally toothsome, and wonderfully briny. Here, we've given it the royal treatment by brushing it honey and baking it to slightly-browned, barely-bubbling perfection...

ingredients.0: 1 container TJ's Israeli Feta
ingredients.1: 2 tablespoons TJ's California Extra-Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.3: TJ's Organic On The Vine Tomatoes, sliced (optional)

steps.0: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees.
steps.1: Line a small baking pan with foil.
steps.2: Cut feta as you would cut a loaf of bread into four equal slices. Place slices facedown on foil-covered sheet pan. Cover with olive oil.
steps.3: Bake for eight minutes, or until the cheese is soft to the touch (but not melted). Remove from oven.
steps.4: Preheat the broiler.
steps.5: Heat the honey in the microwave until it is fluid enough to spread with a pastry brush. Remove honey from microwave and spread generously over feta slices.
steps.6: Place honey-covered feta in broiler for about two minutes. Keep a close eye on it and remove from broiler once the top of the cheese browns and begins to bubble.
steps.7: Serve with flatbread, tomatoes, and thyme. Enjoy!

84.title: Jason's Cheesy Mashed Potatoes
84.description: It's one thing to heat up Trader Joe's Frozen Mashed Potatoes and serve them as-is, but it's another thing entirely to doctor them up with cheese, garlic butter, & cream. This indulgent recipe from one of our Southern California Store Captains might just be the very definition of "leveling up."

ingredients.0: 2 bags Trader Joe's Frozen Mashed Potatoes
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Shredded Swiss Cheese & Gruyere Cheese Blend
ingredients.3: 1 container TJ's Roasted Garlic & Herb Butter Spread

parsed_ing.2: Shredded Swiss Cheese & Gruyere Cheese Blend

steps.0: Empty both packages of potatoes into a large pot. Stirring frequently, warm over medium heat for about 5 minutes or until the potato medallions start to break apart. Add butter, cheese, and heavy cream and stir until evenly mixed. Continue to cook for about 15 minutes or until all cheese and butter have melted and mixture is warmed throughout.
steps.1: Serve immediately and enjoy!
steps.2: Recipe Credit: Captain Jason at store #171 in Pasadena, CA

85.title: Cheesy Truffle Snack Mix
85.description: Trader Joe's Oven Baked Cheese Bites with Black Summer Truffle pack a real punch of truffle flavor, making them a real treat for true truffle fanatics. In addition to making a great snack, their tangy, cheesy, truffle-y crunch makes them an exceptional addition to this snack mix recipe.

ingredients.0: 2 packages TJ's Oven Baked Cheese Bites with Black Summer Truffle (seasonal) or TJ's Oven Baked Cheese Bites
ingredients.1: 2 cups TJ's Organic Popcorn with Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.2: 1 cup TJ's Dry Roasted Unsalted Almonds
