steps.1: Serving ideas: drizzled over a steak, gorgonzola and arugula salad, spoon over grilled salmon or bruschetta.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Baguette, cut into 1/4 inch slices
ingredients.1: 3 large TJ's Fresh Mozzarella Balls, cut into 1/4 inch slices or 5 slices of TJ's Pre-Sliced Fresh Mozzarella, cut in half
ingredients.4: 8 grinds TJ's South African Smoke Seasoning (Seasonal)
ingredients.6: 6 TJ's Premium and Peeled Garlic Cloves

steps.0: To make the chimichurri sauce: Combine 2 tablespoons vinegar, 8 grinds South African seasoning, 2 teaspoons oregano, 6 garlic cloves and 4 tablespoons of EVOO in a blender or food processor. Pulse until garlic minces to desired consistency. Add cilantro and parsley and pulse a few more times until desired consistency. Pour mixture into a bowl and stir in reserved 6 tablespoons of EVOO. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of sauce. Set aside.
steps.1: To prepare toasts: Brush olive oil on one side of each bread slice then grill face down until golden grill marks appear. Alternatively you can place them on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 minutes until they are crisp and browned. Place mozzarella slices on top each toast then spoon chimichurri sauce over the cheese. Serve. Makes about 20 toasts.

ingredients.0: 1 Tablespoon TJ's California EVOO
ingredients.1: 1/2 bag TJ's Organic Tuscan Kale, chopped fine
ingredients.3: 1 cup quartered TJ's Baby Heirloom Tomatoes
ingredients.7: 3 teaspoons TJ's Dijon Mustard with White Wine
ingredients.9: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.10: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: To make the vinaigrette: In a small bowl, whisk together shallot, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, honey then season with salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette. Set aside.
steps.1: In a medium pan on medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Add chopped kale and sauté until wilted, about 3 minutes. Add bag of cooked lentils and stir until heated through, about 3 more minutes. Remove from heat and place into a large bowl. Add quartered tomatoes then gently fold in 1/4 cup of vinaigrette. Taste and add more vinaigrette if needed. This dish is best served warm, but it can also be prepared a day in advance and served cold.

ingredients.0: 1 small TJ's Shallot, minced
ingredients.3: 3 teaspoons TJ's Dijon Mustard with White Wine
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.6: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: In a small bowl, whisk together shallot, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, honey then season with salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette.
steps.1: Serving suggestions: mix with warmed lentils, wilted kale and tomatoes, drizzle over grilled asparagus, or dress a baby spinach salad (with pistachios, beets, goat cheese and red onion).

ingredients.0: 6 slices TJ's Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon

steps.0: In a large frying pan on medium heat, cook 6 slices of bacon. Set cooked bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate. Discard all but 1 tablespoon of oil from the pan. Add bag of frozen mashed potato medallions and 1/3 cup of water. Cook over moderate heat, stirring frequently. After about 5 minutes, once potatoes begin to soften, add 1/2 bag cruciferous crunch and 2 additional tablespoons of water. Stir then cover to trap steam. Cook for another 2-3 minutes or so, stirring every so often, until greens soften a bit. Chop cooled bacon into small pieces then add to pan of potatoes. Serve right away with a pat of butter on top.

159.title: Fried Ravioli with Creamy Marinara
159.description: Transform any TJ's fresh ravioli into a snack or appetizer. With a crunchy, golden, breadcrumb crust and an ooey gooey cheesy center, they're perfect for dipping into a bowl of hot marinara.

ingredients.0: 1 (32 oz) container TJ's Canola Oil
ingredients.1: 2 pkgs TJ's Fresh Ravioli (we used our Beef Bolognese variety)
ingredients.6: 1 tsp TJ's Ground Black Pepper, divided
ingredients.8: 1/2 jar TJ's Creamy Tomato Basil Pasta Sauce
ingredients.9: 1/4 cup freshly grated TJ's Parmesan Cheese

steps.0: In a deep frying pan or pot, empty the container of canola oil. Save the container for easy disposal. Heat the oil on medium-high heat until it reaches 340-360 degrees on a deep-fry thermometer or until a pinch of breadcrumbs drops down the middle of the oil and quickly bobs to the top, turning golden brown.
steps.1: Set up three dipping stations. In the first dish, whisk 5 eggs with 1/2 cup of milk. In a second dish, mix 2 cups of flour and ½ teaspoon each of salt and pepper. In a third dish, mix 2 cups of breadcrumbs with 1/2 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.
steps.2: Dip each ravioli into the eggwash, first one side and then the other. Shake to remove excess. Next, dip the ravioli into the flour, coating all sides evenly then dip into the eggwash again. Finally, coat the ravioli in breadcrumbs. Set aside on a plate.
steps.3: Begin heating 1/2 jar of pasta sauce in a small saucepan on low heat.
steps.4: Using a slotted spoon, gently fry 3-4 breaded ravioli at a time. Depending on the temperature of your oil, fry for about 1-2 minutes per side until golden brown. Transfer ravioli to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain.
steps.5: To serve, place marinara in a bowl and arrange fried ravioli on a plate. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley and enjoy right away.
steps.6: To dispose canola oil, wait until oil cools completely, drain back into the bottle over a trash can. Do not put oil down kitchen sink.

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Frozen Meatballs (we used the Turkey variety)
ingredients.1: 1 bottle TJ's Organic Sriracha and Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce

parsed_ing.1: Organic Sriracha and Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce

corrected_ing.1: Organic Sriracha and Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce

steps.0: Empty meatball in a large microwave safe bowl. Cover with a lid or plate. Microwave for 4 minutes.
steps.1: Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, begin heating entire jar of Sriracha BBQ sauce on low, stirring occasionally.
steps.2: Remove bowl of meatballs from microwave. Bowl will be hot, handle carefully. Add meatballs to saucepan and stir, coating meatballs on all sides with sauce. Continue to heat on low, about 3 minutes until bubbly.
steps.3: Empty meatballs and sauce into a serving bowl. Garnish with chives and serve with toothpicks.

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Gluten Free Breaded Chicken Breast Nuggets
ingredients.3: 1 box TJ's Gluten Free Toaster Waffles

parsed_ing.0: Gluten Free Breaded Chicken Breast Nuggets

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425° F. Spread frozen nuggets in a single layer on a baking sheet. Place on center rack of oven and begin baking for 10 minutes.
steps.1: Meanwhile, for extra color, heat and crunch, trim the top off of 2 jalapenos. Using a sharp paring knife, core the inside of the pepper to remove seeds. Dispose the seeds. Slice the peppers in half lengthwise then slice into long thin strips. Slice across the strips for a small dice. Set aside.
steps.2: Remove nugget tray from oven, flip nuggets and return to oven to cook an additional 10 minutes or to an internal temperature of 175°F to 180°F.
steps.3: In a small saucepan, add entire bottle of chili sauce. Heat on low, stirring occasionally about 2-3 minutes or until warmed. Remove pan from heat and set aside.
steps.4: While the chicken nuggets are finishing up cooking, place waffles directly onto the oven rack and heat for 2-3 minutes or until hot, crispy and golden brown.
steps.5: Remove chicken and waffles from oven and let stand 1 minute. Slice the waffles into quarters, and begin assembling. Place one nugget on top of one waffle wedge, then spoon warmed chili sauce over the top of the chicken. Sprinkle with diced jalapeno then top with another waffle wedge. Secure with toothpicks if desired. Place finished sandwich bites onto a platter and serve!

162.title: Hot & Spicy Wings with Chunky Blue Cheese

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Hot & Spicy Chicken Wings Sections
ingredients.1: 1 cup (about 12) TJ's Organic Cut and Peeled Carrots
ingredients.3: 1/3 cup TJ's Chunky Blue Cheese Dressing & Dip
ingredients.4: A handful of TJ's Parsley (optional garnish)

steps.0: Place wings in a circle (leave space in the center) on a microwave safe plate. Microwave uncovered on high: FROZEN wings 7 to 9 minutes – THAWED wings 4 to 5 minutes or until heated through. Plate will be hot, remove carefully.
steps.1: While wings are heating, rinse celery stalks, trim both ends and cut into thirds.
steps.2: Once wings have cooled for a minute, arrange them on a platter, over a bed of parsley. Serve with a bowl of blue cheese dressing, celery sticks and carrots.

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Sweet Potatoes
ingredients.1: 1 Tbsp TJ's 100% Greek Kalamata Olive Oil
ingredients.5: 1/2 cup TJ's Roasted and Salted Pecans, chopped

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F. Wash potatoes and pat dry. Rub olive oil over the skins then place potatoes directly on center rack of oven.
steps.1: Bake potatoes for 45 minutes or until a fork easily pierces the skin. Remove from oven and slice down the center, halfway through, making sure not cut all the way through to the bottom.
steps.2: In a medium bowl, combine arugula, sliced beets, blue cheese and salted pecans. Toss the salad gently with tongs, then divide evenly among sweet potatoes. Garnish with balsamic glaze. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1 pkg TJ's Red & White Belgian Endives
ingredients.1: 1 log TJ's Cranberry Chevre (seasonal), softened to room temperature

steps.0: Separate whole endive leaves from the base, rinse and pat dry. Spread cheese evenly on the individual endive leaves, then sprinkle with sliced almonds for garnish and a little crunch.

ingredients.0: 1 Bag or 18 oz. TJ's Frozen Mashed Sweet Potatoes (seasonal), defrosted
ingredients.5: 6 slices TJ's Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked and crumbled
ingredients.6: 4.5 cups TJ's Buttermilk Pancake & All-Purpose Baking Mix

steps.0: Preheat oven to 450°F. Mix honey and butter together and set aside. Place sweet potatoes in a large bowl and mix with nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla; taste and adjust seasoning. Add the bacon and baking mix and blend well. Add butter and milk to the mixture, stirring until soft dough forms. If dough is too sticky add more baking mix a little at a time until dough is soft, but no longer sticky.
steps.1: Flour a work surface and place the dough onto the surface. Dust the top of the dough and your hands with flour, and press the dough into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle. Sprinkle a small amount of additional flour on the top of the dough. Fold the dough over onto itself as if folding a napkin (also called a tri-fold). If necessary use a metal spatula to lift the dough off the counter and dust under it with flour, turn the dough 1/2 turn, dust the top with flour and roll the dough into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle and repeat the tri-fold. Repeat this procedure one more time (three times in all). After the third turn and tri-fold, dust under and on top of the dough, if needed, and roll the dough into a 1/2-inch-thick rectangle.
steps.2: Dip a 1.5 inch round cookie cutter in flour and cut out the biscuits; dip the cutter in flour between each biscuit. Press straight down to cut and lift straight up to remove; transfer the biscuits to a baking sheet; place biscuits about 1/2 inch apart.
steps.3: Gently gather the scraps of dough left after cutting, pat and roll out once more; cut as many biscuits from the remaining dough as possible, then hand shape any remaining dough. Bake on center rack of oven for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Let stand 3 minutes. Serve warm with honey butter.
steps.4: Biscuits are bite-sized, 1 serving is 3 biscuits. Makes 3 to 4 dozen.

166.title: MoJoe Toast
166.description: A simple, TJ's version of the popular avocado toast sensation in restaurants and cafes everywhere. We've added the kick of Sardines in Harissa for extra protein boost and flavor.

ingredients.0: 2 small (1 oz) slices TJ's Multigrain Bread, toasted

steps.0: Mash 1/4 of an avocado with a fork on one slice of toasted bread. Lay half (2oz) of the tin of sardines over the avocado, then drizzle a bit of the extra oil on top. Garnish with microgreens, cilantro or arugula if desired. Repeat on other slice of toast. Enjoy!

167.title: Stuffed Vine Tomatoes with Cheesy Hats

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Tomatoes on the Vine

steps.0: Pre-heat oven to 400°F. Slice tomatoes in half, and scoop out insides; set aside. Sprinkle cut sides with a small amount of salt and place over a rack, cut side down, to drain.
steps.1: Heat skillet over medium-high heat; add oil; swirl. Add sausage and begin to brown. Separate out as many tomato seeds as possible and discard. Chop tomato insides. Add to sausage pan along with onions and garlic and sauté for one minute. Add mushrooms and sauté 2 to 3 minutes longer. Add rice; sauté until all ingredients are cooked tender; about an additional 3 or 4 minutes. Deglaze pan with white wine and cook off excess. Add pepper, taste and adjust seasoning.
steps.2: Stuff tomato bottoms with rice mixture; top with cheese and a sliced mushroom. Stuff tomato tops with cheese. Place all in a small enough pan to keep them as upright as possible and into oven to bake until cheese is melted, golden and bubbly. About 10 to 15 minutes. Serve each tomato bottom with a cheesy top.

ingredients.0: 1 large head TJ's Iceberg Lettuce, cut into several wedges

ingredients.3: 2 TJ's Green Onions, white and green parts sliced thin

ingredients.5: 1 cup cooked and crumbled TJ's Uncured Black Forest Bacon

steps.0: Mix half of the blue cheese with the ranch dressing. Set aside. Place wedges of lettuce on a large serving dish. Pour dressing over saald and top with tomatoes, green onions, remaining cheese, and crumbled bacon. Serve family style.

ingredients.0: 1/3 cup diced TJ's Red Onion
ingredients.1: 2 tablespoons TJ's Unfiltered Apple Cider Vinegar

ingredients.6: TJ's Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: In a small bowl, combine diced red onion, vinegar and sugar; set aside to "quick-pickle" the onions for a few minutes.
steps.1: Drain the onions, reserving vinegar solution for the dressing. In a medium bowl, combine the shredded cabbage, raisins, and onions; set aside.
steps.2: Add mayonnaise, salt and pepper to the "quick-pickle" vinegar solution and stir until well incorporated. Gently toss the dressing with the cabbage mixture, then cover and chill. Fold in diced peaches just before serving.

ingredients.0: 3 large TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves
ingredients.4: 1 tsp TJ's Lemon juice, more to taste
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.6: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Add garlic to a small saucepan, cover by 1/2 inch with cold water, place over medium flame and poach until water comes to a boil. As soon as the water boils, remove from heat, steep for one minute, drain and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking. Let garlic cool completely. Add the garlic, mayonnaise, olive oil, smoked paprika, and lemon juice to a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Do not over mix. Taste and adjust lemon if desired and then add salt, and pepper to taste. Refrigerate to help marry flavors.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Globe Artichokes (4 count - Seasonal)
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves
ingredients.3: 2 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

parsed_ing.3: Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F. Trim half an inch off the top of each artichoke, and cut in half lengthwise, being mindful of the spines. Using a sharp pairing knife, cut out the non-edible purple leaves and the hairy fibers in the center, forming a pocket.
steps.1: Working in batches, place artichokes, leaf-side down, in a shallow bowl and squeeze half a lemon over the outside and inside of each artichoke, then place one or two garlic cloves in the center pocket. Drizzle the inside of each with half a tablespoon of olive oil and sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper. Tightly wrap each artichoke half in large, individual foil pieces.
steps.2: Arrange foil-wrapped artichokes in a large baking dish. Bake for 45 minutes until tender. Once cool enough to handle, being mindful of the steam, remove artichokes from foil. Serve immediately with smoked aioli for dipping.

172.title: Grilled Romaine Hearts
172.description: Charred romaine hearts make an excellent foil for sweet, smoky pork belly and tangy balsamic vinaigrette.

ingredients.0: 1 pack TJ's Romaine Hearts, sliced in half lengthwise, rinsed and dried
ingredients.2: 6 oz TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly, diced
ingredients.3: 1/4 cup TJ's Crumbled Blue Cheese, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Add pork belly to a 12" non stick skillet over medium heat and brown until crisp on all sides and fat is rendered, about 5 or 6 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel and set aside to cool.
steps.1: Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high. Working in batches, place romaine halves cut-side down on grill, and cook until charred, turn once and continue to grill until slightly wilted, about 4 minutes.
steps.2: Transfer lettuce cut-side up to plates, and season with pepper; drizzle with dressing, and sprinkle with blue cheese and pork belly “croutons.” Serve right away.

ingredients.0: 1/2 tsp TJ's Sea Salt, more to taste
ingredients.5: 2 Tbsp TJ's Clarified Butter or TJ's 100% Canola Oil
ingredients.7: 2 cups TJ's Raw Shelled Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients.8: 1 1/2 Tbsp fresh TJ's Rosemary Leaves, roughly chopped

steps.0: Mix salt, paprika, cinnamon, cumin and cayenne together in a small bowl. Set aside. Warm butter (or oil) and sugar together in a large skillet over medium heat; add pumpkin seeds and spice mixture to pan and stir until sugar is melted and the seeds are fragrant, 5 to 6 minutes (add a lid when seeds start to pop). Remove from heat, add fresh rosemary and sprinkle on additional salt (if desired) and toss. Immediately spread seeds out on a parchment-lined baking sheet and cool completely before serving.

174.title: Carolina Gold Slaw
174.description: This cool, crunchy summer slaw pairs perfectly with BBQ chicken or grilled shrimp skewers.

ingredients.0: 2 bags TJ's Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots
ingredients.3: 4-5 Tbsp TJ's Carolina Gold BBQ Sauce (seasonal)
ingredients.4: 2 Tbsp TJ's Real Mayonnaise (or TJ's Greek Yogurt)

parsed_ing.0: Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots

corrected_ing.0: Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots

steps.0: To make the dressing, combine BBQ sauce and mayonnaise in a small bowl, mixing a few tablespoons at a time until you reach the desired flavor. Sprinkle dressing with salt and pepper. Combine the remaining ingredients in a medium bowl and toss with the dressing. Chill 30 minutes prior to serving.

ingredients.0: 2-3 TJ's Peaches
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJ's Apple Juice or TJ's Dixie Peach Juice

steps.0: To peel the peaches, blanch in boiling water for about 2 minutes then immediately transfer with a slotted spoon to a bowl of ice water. Once peaches have cooled a minute or two, gently slide the skins off with your fingertips. Cut peaches in half, remove pits then cut into quarters. To make the pickling brine, combine fruit juice, vinegar, honey, ginger and cinnamon in a medium sized nonreactive pot (any pot EXCEPT that made of aluminum, cast iron or copper). Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 3-5 minutes. To pickle the peaches, add peach segments and cook just until tender, about 3-5 minutes. Carefully remove peaches with a slotted spoon and transfer to a glass jar with a resealable lid. Let pickling mixture cool slightly and then pour over peaches. Seal with lid and store in the refrigerator. Ready to eat immediately, but will develop more flavor overnight. Each batch should keep for an additional week or two in the refrigerator. If any off flavors or smells develop, or if you notice fermentation, please discard. Pairing & Serving Suggestions: Perfect served alongside roasted chicken or ham, warmed and spooned over vanilla ice cream, or even pureed and mixed into a cocktail (try it with sparkling grape juice, prosecco or bourbon)...

176.title: Asian Inspired Philly Smoked Salmon Hors d'oeuvres

ingredients.0: 1 tub TJ's Whipped Cream Cheese
ingredients.3: 1 bag TJ's Savory Thin Rice Crackers
ingredients.4: 1 bunch TJ's Green Onions (green sections only)
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.6: You will also need 20 wooden toothpicks

steps.0: Using a clean dish cloth, wrap 10 to 15 Savory Thin Rice Crackers. Alternatively you can use a resealable plastic bag. Cover and smash into tiny pieces. Wash and clean green onions then cut into 2" sections. Lay one slice of smoked salmon on top of one slice of seaweed. Spread a thin layer of cream cheese on top of the salmon. Sprinkle with rice cracker bits and season with freshly cracked black pepper. Top with one green onion section. Roll into a tight roll with the seaweed side being on the outside and the cream cheese side on the inside. Keep the roll intact with a toothpick. Serve immediately as the rice crackers will get soggy if left out for too long. Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick Finalist - Shaun Wu.

177.title: FauxRench Onion Burger Sliders
177.description: Trader Joe's Caramelized Onion Dip is one of the smoothest, creamiest onion dips we've ever tasted-and believe us, we've tasted quite a few. That's probably due to the triple play of sour cream, cream cheese and mayo at its base. Pumping up the onion flavor are real, fresh, caramelized yellow and white onions, something we haven't encountered in other pre-made dips. What a difference!You'll find our crunchy Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips and tender Mini Meatballs countering that coveted creaminess in this slider recipe. While it's plenty to prep for a party, the recipe halves easily for a dinner of weeknight proportions as well.

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Arugula
ingredients.2: 2 cups crushed TJ's Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips
ingredients.4: 1 bag TJ's Party Size Mini Meatballs, thawed

parsed_ing.2: Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips

steps.0: Pre-heat oven to 350°F. You will be baking meatballs and biscuits in the oven at the same time. Place thawed mini meatballs on cookie sheet and bake in oven according to package directions.
steps.1: While the meatballs are baking, open the containers of biscuits, lay individual biscuits next to one another on a baking tray and lightly press them together while flattening to about 1/2" thickness. Using a cookie cutter with a 1 1/2" diameter, (an empty 6 oz. can of TJ's Tomato Paste does the job well) cut about 25 or 30 biscuit rounds. Remove excess dough and bake according to package directions for 14-16 minutes. Both the meatballs and slider biscuits should be finished at the same time. Take out of oven to slightly cool.
steps.2: While meatballs and biscuits are cooling, place half bag of potato chips into baggie and crush. You don't want them to be finely crushed; you want tiny chips to be evident in the spread. Spoon caramelized onion dip into a bowl and slowly fold in crushed chips until the chips are coated. You may not use all the chips.
steps.3: Cut each biscuit in half horizontally, forming a hamburger bun. On bottom half of bun place small dollop of onion/chip spread, then a mini meatball, one or two Arugula leaves and top with the other biscuit half. Place toothpick through slider, serve and enjoy!
steps.4: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 2nd Place Winner - Patricia Jensen

steps.0: Remove polenta from casing and slice lengthwise down the center, then slice each half into half-moon shapes about 1/2" thick. Remove
steps.1: sausage from packaging and slice each link on the diagonal at same thickness. Remove thawed shrimp from packaging and season with Trader Joe’s South African seasoning blend on each side.

Re-spray if necessary, and add sausage slices. When sausage is just starting to brown, add shrimp to the pan, and cook until opaque. Remove sausage and shrimp from pan.
steps.3: Thread polenta slices, cooked shrimp, and sausage slices onto skewers, alternating between each ingredient. Serve with sriracha sauce for dipping.
steps.4: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 3rd Place Winner - Laura Wehrmeyer.

Chop half of the package of feta into small crumbles, it should be about 1 cup. Add feta, cilantro, cayenne pepper and the juice of two limes, to the corn and stir. Add pepper to taste. Serve warm.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Sliced Halloumi Cheese (seasonal)

steps.0: Cook cheese according to package instructions, remove from pan and cut each slice in half. Slice the watermelon spears into thirds. Assemble 6-8 wooden skewers as follows… Cheese, watermelon, fig, basil. Repeat. Drizzle balsamic glaze over each stick and enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1/4 cup TJ's Unbleached All-Purpose Flour

steps.0: Remove dough from package and let rest on a floured work surface for 10-15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425°F. Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray, or line with parchment paper. In a small bowl, beat egg with water. Set aside. Roll dough into a large rectangle. Cut dough lengthwise into 4 strips with a pizza cutter. Spread cheese along one edge of a dough strip. Lightly brush the other edge of the strip with egg wash, then stretch the dough over the filling and roll until dough is closed. Repeat for remaining strips. Transfer rolls to baking sheet, seam side down. To make the pretzel shape, form each roll into a "U", twist the ends twice around one another, then overlap the ends over the bottom of the "U". Generously brush the egg mixture over the top of the shaped pretzel and underneath where the dough overlaps. Bake 18 to 20 minutes, until the tops of pretzels turn golden brown.

187.title: Mango Black Bean Quinoa
187.description: Serve it as a salad; serve it with a salad. Mango Black Bean Quinoa is vibrant and versatile. Delectable with shrimp, white fish, or steak – it's perfect for cookouts and picnics.

ingredients.0: 3 cups TJ's Tri Color Quinoa, cooked
ingredients.1: 1 can TJ's Organic Black Beans, drained and rinsed
ingredients.2: 1 cup TJ's Mango, peeled, pitted (or defrosted from frozen) & cut into bite size pieces
ingredients.6: 1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil
ingredients.7: Juice of 1 TJ's Lime & 1/2 teaspoon of zest
ingredients.8: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.9: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

parsed_ing.6: Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil

steps.0: In a large bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, mango, bell pepper, green onions and cilantro.  In a separate smaller bowl, whisk olive oil, lime zest and lime juice. Drizzle over quinoa salad and toss to distribute evenly. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill and serve.

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Dried Cranberries
ingredients.5: 2 packages TJ's Peeled & Cooked Chestnuts, coarsely chopped
ingredients.6: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F. Combine cranberries with one cup of turkey broth and set aside. Add butter to skillet and melt. Add veggies and sauté until soft; about 10 to 15 minutes. Place bread cubes from stuffing mix in medium-large bowl. Add cooked veggies to bowl; add broth with cranberries; add chopped chestnuts and mix well. Add additional broth, one cup at a time, and continue to mix until all bread is moist. Season with pepper. Add contents of seasoning packet, to taste, and mix until well combined. Place in a 9" x 13" (approx. 4 qt.) casserole dish and bake for 35 to 45 minutes.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Brussels Sprouts Stalk (Seasonal)
ingredients.1: 3/4 cup of your favorite TJ's Maple Syrup
ingredients.2: 1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.5: TJ's Dried Cranberries or TJ's Fresh Pomegranate Seeds, for garnish

parsed_ing.2: Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F. Trim the stalk down to the fullest, best looking part. Trim sprouts off one side to make a flat bottom. Trim any "tough" leaves from the sprouts. Rinse stalk and trimmed sprouts well in fresh water. Wrap damp stalk in cling wrap and heat in the microwave for 4-5 minutes. Place the trimmed loose sprouts in a bowl, cover with cling wrap and microwave for 3 minutes.
steps.1: Whisk maple syrup and olive oil together. Place stalk flat side down along with any loose sprouts on a roasting pan and pour the maple syrup mixture over. Use a pastry brush to mop the maple syrup onto all sides of the sprouts and stalk. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper.
steps.2: Place pan in oven and roast for 45 minutes, or until sprouts on stalk are fork-tender and caramelized to a golden color.
steps.3: To serve: Place stalk on a holiday platter, pour any syrup from roasting pan over and garnish with something bright and tart such as dried cranberries or fresh pomegranate seeds.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Hard Cooked Eggs
ingredients.2: 2 strips of TJ's Grilled Chicken Breast Strips, diced
ingredients.4: 4 pieces TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, crumbled

steps.0: Slice eggs in half lengthwise and scoop yolks into a bowl. Mash yolks and stir in guacamole and diced chicken. Spoon yolk mixture into egg halves. Layer lettuce leaves on a platter and arrange stuffed eggs on top. Sprinkle diced grape tomatoes and crumbled bacon on top of eggs. Serve chilled.

ingredients.0: 3 cups TJ's Unbleached All-Purpose Flour, sifted

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375°F (350°F if using a glass pan). Grease an 8-inch square baking pan, set aside.
steps.1: Mix (by hand) all dry ingredients together in one bowl, egg and milk in another bowl. Mix wet and dry together, then add butter. Pour into prepared baking pan and sprinkle a bit of sugar on top of dough.
steps.2: Bake on center rack of oven for 45-60 minutes. Let cool... if you can. Enjoy!

192.title: Teeny Tiny Potatoes with Sweet Roasted Garlic

ingredients.0: 1/2 pound TJ's Teeny Tiny Potatoes
ingredients.1: 2 cloves TJ's Peeled Garlic (or more, if you like)
ingredients.2: 4 tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Preheat oven to 325°. Wrap garlic in a piece of foil with 1 tbsp of olive oil and roast in the oven until soft; about 30 minutes. At the same time, place potatoes on a baking sheet and into the oven - bake until tender, about 30 minutes. Remove garlic from oven, mash and mix with remainder of olive oil; place in a mixing dish and set aside. Remove potatoes from oven and add to bowl and gently toss with mashed garlic mixture. Toss salt and pepper over potatoes to taste. Serve immediately. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Organic Basil, cut into strips
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Rinse Tomatoes and Basil. Layer Tomato, Basil and Mozzarella on a toothpick. Season with Salt & Pepper. Serve with Balsamic Vinaigrette for dipping.

194.title: Orange Lime Mojito Mocktail
194.description: Remember that one big-brand orange juice commercial from back in the day? You know, the one where the lady sticks a straw straight into an orange and starts sipping? Well, our single-serve Cold Pressed Orange Juice actually tastes like it came straight from an orange. Because it did. And it only gets better once you make the base of this magnificent, minty-lime mocktail - which can, of course, morph into a cocktail with but a single drop of rum, vodka, gin, etc....

ingredients.0: 3 large TJ's Mint Leaves
ingredients.2: 3/4 cup TJ's Organic Cold Pressed Orange Juice

steps.0: Place mint leaves and lime wedges in the bottom of a large, sturdy drinking glass. Use a muddler (or the back of a spoon) to crush the mint and lime wedges to release the mint oils and lime juice.
steps.1: Add ice if desired.
steps.2: Pour mineral water and orange juice on top of the crushed mint leave and lime wedges.
steps.3: Stir together and enjoy!

195.title: Peachy-Peach Bellini
195.description: Coming to Trader Joe's from a family-owned German winery, this bubbly beverage is just peachy, and if you add some peach puree, it's just Peachy-Peach! Its lower alcohol content (8% ABV) begs for a brunchy application, but lest you get the wrong impression, it also sparkles with apps or dessert... Pretty much anytime is fine for this sweet, celebratory wine.

ingredients.0: 1 bottle Secco Peach Bellini
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJ's Frozen Freestone Peach Slices

steps.0: In a blender, blend peaches slightly to make a chunky puree.
steps.1: Spoon about a tablespoon of puree into the bottom of a champagne flute. Poor Bellini over puree. \
steps.2: Top with mint leaves and enjoy!

196.title: Gingerosa
196.description: Our Triple Ginger Brew might be seasonal, but you can make this marvelous mocktail all year long! Simply swap the Triple for our everyday (equally delicious) offering, and you're in business. Looking for something a stronger? Spike your Gingerosa with a splash of vodka. No cranberries in sight? No problem! Use blueberries instead. (See? We're all about problem-solving...)

ingredients.0: 1 bottle TJs Triple Ginger Brew (seasonal) OR 4 bottles TJ's Brewed Ginger Beer
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJ's 100% Pure Florida Orange Juice (No Pulp)
ingredients.2: 1/4 cup TJ's Organic Sugar (for rim of glass)
ingredients.3: 1 TJ's Navel Orange, zested (for rim of glass)
ingredients.4: 1 bag TJ's Organic Whole Fresh Cranberries (seasonal; optional), rinsed & frozen ahead of time

steps.0: Combine Ginger Brew and Orange Juice in a large pitcher.
steps.1: To sugar the rims of your glasses: pour a splash of your liquid mixture onto a small plate. Combine orange zest and sugar on another small plate. Turn glasses upside down. One by one, dip each glass in the liquid mixture-submerging just the rim-then place it on the plate holding the sugar & zest mixture. Rotate glass until rim is sufficiently sugared.
steps.2: Pour the rest of the beverage into the sugared glasses carefully, so as not to rinse off the rim! For garnish, add as many frozen cranberries as you'd like... And if you add a splash of vodka or bourbon, we won't tell.

197.title: Coconut White Hot Chocolate
197.description: Trader Joe's White Chocolate Baking Chips have all the smooth sweetness you would expect in White Chocolate. While these Chips are perfect for adding some yummy flavor to chocolate chip cookies, we've used them in this innovative hot chocolate recipe. When the creaminess of the coconut milk combines with the festive flavors of cinnamon, vanilla, and White Chocolate, it creates a drink that will warm you up, especially when it's cold outside.

ingredients.0: 2 cans TJ's Organic Coconut Milk

steps.0: Pour coconut milk into medium-size saucepan and heat over medium-low heat. Add white chocolate chips and stir until melted and hot, but not boiling.
steps.1: Remove from heat, mix in vanilla and cinnamon. Pour into mugs and garnish with whipped cream or shredded coconut, if desired. Serve and enjoy.

198.title: Oat Beverage Matcha Latte
198.description: A creamy, non-dairy matcha latte is easy to enjoy anytime and won't cost you more than 5 minutes of your time - enter Trader Joe's Matcha Green Tea Single-Serve Packets and Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Oat Beverage.  Just a few steps below yields a rich, smooth, slightly earthy & sweet cup. Enjoy hot or cold!

ingredients.0: 1/4 cup hot water
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Matcha Green Tea Single-Serve Packages

steps.0: Empty matcha powder package in hot water and whisk until dissolved.
steps.1: Add oat beverage and whisk until combined. Serve and enjoy immediately.

199.title: Pumpkin Pie Spiced Mule
199.description: A spin on a perennially popular TJ's holiday fave, Trader Joe's Pumpkin Pie Spiced Ginger Brew is a new, non-alcoholic beverage that's bound to resonate with ginger lovers and pumpkin-product aficionados alike. Our brewer blends a fizzy, mulled apple cider-like base with a generous amount of ginger puree & plenty of pumpkin pie spices (cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, allspice, & clove), then adds a few natural flavors & a bit of cane sugar, and-voila!-you've got Brew. In this recipe, we've paired this bubbly beverage with Trader Joe's & The Art of the Still Organic Vodka for a fall-inspired twist on the classic mule cocktail.

ingredients.0: 2 parts TJ's Pumpkin Pie Spiced Ginger Brew (seasonal)
ingredients.1: 1 part TJ's The Art of the Still Organic Vodka
ingredients.2: TJ's Pumpkin Pie Spice, for garnish (optional)
ingredients.3: TJ's Fresh Ginger, thinly sliced, for garnish (optional)

parsed_ing.1: The Art of the Still Organic Vodka

steps.0: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice. Add ginger brew and vodka and stir. Take a sip, adding more ginger brew or vodka to taste. Garnish with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice and ginger, and enjoy.

200.title: Oatmeal Date Breakfast Shake
200.description: Trader Joe's Simply Almond Beverage is made from just two ingredients: almonds and water. Here we've added just three other ingredients to turn it into a hearty breakfast shake: dates for sweetness, hemp seeds for a crunch, and rolled oats to fill you up when you're on the go!

ingredients.0: 3 TJ's Fancy Medjool Dates, pitted
ingredients.1: 1/4 cup TJ's Gluten Free Rolled Oats
ingredients.3: 3 Tablespoons TJ's Raw Shelled Hemp Seed, plus more for garnish

steps.0: Add dates and rolled oats to a small bowl and cover with 1/2 cup of hot water for 1 minute to soften. Drain.
steps.1: Add softened dates and oats, almond beverage, and hemp seed to a blender and pulse until smooth.
steps.2: Pour into a glass and garnish with extra hemp seed. Enjoy!

201.title: Green Juice Smoothie
201.description: It's not always easy to get your greens, especially when you're on the go or in a hurry. As vital as verdant veggies like kale and spinach are to a healthy diet, they can be easy to overlook in your day-to-day eating. That's why we recommend getting them in your day-to-day hydrating, in the form of Trader Joe's Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage-a delicious and refreshing blend of leafy greens, veggies, and zesty citrus fruit. As brilliantly green as it is brilliantly concocted, each serving (about eight fl. ounces) of this Green Juice Beverage contains the following: one cucumber, two stalks of celery, a quarter of a grapefruit, a quarter of a head of lettuce, one kale leaf, four spinach leaves, six sprigs of parsley, a teaspoon of mint tea, and a bit of lemon. In other words, there's close an entire garden's worth of veggies, cold pressed and ready to drink inside each bottle - and an organic garden, at that! Sip it plain, or use it to give your morning smoothies a boost of fresh, vegetal flavor.

ingredients.0: 8 fl. oz. TJ's Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage
ingredients.1: 1 heaping cup TJ's Frozen Pineapple Tidbits
ingredients.2: 4 tablespoons TJ's Oven Toasted Old Fashioned Organic Oats

parsed_ing.0: Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage
parsed_ing.2: Oven Toasted Old Fashioned Organic Oats

corrected_ing.0: Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage

steps.0: Add all ingredients to a blender. Cover and blend on high until thoroughly combined. Pour into a glass and enjoy!

202.title: Spiked Watermelon Sparkler
202.description: Nothing calls upon a summer's day quite like a ripe, juicy watermelon, and Trader Joe's Sparkling Watermelon Juice is like a summer's day in a can!Made with fresh, not-from-concentrate watermelon juice, plenty of bubbles, and zero grams of added sugar, Trader Joe's Sparkling Watermelon Juice is the sweet and sparkling beverage of your warm-weather dreams. Enjoy it chilled, straight from the can, or add it to a cocktail, garnished with fresh watermelon and a sprig of mint. The sun is shining, and the sky is the limit!

ingredients.0: 1/2 cup (6-8 cubes) TJ's Watermelon, plus a few more cubes for garnish

steps.0: Muddle watermelon and a few mint leaves in a 2-cup measuring glass. Divide mixture among 2 old fashioned glasses. Fill the glasses with ice. Divide vodka among glasses, top up with sparkling watermelon juice, and stir just until combined. Garnish with a watermelon cube, more fresh mint, and a squeeze of lime. Cheers!

203.title: Cocoa Crunch Milkshake
203.description: Each bite of Trader Joe's Gluten Free Cocoa Crunch Cereal is perfectly chocolatey, splendidly sweet (without being altogether too sugary) with an easy, airy texture and just a faint hit of rice flour nuttiness. There's a lot to love here, but our personal favorite thing about it is how it turns a whole bowl of milk (or non-dairy alternative) rich and chocolatey. Because pouring a bowl of cereal doesn't require a recipe, we've gone the dessert route here and paired it with two of our most chocolatey standbys: Trader Joe's Ultra Chocolate Ice Cream and Trader Joe's Midnight Moo Chocolate Flavored Syrup. Break out the blender and give it a whirl!

ingredients.0: TJ's Midnight Moo Chocolate Flavored Syrup
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJ's Gluten Free Cocoa Crunch Cereal, plus more for garnish
ingredients.2: 1 cup TJ's Whole Milk or TJ's Chocolate Whole Milk made with Fair Trade Cocoa

steps.0: Coat the inside of two tall glasses with a few drizzles of chocolate syrup. Place in the freezer to chill.
steps.1: Place cereal and milk in a bowl; refrigerate for 15 minutes to infuse. Add cereal and milk to a blender pitcher, along with 4 heaping scoops of ice cream. Blend until ingredients are fully incorporated.
steps.2: Remove glasses from freezer and divide milkshake evenly among glasses. Garnish with chipped cream, chocolate syrup and cereal. Enjoy immediately.

204.title: Joe's Bloody Mary
204.description: With tangy tomato puree, briny clam juice, and a savory spice blend, Trader Joe's Bloody Mary Mixer stands up to any homemade version. Simply add vodka, ice, and garnish with abandon to recreate this classic brunch beverage.

ingredients.0: TJ's Chile Lime Seasoning Blend
ingredients.2: 1 1/4 ounce TJ's Vodka Of The Gods
ingredients.4: 1 TJ's Celery Stalk, rinsed and trimmed
ingredients.5: TJ's Colossal Olives Hand Stuffed With Garlic Cloves, plus one tablespoon brine from jar (optional)

parsed_ing.5: Colossal Olives Hand Stuffed With Garlic Cloves

steps.0: Spread a thin layer of chile lime seasoning on a shallow dish or clean cutting board. Rub a slice of lemon around the rim of a glass. Place rim of glass in seasoning and twist and turn to coat.
steps.1: Fill the chile-rimmed glass with ice. Add bloody mary mixer, vodka, and olive brine, if using. Stir and add more mixer or vodka to taste. Garnish with a celery stalk, a few stuffed olives, and sliced lemon. Cheers!

205.title: Lemony Gin Refresher
205.description: Year after year, Trader Joe's French Market Sparkling Lemonade comes up a winner. It makes sense-our supplier has been crafting lemonade in a small, French village for over 100 years now, and our sparkling version is crisp, tart, and totally refreshing. Plus, it's made with simple ingredients, like hand-crafted lemon syrup and water sourced from a natural spring inside the bottling room! For a backyard party beverage that's sure to please, look no further than this refreshing combination of sweet, sparkly lemonade and crisp, herbal Trader Joe's Preeminence Gin.

ingredients.0: 2 slices TJ's Cucumber, plus more for garnish
ingredients.1: 2 parts TJ's French Market Sparkling Lemonade

steps.0: Muddle 2 cucumber slices in the bottom of a rocks glass. Fill with crushed ice, lemonade and gin, and gently stir to combine. Garnish with rosemary and another cucumber slice, and serve.

206.title: Boatswain Chocolate Stout Float
206.description: With aromas of chocolate and coffee, assertive hopping, and sweet caramel malty flavors, our Boatswain Chocolate Stout is a natural pairing for velvety French Vanilla Ice Cream.

ingredients.0: 1 bottle Boatswain Chocolate Stout OR Campanology's Buche de Noel Stout
ingredients.2: Whipped Cream & chocolate chunks, for garnish (optional)

steps.0: Place two scoops of ice cream into a tall glass. Slowly pour stout into glass, covering scoops. Top with whipped cream and chocolate chunks. Repeat with remaining glasses and enjoy immediately.

207.title: Here We Come A-Wassailing
207.description: A sweetened blend of black currant, apple, and lemon juices, with cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, cardamom, ginger, and orange peel, Trader Joe's Winter Wassail is a fruit punch whose flavors and aromas evoke the holidays. You can serve it chilled, over ice with bourbon; or warmed, in a big mug, with a cinnamon stick garnish. It's also a merry mulling mixer with red wine, simmered on the stovetop and served steaming for holiday crowds of all sizes.

ingredients.0: 1 part TJ's Bourbon (we used TJ's High Rye Bourbon)
ingredients.3: Handful TJ's Frozen Raspberries, plus more for serving

steps.0: Prepare the ice ring (optional): line the bottom of a bundt pan with navel slices, raspberries and a few sprigs of rosemary. Fill pan halfway with water; freeze until solid.
steps.1: To serve: add bourbon and wassail to large punch bowl, stir briskly to combine. Remove bundt pan from freezer and let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes. Run bottom and sides of pan under hot water, until ice ring slides out. Flip ice ring over and gently place in punch bowl. Serve punch with frozen raspberries for garnish.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's Fresh Strawberries, roughly chopped, plus 2 whole strawberries for garnish

steps.0: Add chopped strawberries to a large measuring glass. Muddle or mash into a pulp with the back of a spoon. (For a spicy kick, muddle fresh cilantro and two slices of jalapeno with the strawberries.)
steps.1: Add ginger beer, tequila and lime juice and stir to combine.
steps.2: Fill two copper mugs with ice. Divide tequila mixture among mugs and top up with sparkling water. Garnish each mug with a fresh strawberry and serve.

209.title: Iced Chai Latte
209.description: Spiced Chai Latte Mix, a generous splash of Cold Brew, topped off with homemade vanilla chai whipped cream... Mmm... Does it get any better? Actually, yes! Plan ahead and make your own Cold Brew ice cubes.

ingredients.0: 6 tablespoons TJ's Spicy Chai Tea Latte Mix
ingredients.2: 1 cup TJ's Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate
ingredients.4: 2 teaspoons TJ's Spicy Chai Tea Latte Mix
ingredients.5: 1 teaspoon TJ's Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract

steps.0: To make whipped cream: in a large bowl, with a hand mixer or stand mixer combine: 1/2 cup heavy cream, 2 teaspoons Chai Mix and 1 teaspoon Bourbon Vanilla Extract. Whip until stiff peaks form, about 4 minutes. Set aside.
steps.1: To make chai iced latte: In a medium-sized pitcher, whisk together 6 tablespoons chai mix and 1/2 cup hot water until mix completely dissolves. Add 1 cup cold brew to pitcher and stir until combined. Serve chilled or pour over ice (we recommend making your own cold brew ice cubes), then top with reserved whipped cream.

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Unsweetened Original Almond Beverage or TJ's Unsweetened Almond, Cashew & Macadamia Nut Beverage
ingredients.2: 1 TJ's Organic Virgin Coconut Oil Packet
ingredients.3: 2 TJ's Steamed & Peeled Baby Beets, sliced

steps.0: Combine almond beverage, cherry juice, coconut oil, beets and Medjool dates in a blender and blend until smooth. Add strawberries and continue pulsing until well blended. Serve immediately.

ingredients.0: 1/2 bottle (32 ounces) TJ's Organic Lemonade
ingredients.2: 3 cups TJ's French Sparkling Limeade, chilled
ingredients.4: 3 cups TJ's Blanc de Blancs Sparkling wine (or TJ's Plain Sparkling Spring Water), chilled
ingredients.5: Sliced lemons and limes, for garnish (optional)

steps.0: Fill a large punch bowl with ice and set aside. Add lemonade and pineapple tidbits to a blender pitcher and blend until smooth. Pour blended mixture into punch bowl. Add limeade and cherry juice, stir to combine.
steps.1: Top off punch bowl with Blanc de Blancs immediately before serving. Garnish with lemon and lime slices, if desired.

212.title: Spiced Harvest Tea
212.description: Cozy up to this spiced cinnamon tea on a cool fall morning.

ingredients.0: 8 ounces TJ's Lemon Ginger Echinacea Juice Blend
ingredients.1: 1 bag TJ's Harvest Blend Herbal Tea (seasonal)

steps.0: Place one tea bag in a mug and set aside. Pour the juice blend in a small saucepan. Place saucepan on stove and heat over medium-high, just until boiling. Pour into mug and allow tea bag to steep for 3-5 minutes. Remove tea bag, allow to cool slightly and serve.

ingredients.0: 4 ounces TJ's Organic Lemonade, chilled

steps.0: Combine lemonade and Plznr in a tall glass and garnish with a lemon slice. Serve immediately.

214.title: Fall Sparkler
214.description: This nonalcoholic Sparkler combines favored fall flavors into one bright, bubbly, party-ready beverage.

ingredients.0: 8 ounces TJ's Sparkling Cranberry Juice

steps.0: Mix cranberry juice, ginger beer and apple cider in a large pitcher with ice. Pour into glasses, garnish with orange slices and serve.

215.title: Mangorita!
215.description: Bursting with mango sweetness, balanced by citrus tartness, and kicked up with Chile Lime Seasoning, this drink invites you to refresh, revitalize, and really, really revel in Mangorita! moments.

ingredients.0: 1 Tbsp TJ's Chile Lime Seasoning
ingredients.1: 2 TJ's Lime (1 for .5 oz juice, 1 for garnish & glass prep)
ingredients.2: 1 TJ's Mango, peeled, pitted & coarsely chopped

steps.0: Prepare the Glasses
steps.1: Place the chile lime seasoning in a shallow dish or spread in a small pile (shape depends on glass) on a clean cutting board. Rub a slice of lime around the rim of each glass. Turn glasses over and place directly in the pile seasoning; twist and turn it so the rim gets coated with seasoning.
steps.2: Blend the Mangorita:
steps.3: Place mango, 1 tablespoon lime juice, margarita mix, tequila and ice into a blender. Pulse several times until mixture is well blended and slushy.
steps.4: Pour into chile-lime rimmed glasses, garnish (optional), sip back and revel.

ingredients.0: 1 container TJ's Organic Lemonade, chilled

steps.0: Pour lemonade into serving pitcher and add frozen raspberries. Stir occasionally, allowing raspberries to defrost in lemonade for about 5 minutes. Pour into glasses and garnish with a lemon slice.

217.title: Coconut Water Smoothie
217.description: Refresh, rehydrate, and recharge with this coconut water-based smoothie, boasting sweet strawberries, bright pineapple, and tangy Trader Joe's Greek Yogurt.

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Coconut Water
ingredients.1: 1 cup (about 12) TJ's Organic Cut and Peeled Carrots

steps.0: Combine all ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth.

ingredients.0: 2 cups TJ's Premium Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients.1: 3/4 cup TJ's Egg Nog or Almond Nog (seasonal)

steps.0: In a blender, pulse together ice cream, egg nog, nutmeg, and ground cinnamon until smooth and uniform. Pour into a glass and top with a sprinkle of cinnamon. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or two. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1 Tbsp TJ's Sea Salt
ingredients.2: 1/2 cup TJ's Limeade (or TJ's Organic Jalapeno Limeade, if you enjoy a kick!)
ingredients.3: 3/4 cup (4 shots) TJ's Reposado Distinqt Tequila (optional)
ingredients.4: 2 cups TJ's Organic Frozen Mango Chunks

steps.0: Begin by rimming the glasses: Add salt to a small plate, then squeeze the juice of 1 lime onto a separate plate. Dip the rim of the drinking glasses into the lime juice, then dip into the salt. Set aside. Then, in a blender, add the juice from 4 Limes with the Orange Juice, Mango Chunks, Limeade and the Agave Sweetener. Pulse several times until liquefied, then add the Ice and pulse again. Pour into salt-rimmed glasses and garnish with lime slices.

ingredients.0: 4 scoops TJ's Cookie Butter Ice Cream or TJ's French Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients.1: 1 Tbsp TJ's Fleur de Sel Caramel Sauce

steps.0: In a blender, pulse together ice cream, caramel sauce, cookies, milk and ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream, Speculoos cookie crumbles and more caramel sauce.

221.title: Potato Pancakes with Asparagus & Poached Eggs
221.description: Perhaps best known for their shining role in Hanukkah (and sometimes Passover) festivities, Potato Pancakes, or latkes, are certainly something to celebrate. As a matter of fact, they're so delicious, we carry Trader Joe's Potato Pancakes in our freezers all year long!Potato Pancakes are might tasty when served with the traditional sour cream & apple sauce. Or even with ketchup, a la hash browns. Or smothered in cheese & chives. Or-as we found out here-served on a bed of lemony-garlic sauteed asparagus, beneath a perfectly poached egg.

ingredients.0: 1 bag (12oz) TJ's Asparagus, trimmed

steps.0: Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil.
steps.1: While water boils, heat oil in a large saute pan on medium heat. Add garlic, lemon juice, and asparagus to pan. Use tongs to saute until asparagus is cooked through, about 3 - 5 minutes. Remove pan from heat and set aside.
steps.2: Prepare latkes according to package instructions, set aside.
steps.3: Fill a pot with 3-4 inches of water and bring to a boil. Lower heat to simmer and add 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar.
steps.4: Crack an egg into a strainer to separate the yolk from the white (reserve egg whites for an omelet!) and gently pour the yolk into a small bowl. Stir the simmering water with a spoon to create a vortex in the pot. Carefully slide the egg into center of vortex and cook for 3 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to remove the cooked egg and set on a clean plate. Repeat poaching process with remaining eggs.
steps.5: Separate the asparagus onto 4 plates. Top each plate of asparagus with a potato pancake, then top each potato pancake with a poached egg. Add salt and pepper to taste.
steps.6: Enjoy.

222.title: Blarney Toast
222.description: Trader Joe's Blarney Scone is a super-dense, scone-shaped hunk of traditional Irish Soda Bread, made with real buttermilk and real butter and studded with raisins and caraway seeds throughout. It's sweet, but not too sweet, and tastes divine fried in a skillet and slathered with a bit of Kerrygold® Irish Butter and jam, or topped with slices of TJ's Corned Beef. Weighing in at nearly two pounds, it's a hefty hunk o' Scone, perfectly suitable for sharing.

ingredients.0: TJ's Sunflower Oil

steps.0: Using a large serrated knife, gently slice the scone into 6 thick slices; set aside. Pour enough sunflower oil to create a thin layer in the bottom of a skillet and heat over medium-high.
steps.1: When oil is hot, add two scone slices to the pan and fry 30-40 seconds per side, until browned. Transfer to a plate and repeat with remaining slices, adding more oil as necessary to coat the bottom of the pan.
steps.2: Generously slather scone slices with butter and marmalade, and enjoy immediately.

223.title: Easy As Crispy Corned Beef Hash

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Roasted Potatoes with Peppers & Onions
ingredients.1: 1 pound leftover cooked Corned Beef, cubed to potato size (seasonal)
ingredients.2: 2 Tbsp TJ's Pure Imported Olive Oil

parsed_ing.1: leftover cooked Corned Beef, cubed to potato size

steps.0: Heat olive oil and butter in a large heavy skillet over medium heat; crowd in the cubed corned beef and potatoes.
steps.1: Spread evenly in the pan and increase heat to high or medium high. Do not stir the potatoes and corned beef; let them brown until sizzling. Use a spatula to peek underneath to check browning. If there is too much sticking, add a little more oil to the pan. Continue to cook in this manner until the potatoes and the corned beef are browned and crispy on the bottom, about 8 minutes.
steps.2: Once browned, add water, then cover with a lid and steam until water evaporates (about 2 to 3 minutes). Remove from heat and serve topped with fried or poached eggs.

224.title: Berry Best Bran Muffins
224.description: A bowl of bran flakes for breakfast is a balanced, nutritious, and reliable choice, indeed. Fortunately, Trader Joe's Organic Bran Flakes are pretty darn tasty, too! But if a bowlful of bran sounds boring at best, try baking your bran instead, with this home-run recipe for the "Berry Best Bran Muffins" you ever did taste. What makes them the Berry Best? For starters, they're fluffy and moist as can be - no sawdust-y bricks of bran here. But really, it's the berries that elevate these Muffins to "Berry Best" status. (The fact that we shelved the sugar and used honey instead doesn't hurt, either...)

ingredients.0: TJ's Canola Oil Spray
ingredients.5: 1 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Bran Flakes, crushed
ingredients.11: 1 cup TJ's Wild Organic Frozen Blueberries
ingredients.12: 1 cup TJ's Organic Frozen Strawberries, cut in quarters

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Thoroughly coat two 12-count muffin tins. Set aside.
steps.1: In a large bowl combine honey, milk, and eggs. Set aside
steps.2: In another large bowl combine crushed bran flakes, flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
steps.3: Fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients and add melted butter. Mix just until combine, then mix in berries.
steps.4: Scoop about 1/4 cup of batter into each muffin cup, you will only need about 4 to 6 of the spaces in the second tin.
steps.5: Bake on center rack of the oven for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
steps.6: Remove from oven, let cool, and enjoy!

225.title: Elote-Jalapeño Cornbread Pancakes
225.description: Get ready-you're in for a real treat with this one! Our classic Trader Joe's Cornbread Mix finally met its match in Trader Joe's Everything But the Elote Seasoning Blend. It makes perfect sense when you think about it-the components of the Seasoning Blend (Parmesan, chile pepper, chipotle powder, salt, etc.), are literally designed-or at least combined-to be delicious on corn, so *of course* they're just as delicious in cornbread! Toss some jalapenos in the mix, and you've got yourself a sweet n' savory, slightly spicy, and totally Tex-Mexy breakfast.

ingredients.0: 1 box TJ's Cornbread Mix
ingredients.2: 1 stick (1/2 cup) TJ's Unsalted Butter, melted
ingredients.4: 3 tablespoons TJ's Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend
ingredients.5: 1 bag TJ's Fresh Jalapenos, deseeded and diced (use gloves!)

parsed_ing.4: Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend

corrected_ing.4: Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend

steps.0: In a large mixing bowl, mix together egg, melted butter, and buttermilk. Mix in cornbread mix and seasoning, stirring until moistened. Mix in diced jalapenos until combine. Do not over-mix.
steps.1: Preheat a large, nonstick pan or griddle over low heat. Working in batches and using about 1/4 cup of batter per pancake as your measure, drop batter into preheated pan. Cook 3-4 minutes, flip pancake, and continue cooking for 2 minutes more.
steps.2: Serve immediately, garnished with honey and butter if desired. Enjoy!

226.title: Corn Flake-Crusted Brioche French Toast
226.description: Fans of traditional French toast, be forewarned-one bite of this version's crispy, corn flake crust will leave you wondering how you ever faced French toast without it! It's the perfect marriage of moist, fluffy French Brioche and always-crunchy Organic Corn Flakes. Whip up a batch for friends at brunch, and you'll be crowned the Corn Flake Queen! (Show us a brunch-loving citizen of the world who wouldn't want THAT title-we'll wait...)

ingredients.0: 3 large TJ's Eggs
ingredients.3: 3 cups TJ's Organic Corn Flakes Cereal, crushed
ingredients.4: 6 slices TJ's Sliced French Brioche, halved diagonally

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375°F.
steps.1: Whisk eggs, milk and sugar in a shallow bowl. Put the crushed cornflakes in another shallow bowl.
steps.2: One piece at a time, soak bread in egg mixture, turning once. Remove bread before it gets soggy, hold over bowl and allow excess egg to drip off, then dredge in crushed cornflakes, pressing gently so that flakes adhere. Set aside on a plate.
steps.3: Lightly spray a sheet pan or a baking sheet with canola oil and set aside.
steps.4: Melt about 1 tablespoon of butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Place cornflake-coated pieces of bread in skillet and cook for approximately 2 - 3 minutes on each side or until golden-brown. Work in batches, adding more butter to skillet as necessary & transferring cooked pieces to the sheet pan. Arrange bead in an even layer with some space in between each piece.
steps.5: Place sheet pan on the center rack of oven and bake until cooked through, about 10 minutes. Keep an eye on it as it bakes; remove from oven if burning or blackening begins to occur.
steps.6: Remove from oven and let cool slightly.
steps.7: Serve warm with butter & maple syrup. Enjoy!

227.title: Açaí Smoothie Bowl
227.description: The acai berry trend shows no signs of slowing down-and why should it? With its subtle hints of cacao and powerful berry tang, acai's rich, complex flavor profile is refreshingly irresistible. On-the-go cafes and juiceries have devoted entire sections of their menus to energizing smoothies and filling breakfast bowls made with this brilliant berry of the Amazon. These menu offerings, however, are typically packed with sugar and are often quite expensive. So this is us, taking matters into our own hands. And our own bowls. Got a few minutes and a blender? Then grab a packet of Trader Joe's Organic Unsweetened Acai Puree and give this tantalizingly tropical, easy-peasy recipe a try. Your body-and your wallet-will thank you.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Organic Unsweetened Acai Puree packet
ingredients.1: 1/2 cup TJ's Frozen Organic Mixed Berry Blend
ingredients.2: 1-2 tablespoons TJ's Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Milk
ingredients.6: 1 scoop of your favorite protein powder (optional)

steps.0: Add Acai packet, berry blend, almond milk, and half of the banana to blender (and protein, if using). Blend until smooth (adjust almond milk if needed). Scrape smoothie mixture into bowl. Top with remaining banana slices, granola and dates. Grab a spoon and dig in.

228.title: Bacon Apple Sweet Potato Hash
228.description: Trader Joe's Organic Sweet Potatoes are an extremely versatile vegetable. They can be baked, roasted, fried, grilled, boiled, mashed or grated. In this recipe, we used them to hash out breakfast by roasting them and mixing them with apples, onions, kale, egg and crispy bacon. Rooted in sweet and savory deliciousness, it's a righteous and easy way to start any day.

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Organic Sweet Potatoes, peeled and diced
ingredients.1: 1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 1 package TJ's Bacon Ends & Pieces (or your favorite TJ's Bacon)
ingredients.5: 2 TJ's Gala Apples or TJ's Granny Smith Apples, diced

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400 ºF.
steps.1: Toss sweet potatoes with olive oil and sea salt. Place in roasting pan and bake for 20 minutes.
steps.2: In a large oven-safe skillet, cook bacon over medium heat. Add onions once the bacon has cooked for five minutes and has begun to render fat. Cook until bacon begins to become crisp and onions appear translucent.
steps.3: Add apples and cook for an additional two minutes. Add roasted sweet potatoes to the mixture and cook for approximately five minutes or until potatoes begin to soften. Mix in kale and cook for another two minutes.
steps.4: Create four spaces in the hash mixture where you want to place the eggs and carefully crack one egg in each space.
steps.5: Place skillet in oven and cook for 7 - 10 minutes, or until eggs are fully cooked.
steps.6: Remove from oven, toss with maple syrup and serve.

229.title: Golden Milk Coconut Chia Pudding
229.description: Talk about a powerhouse! Trader Joe's Organic Chia Seeds pack quite the nutritional punch-each 2-tablespoon serving provides 8 grams of dietary fiber and 4 grams of Omega-3 fatty acid (ALA). But even more impressively, they can absorb up 27 times their weight in water-when you add them to liquids, they swell and become gelatinous, making them an excellent binder for foods like...pudding! Following the golden quarter-cup-seeds-to-one-cup-milk (or non-dairy beverage) ratio, you can create nearly any style of chia pudding you could possibly imagine, but we've opted for a spiced take on this cozy, no-bake classic...

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Turmeric Ginger Coconut Beverage
ingredients.2: 1 teaspoon TJ's Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract or TJ's Alcohol-Free Vanilla Flavor
ingredients.4: Your favorite toppings (we like whipped cream, TJ's Unsweetened Coconut Chips, chopped cling peaches, fresh mint, & a sprinkle of cinnamon)

steps.0: In a small bowl, mix coconut beverage, chia seeds, vanilla, and syrup until combined. Let mixture sit 10 minutes, stirring every 2-3 minutes to break up any clumps. Cover bowl and refrigerate for a minimum of two hours, or overnight.
steps.1: Remove pudding from fridge, divide between two small bowls or jars, and garnish as desired.

230.title: Spiced Cider Pancakes
230.description: Trader Joe's Apple Cider Jam is the jam this fall. It's sweet and tart, superbly spiced, thick and spreadable, with chunks of apples in every jar. Use it as a finishing sauce on pork chops or to add pizzazz to your daily cup of plain yogurt. It also makes an excellent partner to maple syrup, drizzled atop a batch of buttermilk pancakes infused with Trader Joe's Spiced Cider.

ingredients.0: 1 3/4 Cups TJ's Buttermilk Pancake Mix
ingredients.4: 1 jar (12 oz) TJ's Apple Cider Jam (seasonal)
ingredients.5: 6 oz your favorite TJ's Maple Syrup
ingredients.6: TJ's Cultured Salted Butter, for serving (optional)

steps.0: Prepare syrup: Add jam and syrup to a microwave-safe bowl. Heat on half-power for 30 second intervals, stirring occasionally, until warm. Set aside.
steps.1: Prepare pancakes: In a medium bowl, whisk pancake mix and pumpkin pie spice. In a small bowl, whisk egg and cider. Add cider mixture to dry mixture and whisk gently, just until combined. Let batter stand 10 minutes.
steps.2: Preheat a large nonstick pan or griddle over medium heat. Working in batches and using a 1/4 cup measure per pancake, drop batter into preheated pan. Cook 1-2 minutes, flip pancake and continue cooking 1 minute more. Serve immediately with butter and apple cider syrup.
steps.3: For a real treat, try griddling these pancakes in a cast iron skillet, with plenty of Trader Joe's Organic Coconut Oil.

231.title: Oatmeal Cookie Oatmeal
231.description: The nutty, distinctively chewy texture and pure wholesomeness of steel cut oats have made them a hot cereal preference for grain aficionados & warm breakfast lovers alike. Trader Joe's Quick Cook Steel Cut Oats allows you to reap the benefits of hearty steel cut oats, without the long cook time. This recipe further elevates these Oats with the addition of fragrant cinnamon, sweet, chewy raisins, and crunchy almonds-the same ingredients you'd find in an oatmeal cookie!

ingredients.0: 1 cup TJ's Quick Cook Steel Cut Oats
ingredients.5: 1/4 cup TJ's Unsalted Dry Toasted Slivered Almonds

steps.0: In a small saucepan over high heat, combine oatmeal and water. When the mixture begins to boil, reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes.
steps.1: Stir applesauce, cinnamon, raisins, sugar, and almond slivers into oatmeal, and continue cooking another 5 minutes. (If you prefer a thinner oatmeal, add more water or applesauce to your preference.)
steps.2: Transfer oatmeal to serving bowls and enjoy.

232.title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Cinnamon Rolls
232.description: PB&J doesn't just have to be relegated to the realm of sandwiches. Its satisfying mix of savory and sweet lends itself well to all kinds of delights, like this easy-to-make, even-easier-to-enjoy cinnamon roll treat. The addition of bright, fruity Trader Joe's Organic Reduced Sugar Strawberry Preserves and salty, flavorful Trader Joe's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter puts a sensational spin on an old favorite. Enjoy as a dessert, or as a particularly opulent brunch option.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Jumbo Cinnamon Rolls with Vanilla Icing
ingredients.1: TJ's Organic Reduced Sugar Strawberry Preserves

parsed_ing.0: Jumbo Cinnamon Rolls with Vanilla Icing

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F. Remove cinnamon rolls from package and transfer to a large cutting board or workspace, reserve icing.
steps.1: Gently separate and unravel cinnamon rolls until you have long strips of dough. Spread a thin layer of jelly atop each strip of dough, followed by a thin layer of peanut butter. Gently roll the dough strips back into their cinnamon roll shape and place on an ungreased baking sheet, about 2 inches apart.
steps.2: Bake on center rack of oven for 18-20 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Drizzle rolls with reserved icing and enjoy.

233.title: Spiced Chai Pancakes
233.description: Trader Joe's Spiced Chai Black Tea Concentrate is brewed with filtered water and steeped in small batches to fully develop its characteristic flavors-namely, allspice, black pepper, cardamom, clove, cinnamon, and ginger. This robust rundown of redolent spices is combined with sugar to create the ideal base for a perfectly perfumed, satisfyingly sweet, and altogether tasty Spiced Chai latte. In addition to sweet liquid refreshment, this Spiced Tea Concentrate is an excellent stand-in for water when whipping up a batch of buttermilk pancakes on a lazy Sunday morning. It turns out you really can sip your Chai and eat it, too...

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Large Egg, whisked
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJ's Spiced Chai Black Tea Concentrate (do not dilute!)
ingredients.2: 13/4 cup TJ's Buttermilk Pancake & All-Purpose Baking Mix

steps.0: In a medium bowl, whisk egg and spiced chai concentrate until combined. Whisk in pancake mix until smooth. Let batter stand 5 minutes.
steps.1: Preheat a skillet over medium. Working in batches, use a quarter-cup measuring cup to drop batter into skillet. Cook for 1-2 minutes, flipping pancakes when edges are no longer glossy and bubbles form in the center. Cook another minute or so and transfer pancakes to a serving platter. Serve pancakes with toasted pecan pieces and plenty of syrup for drizzling.

234.title: Egg JoeMuffin
234.description: Made with a hearty base of egg and Swiss cheese, Trader Joe's Egg Frittata has a fluffy texture that belies its protein-packed ingredient list. Earthy cauliflower, fried onions, and the aforementioned cheese create the classic, belly-warming breakfast profile: craveably savory and utterly delicious. To amp up the protein content, our supplier uses egg whites, whole eggs, and whey protein concentrate-add it all up, and you get about 12 grams of protein and 15% of your daily calcium needs, at just 5 grams of carbs per fully-cooked Frittata! To achieve peak Frittata perfection, simply reheat in the microwave or bake to your heart's (and your schedule's) content. Its plump disc shape makes it just the right size for an egg sandwich on a TJ's British Muffin. On the other hand, if you're going for a lower carb concoction, set one of these Frittatas atop a bed of crisp salad greens dressed in vinaigrette, and you've got a satisfying meal on your hands, with hardly any fuss.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's British Muffins
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Egg Frittata, microwaved according to package instructions
ingredients.3: 4 slices TJ's Fully Cooked Bacon, microwaved according to package instructions

steps.0: Split muffins and toast to desired doneness. Layer arugula, 1 frittata, a couple of tomato slices, and 2 slices of bacon on bottom half of toasted muffin. Drizzle with sriracha sauce and cover with top half of muffin. Repeat steps with remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.

235.title: Blueberry Protein Pancakes
235.description: Made with simple, hearty ingredients like whole wheat flour, whole grain oat flour, whey protein concentrate, and buttermilk powder, Trader Joe's Buttermilk Protein Pancake Mix isn't just good for a purposefully protein-y product; it's good, period. It's also a cinch to prepare-no muscle required. Just combine equal parts Mix and water, and you're on your way to fluffy, satisfying Pancakes that are packed with Protein (ten grams per two-pancake serving) but free from that dreaded chalky, protein powder-y aftertaste. Further the bolster batter with your favorite fruit for a filling, no sugar added breakfast-we especially like Trader Joe's Organic Wild Blueberries here.

ingredients.0: 2 cups TJ's Buttermilk Protein Pancake Mix
ingredients.2: 1 bag TJ's Organic Wild Blueberries, thawed and divided

steps.0: Add pancake mix and water to a medium bowl. Whisk just until combined. Gently fold in half of the blueberries. Let batter sit 10 minutes prior to cooking.
steps.1: Add remaining blueberries to a microwave safe bowl. Microwave on 30 second intervals, stirring in between, until hot. Set aside.
steps.2: Preheat a greased skillet or griddle over medium. Pour approximately 1/4 cup batter per pancake. Cook 2 to 3 minutes per side, flipping when pancake edges are dry. Repeat until all batter is used. Serve hot pancakes immediately, with warmed berries on top.

236.title: Egg Salad Bagel
236.description: Soggy sandwich bread, please exit stage left! The dense construction of a bagel's crumb (that's bakery lingo for its doughy insides) is the ideal match for creamy Trader Joe's Egg Salad. And not turning on the stove or oven to get your egg fix? That's just the cream cheese on the bagel, as it were. Balance the velvety egg salad and toasty bagel with a glass of your favorite sparkling water or wine for a quick and tasty brunch.

ingredients.0: 3 TJ's Everything Bagels, sliced in half
ingredients.2: 1 tub TJ's Pico de Gallo, hot or mild
ingredients.3: TJ's Fresh Chives, chopped, for garnish (optional)

steps.0: Toast bagels per your preference. Top bottom half of bagel with egg salad, pico de gallo, and chopped chives. Cover with top half of bagel and serve immediately.

237.title: Smoked Salmon & Cream Cheese Bagel
237.description: There's a reason certain food pairings become classic in the breakfast canon-they're just that good. Recreate this masterpiece by coupling your favorite bagel-cream cheese combo with Trader Joe's Wild Alaskan Sockeye Smoked Salmon. Top it with thinly sliced red onion and briny capers, then toast to your good taste with a glass of bubbly. It's fancy without the fuss-or the price tag!

ingredients.0: 3 TJ's Everything Bagels, sliced in half
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Wild Alaska Sockeye Smoked Salmon
ingredients.3: 1/4 TJ's Red Onion, very thinly sliced
ingredients.5: A few sprigs TJ's Fresh Dill, for garnish

steps.0: Toast bagels per your preference. Slather each half with cream cheese. Top with salmon, red onion, capers, and dill. Serve immediately.

238.title: Fig Butter Cream Cheese Bagel
238.description: Trader Joe's Fig Butter is a favorite ingredient among recipe testers and tasters alike in our test kitchen, and it's easy to see why: it shines in sweet and savory applications, packs a punch of flavor in a compact jar, and it's just downright delicious. Elevate the standard bagel & cream cheese with a healthy dollop of said Fig Butter, followed by chopped walnuts, dried apricots and a generous drizzle of honey. A chilled glass of Trader Joe's Cranberry & Clementine Sparkling Water adds fruity sparkle without further sweetness, making this a sublime breakfast or afternoon snack.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's Plain Bagels, sliced in half
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Cream Cheese, quartered and softened

steps.0: Remove lid from fig butter. Microwave on half power for 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until warm. Set aside.
steps.1: Toast bagels per your preference. Top each half with cream cheese, spreading to cover bagel. Drizzle with warm fig butter. Top with diced apricot and walnuts, followed by a generous drizzle of honey. Enjoy immediately.

239.title: Shakshuka
239.description: Shakshuka has become a certified foodie phenomenon as of late, making appearances on menus of trendy joints and gastropubs everywhere. But sometimes you don't always want to go out to the trendy restaurant (or pay trendy restaurant prices) to get your shakshuka fix. That's why we've introduced Trader Joe's Shakshuka Starter: everything you need to create a steamy, slightly spicy Shakshuka in about five minutes - all that's required on your end are a pair of fresh eggs and a microwave or stove!With a base of tomatoes, bell peppers, garlic, and fragrant spices, this piquant & peppery powerhouse of Middle Eastern cuisine has everything you could look for in a savory, satisfying stew. Traditionally enjoyed as a morning meal, our version is so tasty, and such a snap to prepare, you may just want to have it for every meal...

ingredients.0: TJ's Shakshuka Starter
ingredients.3: TJ's Fresh Mint, torn into pieces
ingredients.4: Toasted pita, flatbread, or baguette for dipping

steps.0: MICROWAVE: Remove bowl from outer box. Puncture film 3 to 4 times with a fork. Heat on high for 3 minutes; partially peel back film and stir. Re-cover and heat for an additional 2 minutes. Peel back film, stir, make two pockets with the back of a spoon and add 2 fresh eggs. Re-cover and cook for 2 to 2 1/2 minutes to cook eggs to desired doneness. Top with feta and mint, and serve with crusty bread for dipping.
steps.1: STOVE: Place contents of shakshuka starter bowl into a small saute pan with 2 Tbsp. of water and cover. Heat on medium low for 6 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until simmering. Make two pockets with the back of a spoon and add 2 eggs. Re-cover pan and cook for 2 to 2 1/2 minutes to cook eggs to desired doneness. Top with feta and mint, and serve with crusty bread for dipping.

240.title: Spicy Avocado Hummus Toast
240.description: When you combine two different songs to create a new composition, it's called a mashup. And when you mash up garbanzo beans & avocado, you call it: Trader Joe's Organic Spicy Avocado Hummus. Our supplier starts with organic garbanzo beans, blending them with organic Mexican avocados and concentrated lime juice. Tahini and extra virgin olive oil are brought in to add some traditional hummus flavor and to smooth out the mixture, while jalapenos are added to supply spiciness. The remarkably fresh flavor of this Organic Spicy Avocado Hummus is finished with sea salt and organic spices, namely: black pepper, cumin, garlic & cayenne. The result is a smooth, slightly thick combo-condiment with quite a bit of heat, perfect for dunking veggies or chips, or creating a hummus & avocado toast breakfast hybrid...

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Ciabatta Roll, split lengthwise
ingredients.2: 2 TJ's Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs, halved
ingredients.3: Handful TJ's Organic Grape Tomatoes, rinsed, dried, and sliced
