Taken from Japanese, the word translates to "pleasant savory taste," and really, it's just that. And Trader Joe's Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend is really just something you're going to want to put on... everything. To create this Umami Seasoning Blend, we began with kosher salt, and used a flavor base of porcini and white button mushrooms - earthy mushroom flavor really is the cornerstone of umami, which is why we named it Mushroom & Company. The ingredient list also includes onion, mustard seed, red & black pepper, and thyme. It's a boon mixed into turkey burgers, stirred into scrambled eggs, or used to elevate the flavors of... everything, really, a sprinkle at a time.

ingredients.0: 1 package (16 oz) TJ's All Natural Ground Turkey
ingredients.2: 2 teaspoons TJ's Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend
ingredients.4: 4 TJ's Ciabatta Rolls (halved lengthwise) or 4 TJ's Brioche Buns
ingredients.5: 4 slices TJ's Sliced Aged Swiss Cheese
ingredients.6: TJ's Balsamic Glaze and/or Organic Yellow Mustard, whichever you prefer
ingredients.7: Your favorite crunchy TJ's Salad Greens or Microgreens

parsed_ing.2: Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend
parsed_ing.6: Balsamic Glaze and/or Organic Yellow Mustard

steps.0: Add onion to a large bowl. Use your hands to break ground turkey into pieces and add to bowl. Sprinkle seasoning evenly over meat. Use your hands to gently mix until onion, turkey and seasoning are evenly combined. If using our pre-formed Ground Turkey Patties, season both sides of each patty generously and evenly. Cover and refrigerate 20 minutes.
steps.1: Remove turkey from refrigerator. Use your hands to form the meat into 4 patties.
steps.2: Pan-Fry: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add oil to coat the bottom of the skillet. When oil is hot, use a spatula to carefully transfer patties to skillet. Cook 6-8 minutes, undisturbed, until bottom is well-browned and releases easily from the pan. Flip patties, adding more oil to the pan if necessary, and cook another 6-8 minutes, until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Transfer to paper towel lined plate, set aside.
steps.3: If you're in a rush, you can skip ahead to assembly. But if you want warmed rolls with melty cheese, turn broiler to high. Place roll halves on a baking sheet. Top half of the rolls with a slice of cheese. Broil for 1-2 minutes to melt cheese (watch carefully to ensure rolls don't burn!). Remove pan from broiler and let cool slightly.
steps.4: Place burger on the bottom half of the roll with melted cheese, followed by salad greens. Generously spread glaze and mustard on top half of the roll, and place on burger.
steps.5: Grill: Preheat grill to medium high. Place seasoned patties on grill and cook, covered, for 6 minutes. Flip burgers and cook, covered, about 6 more minutes or until internal temperature of patties reaches 165°F. Place a slice of cheese on each patty during the last 1-2 minutes of cooking to melt. Remove sand let cool slightly before serving.

305.title: Spicy Sausage and Kale Soup
305.description: Don't let the challenging-to-pronounce name intimidate you. Trader Joe's Mirepoix (pronounced meer-pwah) is a ready-to-use blend of carrots, onions and celery, named for the French aristocrat who employed the chef who likely institutionalized the use of this combination for cooking. What makes this particular product unique is that these three commonplace ingredients have been washed, peeled, and most importantly, chopped for you, so you can get right to the cooking. Use it as a base for sauces, casseroles, roasting meats, or in this recipe for comforting, Spicy Sausage and Kale Soup with Organic Quinoa.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage (or any spicy TJ's Chicken Sausage)
ingredients.1: 3 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided
ingredients.3: 1 teaspoon TJ's Spice of the World, Garlic Powder
ingredients.4: 1/2 teaspoon TJ's Spices of the World, Oregano
ingredients.7: 2 containers TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth
ingredients.9: 1 cup TJ's Organic Red Quinoa, rinsed and drained
ingredients.10: 1 bag TJ's Organic Tuscan Kale, stems removed
ingredients.11: TJ's Grated Parmesan Cheese or Fresh Lemon, sliced, for garnish

steps.0: Slice sausage links into half-inch thick coins, then slice coins in half. Heat a skillet over medium heat and add 1 tablespoon olive oil. When oil is hot, add sausage to pan and cook undisturbed for 5 minutes. Flip sausage pieces and continue to cook until browned, 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
steps.1: Heat a large pot over medium heat, add remaining olive oil. When oil is hot, add mirepoix, garlic powder, oregano, salt and pepper. Saute until onions are translucent and spices are fragrant, 3-5 minutes.
steps.2: Add broth, water, and quinoa, and bring to a boil for 5 minutes. Add kale, cover pot and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until kale is tender and quinoa is cooked. Add sausage and cook another few minutes until warmed through.
steps.3: Ladle soup into large bowls and garnish with grated parmesan or a squeeze of lemon. Serve with crusty bread for dipping and dig in!

306.title: Curry Chicken Pot Pie
306.description: One of the best things about comfort food is, of course, its ability to provide comfort... one of the lesser-discussed benefits is its flexibility. Take chicken pot pie, for example. You may have a favorite version, your best friend may have a different favorite, and yet, they all bring comfort. In the spirit of comfort and flexibility, we're quite keen on this Curry Chicken Pot Pie recipe. Chunks of chicken and veggies, bathed in a yellow curry sauce, all enveloped in a flaky, buttery Trader Joe's Pie Crust. It's creamy and savory, with just a smidge of heat. It's classic fare with an international attitude. It's a decidedly Trader Joe's take on tradition. And you know what? That's pretty darn comforting.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Gourmet Pie Crusts, defrosted in the refrigerator
ingredients.4: 1 bottle TJ's Thai Yellow Curry Sauce

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400ºF. Unroll crusts, leaving plastic sleeves in place, and smooth together any cracks in the dough. Using a small cereal bowl and juice glass as your guides, cut out 5 small circles and 5 medium circles from the dough. Cut a small vent hole in each of the small circles and place them in refrigerator.
steps.1: Line each ramekin with with a medium-sized dough circle and place on rimmed baking sheet. Poke holes in the crusts with a sharp knife. Place sheet on center rack of oven and par-bake crusts 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.
steps.2: Remove small pie crust circles from refrigerator. Add organic foursome and onions to a microwave-safe bowl and microwave 1 minute on high. Add chicken and curry sauce to bowl and gently stir to combine. Divide mixture among ramekins and top each with a small pie crust circle.
steps.3: Return baking sheet to oven and bake 20-30 minutes, or until crusts are golden and filling is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes prior to serving.
steps.4: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2011 HiiP Recipe Showdown Winner - Linda Wang.

307.title: Pepperoni Slab Pizza
307.description: This rectangular Pizza Crust is studded with golden bubbles and offers a pleasantly yeast-y chew. Keep some simple toppings on hand (cheese, sauce, et. al.) and everyday can be Pizza Day!

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Pizza Crust
ingredients.3: 1 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
ingredients.5: A few dashes TJ's Organic Oregano (optional)

steps.0: Preheat to 425°F. Lightly brush top and bottom of crust with oil. Spread sauce evenly over crust to within half an inch of the edges. Top with cheese, pepperoni, and oregano. Place on a pizza pan, baking sheet, or for a crisper crust directly on oven rack, and bake 5 to 8 minutes. Cook until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown and crisp on edges.

308.title: Cheeseburger Pizza
308.description: Can't decide between burgers and pizza for dinner? With this recipe from a Crew Member's home kitchen, you don't have to!

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Pizza Dough
ingredients.1: TJ's All-Purpose Flour, for work surface
ingredients.2: 2 teaspoons TJ's Olive Oil, plus more for brushing pizza crust
ingredients.4: 1 package (1 pound) TJ's Organic Grass Fed Ground Beef
ingredients.6: 1 cup TJ's Mild Shredded Cheddar Cheese
ingredients.7: TJ's Organic Sweet Bread & Butter Pickles
ingredients.8: TJ's Organic Ketchup & Yellow Mustard, for garnish

steps.0: Gently remove dough from bag, place on a lightly floured work surface and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes.
steps.1: Add olive oil and onion to a skillet over medium heat. Saute about 5 minutes, until translucent. Add ground beef to skillet and cook until meat is no longer pink and reaches 160°F. Drain, loosely cover and set aside.
steps.2: Preheat oven to 475°F. Stretch dough by hand or rolling pin into a circle 12 inches in diameter. Place on a lightly oiled pizza pan or baking sheet. Spread sauce evenly over crust to within half an inch of the edges, and top with ground beef mixture and cheese. Brush edges of dough with olive oil.
steps.3: Place pan on center rack of oven and bake for about 25 minutes, or until cheese is golden and bubbly around the edges and the bottom of the crust is a light golden brown. Remove pan from oven and let cool slightly. Top pizza with pickles, drizzle with ketchup & mustard and serve.

309.title: Shawarma Pizza
309.description: Consider Trader Joe's Cauliflower Pizza Crust your personal canvas for pizza creation. Here, we've covered it in spicy, herb-y Trader Joe's Zhoug Sauce and crowned it with savory Trader Joe's Shawarma Chicken Thighs-it's fiery, flavorful, and not for the faint of heart.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Cauliflower Crust
ingredients.3: 1/2 cup TJ's Shawarma Chicken Thighs, prepared according to package directions
ingredients.4: 2-3 tablespoons TJ's Julienned Sundried Tomatoes, drained

steps.0: Par-bake crust according to package directions. Remove crust from oven and top with cheese and chicken. Return to oven and cook 5 minutes. Turn broiler to high and broil 3-5 minutes until cheese is golden. Remove pizza from oven and top with sundried tomatoes. Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

310.title: Garlic Potato Pizza
310.description: This herby Potato Pizza eschews traditional sauce in favor of rich, roasted garlic and bright Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil. Pair it with a crisp Sauvignon Blanc and let happy hour commence.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Garlic & Herb Pizza Dough
ingredients.2: TJ's Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps.0: Place a pizza stone or baking sheet on the center rack of oven and preheat to 450°F. Peel away the loose skin of the garlic, leaving the heads intact. Trim 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic heads and place in small squares of aluminum foil. Drizzle exposed garlic cloves with olive oil and wrap tightly with foil. Bake about 30 minutes, remove from oven and set aside.
steps.1: While garlic cooks, gently remove dough from bag, halve and place on a lightly floured work surface; let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and onions to a skillet over medium-low heat. Saute about 20 minutes until golden brown. Remove from heat and set aside. Slice potatoes very thinly with a sharp knife or on a mandoline and set aside. Unwrap garlic heads and squeeze roasted cloves into a small bowl. Mash with a fork and set aside.
steps.2: Stretch one piece of dough by hand or rolling pin to 8 inches in diameter. Place on a lightly floured pizza peel or cutting board. Brush dough with olive oil cover with half of the roasted garlic. Top with half of the potatoes and onions. Strip rosemary from stems and sprinkle half atop pizza.
steps.3: Gently slide pizza onto preheated stone or baking sheet and bake 5-10 minutes, or until crust is blistered and potatoes are golden around the edges. Remove from oven with pizza peel, transfer to a cutting board and drizzle lightly with olive oil. Repeat pizza prep with remaining dough and ingredients. Slice and enjoy!

311.title: Lemony Grilled Chicken Thighs
311.description: Trader Joe's All Natural Bone-In, Skin-On Chicken Thighs are ready to grill at a moment's notice. A little lemon pepper seasoning and lemon juice marinade will go a long way with these Chicken Thighs because of their inherently robust flavor, and by leaving the skin on and the bone in, we've left them in perfect condition for grilling, frying, baking, slow-cooking, and more.

ingredients.0: 1/4 cup of your favorite TJ's Olive Oil, plus more for oiling grill grate
ingredients.1: Juice of 2 TJ's Lemons, plus 1 more Lemon (halved) for grilling
ingredients.6: 1 package TJ's All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs

parsed_ing.6: All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs

steps.0: In a large non-reactive baking dish, whisk olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, oregano, salt and lemon pepper seasoning. Add chicken pieces and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
steps.1: Preheat one side of the grill to high. Dip a crumpled paper towel in a tiny bit of olive oil, and use tongs to oil the grill grate with the paper towel.
steps.2: Place chicken on cool side of the grill and cook for 5 minutes. Turn chicken over and cook another 20 minutes.
steps.3: Place lemon halves on hot side of grill. Move chicken to the hot side of the grill, skin side-down, and cook until skin is crisp and chicken is cooked to 165°F. Remove from heat and serve with grilled lemon halves.

312.title: Grilled Carrot Miso Salmon
312.description: Beyond its high status in the streams & seas, Salmon is also a true star of the barbie. However, given its delicate nature, the right kind of fillet makes all the difference when you're grilling a gilled dish. Try Trader Joe's BBQ Cut Fresh Atlantic Salmon Fillet, which has the skin left on to act as a natural barrier between the fish and the hot flame. Before cooking it skin-down, give it a marinade in our Carrot Ginger Miso Dressing and you'll see the star-power of Salmon rising, right in your own backyard.

ingredients.0: 1/2 bottle TJ's Carrot Ginger Miso Salad Dressing, plus more for serving
ingredients.2: 2 packages TJ's BBQ Cut Fresh Atlantic Salmon Fillets

parsed_ing.2: BBQ Cut Fresh Atlantic Salmon Fillets

steps.0: Whisk dressing and soy sauce in a shallow casserole dish. Place salmon in dish skin side-up, making sure to coat sides of fillets with marinade. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
steps.1: Remove salmon from refrigerator about 20 minutes before you're ready to grill. Heat grill to high. Shake excess marinade from salmon, rub skin with olive oil and place directly on grill over center burners, skin side-down. Reduce heat to medium, close lid and cook salmon 4-5 minutes.
steps.2: Open lid; salmon should be nearly done. Turn off center burners, close lid and finish cooking over indirect heat, about 2-3 minutes more. Salmon is ready when flesh is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Remove from heat and let rest a few minutes. Add a dollop of dressing to each fillet just before serving.

313.title: Jackfruit Carnitas
313.description: This meatless main is extremely versatile-serve it in tacos or an omelette, atop crisp butter lettuce, on nachos...

ingredients.0: 2 tablespoons of your favorite TJ's Olive Oil, divided
ingredients.1: 1/2 TJ's Jumbo Yellow Onion, diced and divided
ingredients.2: 2 cans TJ's Green Jackfruit in Brine, drained and deseeded
ingredients.10: 2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar

steps.0: Add 1 tablespoon olive oil to a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add half of the diced onion to pan and saute until translucent, 3-5 minutes. Meanwhile, roughly chop jackfruit. Add jackfruit to pan and saute another 5 minutes.
steps.1: Add cumin, nutritional yeast, oregano, paprika, salt and pepper to pan, stirring to coat jackfruit. Saute 3 minutes. Add coconut aminos, apple cider vinegar and orange juice to pan and saute an additional 5 minutes, breaking jackfruit down into smaller pieces with a wooden spoon. Add remaining tablespoon olive oil and stir to coat. Let cool slightly.
steps.2: Garnish cooked jackfruit with remaining diced onion and lime juice. Enjoy!

314.title: Tahini, Pepita & Apricot Slawcos
314.description: The ingredients from which the Trader Joe's Tahini, Pepita & Apricot Slaw Kit got its name take it from an ordinary slaw into something profoundly delicious. Such a vibrant Slaw Kit allows for quick-and tasty-weekday meal prep. It's as easy as adding a piece of grilled salmon, TJ's Grilled Chicken Strips, or Falafel. Serve it as a side dish to a larger meal, or toss a crunchy addition into sandwiches, wraps, or tacos.

ingredients.0: 2 teaspoons TJ's Sunflower Oil
ingredients.4: 1 bag TJ's Tahini, Pepita & Apricot Slaw Kit

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F. Add sunflower oil to a saute pan over medium-high heat. When heated, add beef-less beef and saute 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add taco seasoning and continue stirring until beef-less beef is warmed through and seasoning is thoroughly mixed, about 2 minutes.
steps.1: To warm taco shells, place shells on a sheet pan and warm in preheated oven for 2-3 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before handling.
steps.2: Assemble tacos: Spoon beef-less beef into warm taco shell. Top with slaw and drizzle with included dressing packet. Serve immediately.

315.title: Harvest Pasta Sauce
315.description: This autumnal-inspired sauce calls on Trader Joe's Organic Canned Pumpkin for its velvety texture, vibrant orange hue, and slightly sweet, earthy flavor. It's the perfect accompaniment to al dente pasta or fluffy baked potatoes when the weather turns chilly.

ingredients.0: 1/2 TJ's Organic Yellow Onion, diced
ingredients.3: 2 cans TJ's Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes
ingredients.11: 1 pound of your favorite TJ's Pasta, cooked

parsed_ing.3: Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes

steps.0: Heat oil in a sauce pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic, and saute 3-5 minutes, until onions are translucent.
steps.1: Add tomatoes, pumpkin, water, herbs and salt to sauce pot. Stir to combine. Bring to a simmer and cook, covered, for 1 hour, stirring occasionally to ensure sauce doesn't stick to pot.
steps.2: Turn off heat. Use an immersion blender or blend sauce mixture in batches until smooth. Stir in half & half and maple syrup, and season to taste. Serve over hot pasta and garnish with fresh herbs, if desired. Enjoy immediately.

ingredients.0: 2 TJ's Tilapia Filets, defrosted according to package directions
ingredients.2: 1 bag TJ's Frozen Organic Jasmine Rice
ingredients.4: TJ's Smoked Paprika, Sea Salt & Pepper

steps.0: Microwave rice according to package directions. Pat tilapia filets dry with paper towels and generously season both sides with paprika, sea salt & pepper.
steps.1: In a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, melt ghee. Add tilapia to skillet and cook 2-3 minutes per side, until fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Remove from heat.
steps.2: To assemble: Divide rice among two plates and top each with a tilapia filet. Drizzle filets with desired amount of salsa, and garnish with lemon slices and cilantro. Enjoy immediately.

317.title: Tangy Grilled Chicken
317.description: The natural acids in Trader Joe's Plain Greek Yogurt act as a mellow tenderizer in this tangy marinade recipe. Paired with lemon, olive oil, and a bit of salt, it's a foolproof way to ensure moist meat, every time you fire up the grill. It was an instant hit on Trader Joe's Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts with our test kitchen tasters, but feel free to sub in your favorite cut.

ingredients.0: 1/2 cup TJ's Plain Greek Whole Milk Yogurt
ingredients.2: 1 tablespoon TJ's California Estate Olive Oil
ingredients.4: 1 1/2 lb TJ's Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts

steps.0: Add yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil and onion salt to a medium bowl and stir to combine. Add chicken and stir to coat evenly. Cover bowl and refrigerate one hour.
steps.1: Oil the grill grate and preheat to medium-high. Shake excess marinade from chicken and grill 6-8 minutes per side, until juices run clear and internal temperature reaches 165°F. Remove from heat and pair with fresh greens, steamed rice or pasta salad.

318.title: Dairy Free Mac 'n Cheese
318.description: This surprisingly creamy, dairy-free mac 'n cheese gets an umami flavor boost from the addition of nutritional yeast. Eat it plain, or enjoy with hot sauce, chopped herbs, sliced vegan sausage, roasted broccoli, wilted greens...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Organic Tricolor Radiatore Pasta

steps.0: Add cashews and almond milk to a blender pitcher or food processor. Cover and set aside for one hour to soak.
steps.1: Puree soaked cashews and almond milk until smooth. Scrape down the sides of the pitcher. Add all remaining ingredients (except pasta) and puree to combine.
steps.2: Prepare pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and add back to warm pot. Pour sauce mixture into pot and stir gently to combine. Turn heat to low and continue stirring for 2-3 minutes until sauce is warm (you may need to add more almond milk to maintain desired texture). Scoop into serving bowls, drizzle with your favorite TJ's olive oil and dig in.

319.title: Roasted Cauliflower Mezzelune & Fried Basil
319.description: Take pasta from familiar to fancy with a colorful, crunchy garnish of fried basil leaves.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Roasted Cauliflower Mezzelune
ingredients.2: 10 Fresh Basil Leaves, rinsed and dried

steps.0: Prepare mezzelune according to package directions. While mezzelune cooks, place a small skillet over medium heat and pour just enough sunflower oil in it to coat the bottom. Set a paper-towel-lined plate close to the skillet to drain and dry the fried basil. When the oil is hot, use tongs to carefully lower basil leaves into the skillet. Fry for 5–15 seconds, then flip them and fry another 5–15 seconds. Remove fried basil from skillet and set on paper towels to dry.
steps.1: Plate the cooked mezzelune and generously drizzle with olive oil. Garnish with grated parmesan and fried basil, and enjoy immediately.

320.title: Creamy Smoked Salmon Linguine & Capers
320.description: Our Smoked Salmon Dip with Capers goes from dip to dinner in under 10 minutes-just add pasta.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Spinach & Chive Linguine
ingredients.1: 1 tub TJ's Smoked Salmon Dip with Capers

steps.0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and boil 2-4 minutes, until al dente. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water; set aside. Add salmon dip and 1/2 cup pasta water to empty pot, stirring to combine. Return pasta to pot and toss with sauce to coat, adding more pasta water to thin out sauce if needed. Scoop pasta into bowls, garnish with lemon and serve immediately.

321.title: Fancy Lemon Farfalle
321.description: It's nice to feel fancy. It's even nicer to feel fancy without putting forth too much effort, or forking over too much of your hard-earned money. And that's exactly what you'll get with this Fancy Lemon Farfalle recipe. Fancy without the fuss. Or the price tag. This bright, vegetarian meal is creamy without being heavy, and it comes together in under 30 minutes. We've used Trader Joe's Organic Peas in our version, but feel free to experiment with ingredients and add-ons-artichoke hearts, sundried tomatoes, caramelized onions, pre-cooked chicken...the sky is the limit!

ingredients.0: 4 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided
ingredients.1: 1/2 cup TJ's Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs
ingredients.4: Zest and juice of 1 TJ's Lemon

steps.0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. While water boils, add 2 tablespoons oil and panko to a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir to coat panko with oil and saute for 5 minutes, shaking pan occasionally to ensure even browning. Pour toasted panko into a small bowl and set aside.
steps.1: Add remaining oil and onions to the pan and saute over medium heat until lightly browned, about 7 minutes. Turn off heat. Add creme fraiche, lemon zest and juice and stir gently to combine.
steps.2: While onions are cooking, add pasta to boiling water. Boil 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add peas and boil another 4-5 minutes. Drain pasta and add to creme fraiche mixture. Turn heat to high and stir until pasta is well coated and sauce thickens, about 2 minutes.
steps.3: Turn off heat and add Parmesan to pan, stirring to coat pasta. Season with salt & pepper, to taste. Ladle pasta into bowls, top with toasted panko and serve immediately.

322.title: Hot & Smoky Rigatoni Bake
322.description: Trader Joe's Rigatoni Pasta is the key to this smoky, cheesy casserole. Large enough to feed a crowd, this recipe can be made ahead for busy weeknights-once assembled, simply cover with foil and refrigerate or freeze, then pop it in the oven when you're ready to serve.

ingredients.0: 1 pound TJ's Rigatoni Pasta
ingredients.1: 1 package (about 1 pound) TJ's Sweet OR Hot Italian Sausage, casing removed
ingredients.2: 2 teaspoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.5: 1 cup TJ's Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese
ingredients.7: 2 cups TJ's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add rigatoni to pot and boil for 10 minutes, just until al dente. Drain and set aside.
steps.1: While pasta is cooking, in a small bowl, combine ricotta and half of the grated parmesan. Stir and set aside. In a large sauce pan over medium heat, add olive oil and sausage. Brown sausage for 7-9 minutes until it reaches 145°F, breaking meat up with a spoon as it cooks. Add paprika and stir to combine. Reduce heat to low and add marinara. Heat until sauce is warmed through, stirring occasionally.
steps.2: Return drained pasta to pot and add half of marinara mixture, stirring to combine. Gently fold in ricotta mixture. Transfer half of the pasta to a 9x13 pan. Sprinkle half of the Mozzarella over pasta. Top with remaining pasta and remaining sauce and spread in an even layer. Top pasta with remaining Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
steps.3: Place pan in middle rack of oven and bake until edges are bubbling and cheese is melted, about 35 minutes. Remove pan from oven and let cool for 10 minutes. Garnish with shredded basil, if desired, and serve.
steps.4: *If cooking from frozen, leave foil on and bake for 1 hour, then remove foil and bake an additional 15 minutes.

323.title: Irish Bangers & Champ
323.description: "Bangers and mash" may be the famed dish, but the champ here-TJ's Frozen Mashed Potatoes with scallions and butter-gives the dish a decidedly Irish turn.

ingredients.0: 3 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil
ingredients.11: TJ's Salt and Pepper, to taste

steps.0: Prepare the Bangers: In a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat, heat 3 tablespoons oil. Add bangers and brown on all sides, about 10 minutes. Add water and cook until bangers until internal temperature reaches 165?F. Remove bangers from pan and set aside.
steps.1: Prepare the Gravy: Add remaining oil, onion, and garlic to skillet and cook over medium heat until onions are translucent. Add flour and mix thoroughly. Add one cup of broth and stir until a thick paste is formed. Pour in remaining beef broth, one cup at a time, mixing thoroughly between additions. Continue heating until gravy has thickened (about 5 minutes). Turn heat to low and cover pan until ready to serve.
steps.2: Prepare the Champ: Heat frozen mashed potatoes in microwave or on the stovetop according to package directions. Once heated through, stir in butter and scallions. To serve, place a large scoop of champ on a plate, top with bangers and a generous ladleful of gravy.

324.title: Green Curry Chickpeas
324.description: Unassumingly gourmet-garbanzo beans, spinach, and richly roasted tomatoes are simmered in an exuberant Thai Green Curry Simmer Sauce. Spooned over quinoa, this robust, vegetarian stew wholly satisfies.

ingredients.0: 1 pkg Organic Red Cherry Tomatoes

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Toss the tomatoes lightly with olive oil, salt and pepper and spread them out into one layer on a sheet pan. Roast for 15 to 20 minutes, until the tomatoes are soft. While tomatoes are roasting, prepare quinoa according to package directions.
steps.1: Warm the curry sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garbanzo beans and tomatoes and stir to combine. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes. Add spinach and simmer until wilted and tender, about 10 minutes. Serve curry atop a bed of cooked quinoa.

325.title: Corny Squash Soup
325.description: This Corny Squash Soup is a little sweet, a lot savory, and positively brimming with a variety of delectable veggie flavors and textures, including soft chunks of Butternut Squash, sweet, snappy kernels of corn, and tasty, tender greens, all set in a base of oh-so-flavorful Trader Joe's Creamy Corn & Roasted Pepper Soup. Pair this soup with a generous hunk of toasty, crusty bread or your favorite sandwich for a deliciously dippable comfort food combo. Add a chilled glass of Chardonnay, and your meal becomes a consummately complemented brunch experience - no matter the season.

ingredients.0: 1 tablespoon TJ's Avocado Oil
ingredients.2: 1 bag TJ's Cut Butternut Squash, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
ingredients.3: 3/4 bag TJ's Organic Power to the Greens
ingredients.4: 1 container TJ's Creamy Corn & Roasted Red Pepper Soup
ingredients.5: 1 can TJ's Whole Kernel Corn, drained
ingredients.8: Fresh crusty bread for dipping (optional, but encouraged)

parsed_ing.4: Creamy Corn & Roasted Red Pepper Soup

steps.0: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add shallots and squash and saute for 5-8 minutes. Add soup, corn and greens to pan and bring to a low boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until greens are wilted and squash is fork-tender. Add salt and pepper to soup and stir to combine. Spoon soup into bowls and serve with fresh, crusty bread for dipping.

326.title: Cowboy Quinoa Bake
326.description: Combine Trader Joe's Cowboy Caviar Salsa with diced tomatoes, tender quinoa, and shredded cheese for a bright, spicy, Southwestern-style casserole.

ingredients.0: 1 cup Trader Joe's Organic Multicolor Quinoa, dry
ingredients.2: 1 can TJ's Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes
ingredients.3: 1 cup TJ's Mexican Blend Shredded Cheese
ingredients.4: Organic Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil Spray, to grease pan
ingredients.5: TJ's Sour Cream and Fresh Cilantro, for garnish (optional)

parsed_ing.2: Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes
parsed_ing.4: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Spray, to grease pan

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°. Add Quinoa and 2 cups water to a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, until water is completely absorbed. Turn off heat and fluff quinoa with a fork.
steps.1: In a large bowl, fold together cooked Quinoa, Cowboy Caviar, Diced Tomatoes and Cheese, just until mixed. Grease an 8-inch square baking pan with Organic Olive Oil Spray and spread mixture into pan. Cook for 25 minutes, then turn broiler on high and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Top with Sour Cream and Cilantro, if desired and serve.

ingredients.0: 1 Acorn Squash, peeled, de-seeded and cubed
ingredients.1: 2 teaspoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.5: 1 jar TJ's Chipotle Black Bean Dip
ingredients.7: Lime wedges & Fresh Cilantro, chopped, for garnish

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400ºF. Place squash in a large bowl. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and taco seasoning and toss to coat. Spread seasoned squash on a large baking sheet and roast for 20-25 min until fork-tender, tossing squash halfway through cooking.
steps.1: While squash is roasting, remove lid from Chipotle Black Bean Dip and microwave on half-power for one-minute intervals, stirring in between, until warm. Warm tortillas over low heat.
steps.2: To assemble tacos: spread warm bean dip on tortillas and layer with cabbage, squash and salsa. Garnish with cilantro and limes wedges. Serve immediately.

328.title: Teriyaki BBQ Tofu with Soycutash Greens
328.description: Inspired by a similar dish at very popular LA restaurant, we decided to recreate using our own TJ's products! It's simple, nutritious, satisfying, and much, much lighter on your wallet.

ingredients.0: 1 package Trader Joe's Organic Baked Teriyaki Tofu
ingredients.1: 1 cup TJs Organic Brown Sugar BBQ Sauce & Marinade, plus more to finish, if desired
ingredients.3: 2 tablespoons water, or more if needed
ingredients.4: 2 bags TJ's Organic Power to the Greens

parsed_ing.1: TJs Organic Brown Sugar BBQ Sauce & Marinade, plus more to finish, if desired

steps.0: Remove tofu from package and pat dry with paper towels; place in a shallow dish and cover with barbecue sauce. Set aside for 30 minutes.
steps.1: Place soycutash in a microwave safe dish, add water and cover with damp paper towels; heat on high for 2 minutes or until heated through. Set aside.
steps.2: Heat grill to high, add tofu and sear on both sides; lower heat and continue to cook until warmed through; about 5 minutes.
steps.3: Heat olive oil in a large skillet; add greens and saute until wilted, about 3 to 5 minutes; season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and divide between 2 plates. Divide soycutash and layer atop greens. Slice tofu lengthwise, arrange atop soycutash and drizzle with warmed barbecue sauce, if desired.

ingredients.0: 6 Tbsp TJ's Organic Sugar
ingredients.1: 5 Tbsp TJ's Reduced Sodium Soy Sauce
ingredients.3: 1 Tbsp iuice from 1/2 TJ's Lime , squeezed fresh
ingredients.4: 1 Tbsp TJ's Organic Toasted Sesame Oil
ingredients.6: 1 pkg (about 1 lb) TJ's USDA Choice Premium Angus Beef Flank steak, sliced against the grain into thin strips
ingredients.8: 1 cup TJ's Raw Sauerkraut, with Persian Cucumbers removed
ingredients.9: 1 cup TJ's Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage
ingredients.10: 8 TJ's de mi Abuela Corn and Wheat Tortillas
ingredients.12: TJ's Traditional Tunisian Harissa, to taste

parsed_ing.6: USDA Choice Premium Angus Beef Flank steak
parsed_ing.10: de mi Abuela Corn and Wheat Tortillas

steps.0: Combine sugar, soy sauce, sriracha, lime juice, sesame oil and garlic in a shallow dish. Add steak, cover and marinate for 1 hour; turn after 30 minutes.
steps.1: While steak is marinating combine sauerkraut and fresh cabbage together and set aside.
steps.2: Preheat grill to medium-high. Remove steak and discard marinade. Thread steak onto skewers; sprinkle with salt. Place skewers on grill and cook 3 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness. Remove, cover and set aside.
steps.3: Grill tortillas 30 seconds on each side or until lightly charred; keep warm.
steps.4: Place 2 tortillas per plate, and divide steak evenly among tortillas. Top each taco with cabbage mixture; sprinkle with onions, top with harissa and serve.

330.title: Loaded Baked Potato Soup Bread Bowl

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon, sliced into strips
ingredients.2: 1 quart package TJ's Organic Chicken Broth
ingredients.5: 3/4 cup TJ's Unbleached All Purpose flour
ingredients.10: 1 block TJ's Cheddar Cheese with Caramelized Onions, shredded
ingredients.12: 4 TJ's Sourdough Bread Boules (optional serving bowl)

steps.0: In a large skillet, cook bacon lardons over medium heat, about 6 minutes or until crisp. Remove cooked bacon from heat and set aside to drain on paper towels. Reserve 2 tablespoons bacon grease in skillet. Cook mirepoix in bacon grease over medium-high heat, about 6 minutes or until veggies are almost tender.
steps.1: In a large pot or Dutch oven, add cooked mirepoix, broth and frozen potatoes. Stir and heat mixture until it starts to boil, then reduce the heat to low.
steps.2: Meanwhile, in the same skillet used to cook the bacon, melt butter over low heat. Add flour and whisk until smooth. Cook and stir 1 minute to brown the flour slightly. Gradually stir in 2 cups of the milk. Pour milk mixture into potato mixture. Add remaining 1 cup milk, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over medium heat, stirring constantly with whisk, until soup is bubbling around the edges.
steps.3: Finally, stir in half of the cooked bacon, the sour cream and, half of the cheese. Cook until thoroughly heated and cheese is melted. To serve, garnish individual bowls of soup with remaining bacon & cheese then sprinkle with chives.

ingredients.0: 1 (quart) package TJ's Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Sweet Italian Sausage, casing removed

steps.0: In a medium saucepan, heat soup over medium heat, about 5 minutes. Stir occasionally until simmering; reduce heat to low.
steps.1: While soup cooks, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add sausage to pan and spread evenly. Break sausage pieces into smaller bits with a wooden spoon and brown until heated to 165°F, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from heat.
steps.2: To serve, ladle the soup into individual bowls, then garnish with sausage, cheese and chives. Enjoy!

332.title: Sweet & Spicy Pecan-Crusted Salmon
332.description: This fish dish gets its zing from a tangy honey mustard spread and our very own Sweet & Spicy Pecans.

ingredients.0: 1/2 cup (1 stick) TJ's Unsalted Butter, melted
ingredients.1: 3 Tablespoons TJ's Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce
ingredients.4: 2 Tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh TJ's Rosemary
ingredients.6: 1/4 cup TJ's Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs
ingredients.7: 1/4 cup finely chopped TJ's Sweet and Spicy Pecans
ingredients.8: 4 teaspoons chopped TJ's Parsley, plus more for garnish
ingredients.11: TJ's Fresh Salmon Boneless Skinless Fillets (2 large fillets)

steps.0: 1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
steps.1: 2. In a small bowl, stir together melted butter, mustard, and honey.
steps.2: 3. Cut potatoes into eighths and coat with 1/2 cup of the honey mustard mixture, set the rest of the mixture aside. Sprinkle rosemary over potatoes.
steps.3: 4. Grease a baking sheet with canola oil spray then spread coated potatoes in an even layer, leaving room to add the salmon filets later. Begin baking potatoes for 20 minutes.
steps.4: 5. Meanwhile, in another small bowl, mix together panko crumbs, pecans, and parsley, then set aside.
steps.5: 6. Place salmon filets skin-side down on a plate. Season with salt and pepper then brush generously with reserved honey mustard mixture. Sprinkle the tops of the fillets with the panko crumb mixture.
steps.6: 7. After 20 minutes, remove tray of potatoes from oven then add salmon filets, skin side down on the tray next to the potatoes. Bake salmon and potatoes for an additional 10 to 15 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. Serve with a wedge of lemon and garnish with extra parsley.

333.title: Sriracha BBQ Chicken Skewers
333.description: The formula for Trader Joe's Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce is simple: sriracha + BBQ Sauce... but, the genius is in the details. We combine spicy Sriracha (our very recipe of chili peppers, garlic, sugar, and vinegar), and combine it with what some might call "Memphis-style" BBQ Sauce-referring to its tomato-base, thick texture, reddish-brown color, and the taste of sweet molasses.This marvelous marriage tastes of Sriracha and... BBQ Sauce. It's garlicky, sweet, and spicy-all at once. Try it in this simple recipe for grilled chicken skewers, or use it to enhance burgers, kabobs, beef or pork ribs, veggies, grilled seafood...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Boneless Chicken Breasts, cut into 2" cubes
ingredients.1: 1/2 cup TJ's Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce
ingredients.2: 2 tablespoons chopped TJ's Fresh Cilantro (optional garnish)
ingredients.3: You will also need Bamboo Skewers, soaked in water for at least 20 minutes

parsed_ing.1: Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce
parsed_ing.3: also need Bamboo Skewers, soaked in water for at least 20 minutes

steps.0: Heat grill to medium-high. Thread 4 or 5 chicken pieces onto each skewer.
steps.1: Grill chicken until it begins to brown, flipping often, about 5-7 minutes. During the final stages of cooking, continually baste chicken with Sriracha BBQ sauce, about 3-5 minutes. Remove from grill when internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

ingredients.0: 1 pound TJ's Organic Ground Beef or Grass Fed Angus Ground Beef
ingredients.2: 1/3 cup finely shredded TJ's Cheddar with Caramelized Onions
ingredients.3: 4 slices TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, chopped
ingredients.4: 1 Tablespoon TJ's Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce
ingredients.7: 1 teaspoon TJ's Dijon Mustard with White Wine

steps.0: In a bowl, with attitude, combine ground beef with 21 Seasoning Salute.
steps.1: Separate beef into 8 portions, like you mean business, then form each into a patty.
steps.2: With enthusiasm, mix cheddar, bacon and sriracha BBQ sauce together in a separate bowl to form the stuffing.
steps.3: Spoon the stuffing evenly in the center of 4 of the patties. Top each patty with another patty and press down on the edges with your fingertips.
steps.4: Grill burgers over medium-high heat, flipping once until desired doneness is reached, approximately 4 minutes each side for medium. Or in a medium skillet over medium-high heat, sear burgers 4 minutes on each side.
steps.5: To make the sauce, combine mayo, garlic and mustard. Serve burgers with "sauce." ENJOY! You Sassy Thing, YOU!
steps.6: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2015 Crew Member Strut Your Stuffed Recipe Contest 2nd Runner-Up - Donalee Quinn - Boise, ID (Store #360)

335.title: Teriyaki Chicken Fried Rice Stuffed Pineapple
335.description: "I'm stuffed!" It's the universal exclamation of fullness, content, and satisfaction after a great meal-it's also how you'll feel after enjoying this Trader Joe's Crew Member-created recipe for Teriyaki Chicken Fried Rice Stuffed Pineapple. Starchy brown rice and pineapple pieces are stir-fried with our ever-popular Soyaki Sauce to create a tantalizingly tangy base for savory Trader Joe's BBQ Chicken Teriyaki. By serving the finished dish in its very own hollowed out pineapple half, you'll ensure nothing goes to waste. And by skipping the takeout in favor of a trip to your neighborhood Trader Joe's, your wallet will remain stuffed, too!

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Pineapple
ingredients.1: 2 bags TJ's Frozen Jasmine Rice, heated
ingredients.2: 1 bag TJ's Frozen BBQ Chicken Teriyaki

steps.0: Slice whole pineapple lengthwise into 2 halves.
steps.1: With a sharp knife, carefully score the insides of both halves like a checker board. With a large spoon, scoop out the inside which will produce bite-sized pineapple pieces. Set pineapple pieces along with their juice aside in a separate bowl.
steps.2: Add 2 tablespoons of coconut oil to a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook for 5 minutes until heated through. Add cooked rice, soyaki and reserved pineapple pieces and juices to the pan and continue to stir to heat through until the rice becomes a little sticky, about 2 minutes. Add sauce packets that come with the BBQ Chicken Teriyaki. Continue to saute until heated through.
steps.3: Add fried rice to the pineapple halves and serve.
steps.4: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2015 Crew Member Strut Your Stuffed Recipe Contest Winner - Michael Ryan - Cerritos, CA (Store #104)

336.title: Lasagna Carbonara
336.description: With all the rich, smoky flavors of spaghetti carbonara, and the gooey, cheesy goodness of home-baked lasagna, this recipe brings two giants of cozy, pasta-based comfort food together at last. Starting with the basic building blocks of a world-class lasagna (Ricotta, Shredded Mozzarella, and the phenomenally easy-to-use no-boil Trader Joe's Lasagna Noodles), we add Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, peas, and plenty of garlic, carbonara-fying the dish into a marvelous pasta mash-up.

ingredients.0: 1 package Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked crispy, drained and chopped into small pieces
ingredients.1: 2 cups TJ's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided
ingredients.2: 1/2 can TJ's Cannellini White Kidney Beans, rinsed, drained and pureed until smooth
ingredients.3: 1/2 tub (1 cup) TJ's Whole Milk Ricotta
ingredients.5: 4 medium cloves TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic, minced
ingredients.7: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Red Chili Pepper Flakes, or more to taste
ingredients.8: TJ's Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, to taste
ingredients.9: 1 cup TJ's Organic Frozen Peas, defrosted and drained
ingredients.10: 3/4 cup TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth, divided
ingredients.11: 1 box TJ's No Boil Italian Lasagna Noodles

parsed_ing.0: Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked crispy, drained and chopped into small pieces

steps.0: Heat the oven to 350°F and arrange a rack in the middle. Combine chopped bacon and 1 cup mozzarella cheese in a medium bowl, set aside.
steps.1: In a large bowl, place the half can of pureed cannellini beans, 1 cup ricotta, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 4 minced garlic cloves, 1/2 teaspoon basil and 1/4 teaspoon of chili flakes. Mix until combined, creating a cheese spread. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
steps.2: In a blender or food processor, combine 1 cup defrosted peas, 1/2 cup parmesan, and 1/2 cup broth. Blend until smooth. Season pea sauce with salt and pepper, to taste.
steps.3: Spread 1/2 cup of pea sauce in an even layer over the bottom of an 8-by-8-inch baking dish. Place two sheets of lasagna over the top of the sauce in the middle of the dish. There will be room around the edges of the noodles. Add one third of the ricotta cheese spread over the noodles. Use the back of a spoon to spread the cheese to the edges of the noodles. Next, sprinkle one third of the bacon mixture on top. Add another layer of noodles and repeat process two more times. Cover the top layer of noodles with remaining pea sauce. Sprinkle 1 cup of mozzarella over the top. For extra moisture, add 1/4 cup broth around the edges of the noodle stack.
steps.4: Coat 1 side of a large piece of aluminum foil with canola oil spray and cover the dish tightly with the foil, oil-side down. Bake until the sauce is starting to bubble around the edges, about 40 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking until the top of the cheese begins to brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove the pan and let cool for at least 15 minutes before slicing.

ingredients.0: 2 cups TJ's Gluten Free Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta
ingredients.1: 1 1/2 Tablespoons of TJ's Clarified Butter (Ghee), or more
ingredients.2: 1 1/2 cups trimmed and cut TJ's Asparagus (sliced into thirds)
ingredients.3: 1 1/2 cups TJ's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes
ingredients.4: 1/2 cup fresh sliced TJ's Basil (sliced into thin strips)
ingredients.6: 1/2 cup TJ's Dry Toasted Pignolias (Pine Nuts)

parsed_ing.0: Gluten Free Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta

steps.0: Bring a large pot of water to boil, adding salt, if desired. Add 2 cups of pasta and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally for about 7-10 minutes or until al dente. Do not overcook. Remove pasta and drain thoroughly. Set aside.
steps.1: Heat a large pan over medium heat. Add 1 1/2 tablespoons of clarified butter and heat another minute or so until it starts to shimmer. Add  1 1/2 cups of sliced asparagus, stirring until all sides are coated with clarified butter. Let cook without stirring for 2-3 more minutes until asparagus edges begin to turn golden. Add 1 1/2 cups of grape tomatoes and continue stirring until tomatoes are heated through, about 2-3 minutes. Add as much cooked pasta as desired to the pan, then mix in 1/2 cup fresh sliced basil, the juice of 1/2 a lemon and 1/2 cup of pine nuts. Keep stirring until ingredients are well incorporated, about 1-2 minutes. At this point, add up to 1 tablespoon more clarified butter if desired. Stir. Divide the pasta among two plates and top with shaved cheese blend. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 4 TJ's Portobello Mushrooms (2 packages), stemmed
ingredients.1: 6 Tbsp TJ's 100% Kalamata Olive Oil, divided
ingredients.2: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.3: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1 package (about 15-20 spears) TJ's Asparagus, bottoms trimmed
ingredients.9: 4 Tbsp TJ's Genova Pesto or TJ's Pesto Alla Genovese

steps.0: 1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
steps.1: 2. Arrange mushrooms stem side down on a foil-lined baking sheet. Brush 1 tablespoon of olive oil all over each mushroom then season with salt and pepper.
steps.2: 3. On a separate foil-lined baking sheet, arrange asparagus. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon of olive oil then season with salt and pepper. Toss veggies to coat evenly. Set aside.
steps.3: 4. Place mushrooms on the center rack of the oven and roast for 25 minutes.
steps.4: 5. After 15 minutes of roasting, flip the mushrooms. Place the tray of asparagus on the bottom rack and roast with the mushrooms for the last 10 minutes.
steps.5: 6. Meanwhile, in a medium sauce pan over medium heat, add crumbled polenta and 1/4 cup of water. Break up polenta with a spoon and stir until the mixture is smooth. Heat until bubbly, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
steps.6: 7. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in medium pan on medium heat. Saute sliced red onions until caramelized, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
steps.7: 8. Remove mushrooms and asparagus from oven, and slice asparagus spears into thirds.
steps.8: 9. Assemble your stacks. In order, evenly divide the following ingredients among 4 small plates, a bed of polenta, ricotta, sliced asparagus, portobello mushroom, pesto, caramelized onions and top with sun-dried tomatoes.

ingredients.0: 1 lb leftover cooked TJ's Turkey, diced 1/2 cup TJ's Canned Corn 1/2 cup TJ's Frozen Shelled Edamame 1/2 package TJ's Mirepoix 1 carton TJ's Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup (seasonal) 1 cup (or more) TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth 1 box TJ's Pie Crusts, both crusts defrosted 1-2 Tbsp TJ's Olive Oil for sauteing

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place one pie crust in the bottom of a pie dish and par-bake until lightly golden, about 10-12 minutes. Set aside.
steps.1: In a medium-sized bowl, mix condensed mushroom soup and 1 cup broth (adding up to 1/2 cup more broth as needed until desired thickness is reached). Set aside.
steps.2: In a large pan over medium heat, add oil. When heated, add mirepoix, corn and edamame and saute until fragrant and onions turn translucent, about 3 minutes. Add soup mixture and turkey to pan and cook, stirring often, until filling is heated through and begins to simmer. Remove from heat.
steps.3: Pour filling into pre-baked bottom crust, then cover with remaining unbaked crust. Cut a slit or design in top crust to allow venting. Place pie in center rack of oven and bake at 350°F for 30-40 minutes until crust turns golden brown. Let cool slightly before serving.

ingredients.0: 4 cans of TJ's Organic Vegetarian Chili
ingredients.4: 1 box of TJ's Cornbread Baking Mix
ingredients.5: 1 cup of TJ's Mexican Blend Cheese
ingredients.6: 1/2 stick TJ's Unsalted Butter, sliced (optional garnish)
ingredients.7: 2 TJ's Jalapenos, deseeded and diced (optional garnish)

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Empty 4 cans of chili on the bottom of a greased 8 x 10 inch baking dish, then set aside. In a large mixing bowl, beat egg, oil and milk. Add cornbread mix and cheese and stir until moistened. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish over the vegetarian chili. Spread the batter with a spatula in an even layer. Bake for approximately 35 to 40 minutes until the cornbread is golden brown and an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Let cool for 5-10 minutes. Slice into squares and garnish with butter and diced jalapenos. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1/3 cup TJ's Organic Bread Crumbs
ingredients.1: 1/3 cup TJ's Unbleached All Purpose Flour
ingredients.2: 3 tsp TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.3: 3 tsp TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.8: 1 TJ's All Natural Crate Free Pork Tenderloin
ingredients.10: 1 1/2 Tbsp TJ's Dijon Mustard with White Wine

parsed_ing.8: All Natural Crate Free Pork Tenderloin

steps.0: Preheat the oven to 400°F. Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray or line with foil and set aside.
steps.1: In a medium-sized bowl, add milk, eggs, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper. Whisk to combine; set aside. In a medium-sized baking dish, combine bread crumbs, flour, 2 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons salt, paprika, and garlic powder and mix with a fork until blended; set aside.
steps.2: Dip pork loin in milk wash and roll to coat evenly on all sides. Dip pork loin in breading mixture and roll to coat on all sides. Place pork loin on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees.
steps.3: While pork loin cooks, assemble dipping sauce: in a medium sized bowl, combine mayonnaise, mustard, honey, vinegar and a pinch of salt. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
steps.4: Once pork reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees, remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Slice and serve with dipping sauce.

ingredients.0: 2 Tbsp Clarified Butter or Canola Oil
ingredients.6: 2 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth (or Water)
ingredients.12: TJ's Avocado's Number Guacamole or TJ's Reduced Guilt Guacamole

steps.0: To prepare Mexican Rice: In large heavy-bottomed pan or dutch oven, heat oil until it shimmers. Add onion and saute until softened, about 2 minutes. Add rice, coating all the grains with oil. Stir often, until rice begins to brown, about 3 minutes. Add cumin, salt and garlic and stir about 1 minute until fragrant. Stir in broth and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and simmer about 15 minutes or until all liquid absorbs.
steps.1: Assemble bowls with rice, carnitas, corn and black beans. Garnish with cheese, guacamole and salsa.

343.title: Seared Spicy Peanut Ahi Tuna Tacos

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Frozen Ahi Tuna Steaks (about 1 pound)
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Smallish Gems Sweet Lettuce (seasonal) OR TJ's Romaine Hearts, leaves separated, rinsed, patted dry and chilled in the refrigerator
ingredients.3: 1/2 cup sliced TJ's Sugar Snap Peas
ingredients.4: 1/2 cup diced TJ's Sliced Fresh Del Monte Gold Pineapple Spears
ingredients.5: 1 TJ's Valencia Orange, peeled and diced
ingredients.8: 1/4 cup TJ's Old Fashioned Salted Blister Peanuts OR TJ's Organic Roasted & Salted Valencia Peanuts

parsed_ing.4: Sliced Fresh Del Monte Gold Pineapple Spears

steps.0: To marinate fish, remove frozen Ahi from packaging and place into a medium baking dish. Pour half the bottle of Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette over steaks, cover dish with plastic wrap and leave in refrigerator 8 hours or overnight, flipping steaks half way through. Alternatively, defrosted steaks can marinate in vinaigrette for 1 hour in the refrigerator prior to preparation. To sear the Ahi, bring a medium frying pan up to medium high to high heat, and coat the bottom of the pan lightly with canola oil spray. Remove and discard excess marinade from fish. Sear the fish for 1-2 minutes on each side until desired doneness. Remove from pan onto a cutting board and slice against the grain into 1/2 inch-thick slices. Arrange tuna slices atop lettuce leaves, then sprinkle with snap peas, pineapple, oranges, avocado, chives and peanuts. Drizzle fresh dressing over each taco and enjoy!

344.title: Filet & Rib Eye Burger
344.description: There are burgers, and then there are chopped Filet & Rib-Eye Burgers. Grilled to perfection, stacked to impress, this rich, juicy burger calls for a serious pre-bite squish down or a knife and fork. It's robustly delicious!

ingredients.0: 1 lb. TJ's Beef Filet Mignon, cut into 1 inch cubes
ingredients.1: 1/2 lb. TJ's Beef Rib Eye Steak, cut into 1 inch cubes

steps.0: Bring meat to room temperature. Place into meat grinder or food processor; grind. Add to large bowl and season with Everyday Seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix well and form into four patties. (If you'd like to skip this burger-making step, start with a package of TJ's Organic Ground Beef Patties instead.) Baste burgers with butter; place on grill or in a cast iron skillet and cook over medium flame. Turn frequently until medium or pale pink on the inside. About 6 minutes per side. Remove from grill, cover and rest for 5 minutes. Place each patty on a roll bottom and top with hot sweet mustard, mayo, pickle, butter lettuce, 2 slices tomato, and finally, roll top.

ingredients.0: 1/2 quart TJ's Buttermilk
ingredients.1: 2 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps.0: Combine all ingredients in a resealable bag. Place in refrigerator to marinate for at least 4 hours (preferably overnight). Remove chicken and excess marinade and let drumsticks come to room temperature. Grill drumsticks on medium-high heat for about 30 minutes, flipping every 5 minutes until juices run clear or until internal temperature reaches 165. Let rest 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy! Serving suggestion: Serve with TJ’s Green Beans and Buttermilk Biscuits.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Carne Asada Autentica
ingredients.2: 1 cup TJ's Mexican Blend Shredded Cheese, divided

steps.0: Grill Carne Asada Autentica on high heat, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from grill and allow to rest for about 5 minutes, then slice across the grain. On each plate, arrange lettuce, sprinkle 1/4 cup cheese, drizzle 1 tablespoon of Cilantro Dressing, place carne asada slices and top with avocado. Dollop 1 tablespoon of sour cream over the top and serve with a side of salsa. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

ingredients.0: 3/4 bag TJ's Shredded Cabbage
ingredients.1: 1 container TJ's Fresh Mango & Pineapple Salsa or TJ's Pineapple Salsa
ingredients.4: 12 oz piece TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly

steps.0: Mix cabbage, salsa and cumin together, set aside. Wrap 6 tortillas in a paper towel and microwave for 1 minute. Remove from microwave and set aside to cool slightly. Add full piece of pork belly to sauté pan and brown on all sides until golden and warmed through. Remove from pan and slice into very thin slivers. Place a tortilla on a plate and spread with a layer of Avocado’s Number, top with cabbage mixture, pork, lots of lime and cilantro; fold over and eat right away.

ingredients.0: 2 cups TJ's Low Sodium Chicken Broth
ingredients.1: 6 oz TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly, 3/4 inch dice
ingredients.4: TJ's Red Pepper Flakes, to taste

steps.0: Place broth in a 4 quart stock pot over medium heat; add kale and boil until just wilted, 10 to 15 minutes or until desired tenderness. Stir until all greens are wet. Add pork belly to a large skillet over medium heat and brown on all sides until golden and crisp. Remove from pan to a paper towel. Pour off all but 2 tablespoons of fat. Lower heat; add garlic to skillet, and sauté until garlic begins to sizzle. Add a pinch of red pepper flakes and sauté until the garlic is tender and lightly golden, 1 to 2 minutes longer. Pour kale, broth and pork belly into skillet and deglaze pan while sautéing kale until heated through, about 3 to 4 minutes. Serve with a side of cornbread.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Boneless Chicken Breasts, cut into 2" cubes
ingredients.1: 1 bottle of TJ's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Sliced Fresh Pineapple, cut into chunks
ingredients.3: 2 TJ's Green Bell Peppers, cut into 1.5" pieces
ingredients.4: 2 or 3 TJ's Oranges cut into approximately 6 slices (keep peel on)
ingredients.5: 2 TJ's Red Onions, sliced into large chunks

steps.0: Preheat grill to 375°F. Put cut chicken pieces in a bowl and the cut veggies and fruit into another bowl. Fill each bowl with half the bottle of spicy peanut vinaigrette. Let marinate for at least 20 minutes, though preferably overnight. Soak skewers in water while ingredients are marinating.
steps.1: When ready, assemble ingredients on skewer in the following order: green pepper, onion chunk, pineapple slice, chicken piece, orange slice (skew through the skin), pineapple slice, chicken piece. Repeat until skewer is filled (not too tightly).
steps.2: To keep the skewers from sticking, spray the top of the grill with canola oil. Grill for 12-15 minutes (turning skewer at 6 min). Chicken is done once it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F.
steps.3: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 1st Place Winner - Shari Walsh.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Taquitos (Beef or Chicken)
ingredients.2: 2 cups TJ's Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend, divided
ingredients.4: 3 TJ's Green Onions, white and green parts, sliced
ingredients.5: 1/2 can TJ's Fire Roasted Diced Green Chiles

steps.0: Preheat oven to 425°F. Arrange taquitos in a single layer in a 7-inch by 10-inch baking dish and cover evenly with enchilada sauce. Top with 1 1/2 cups cheese, followed by olives and chiles.
steps.1: Bake casserole on center rack of oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Remove pan from oven and garnish with remaining cheese and green onions. Allow to cool slightly before serving.

ingredients.0: 1 package (17.6 oz.) Gnocchi, cooked and drained
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Brussels Sprouts, microwaved and quartered
ingredients.2: 1 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 4 strips TJ's Peppered Uncured Turkey Bacon, diced
ingredients.6: 1 cup TJ's New Zealand Organic Cheddar, grated

steps.0: Heat olive oil in a large pan on medium heat, then saute diced bacon, onions and Brussels Sprouts until onions turn translucent and Brussels Sprouts start to caramelize. Add garlic and stir occasionally for another two minutes. Meanwhile, add cheese, milk, butter, flour & nutmeg to the pot with the cooked gnocchi and heat on medium-low until the cheese melts. Then fold bacon-veggie saute mixture into the pasta. Enjoy!

ingredients.0: 1/2 package TJ's Steamed Lentils
ingredients.1: 1 pouch TJ's Frozen Organic Brown Rice, heated
ingredients.2: 2 large handfuls of TJ's Baby Spinach
ingredients.5: 2 tablespoon TJ's Sundried Tomatoes in Olive Oil
ingredients.6: 2 medium TJ's Garlic Cloves, peeled and diced
ingredients.9: 1 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps.0: Add onions to a large skillet on medium heat then stir in olive oil and garlic. Add spinach and bell pepper and cook until spinach begins to wilt. Empty half the package of lentils into the mix and then add sundried tomatoes. Heat and stir another two minutes and then mix in the parsley and balsamic glaze. Divide brown rice onto individual plates and ladle sauté over each serving.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Mashed Potatoes (frozen)
ingredients.1: 1 tablespoon TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.2: 1/4 cup TJ's Organic Sweet Onion, diced
ingredients.4: 1/2 teaspoon TJ's Spices of the World, Garlic Powder

steps.0: Preheat oven to 400°F. Prepare mashed potatoes according to package instructions, set aside.
steps.1: In a skillet, saute onions and ground turkey seasoned with garlic powder and salt in olive oil until turkey begins to brown. Layer the bottom of an 8-inch square casserole dish with cooked turkey, set aside.
steps.2: Add corn to a food processor and pulse until somewhat creamy, with some chunks of corn remaining. Place pureed corn over turkey. Top with mashed potatoes.
steps.3: Bake on center rack of oven for approximately 25 minutes, or until the potatoes begin to brown around the edges. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.

ingredients.0: 2 small TJ's Acorn Squash (seasonal), sliced lengthwise and cleaned of seeds and string
ingredients.2: TJ's Sea Salt and TJ's Black Pepper, to taste
ingredients.4: 1 cup TJ's Frozen Kale, defrosted and squeezed of water
ingredients.7: 2 packages TJ's Polenta, sliced into 24 1" rounds
ingredients.9: 1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese

parsed_ing.2: Sea Salt and TJ's Black Pepper

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375°F. Slice squash halves into 1/2" half-moon-shaped slices. Spray a large baking sheet with a light dusting of oil and sprinkle with a little sea salt and pepper. Place the slices on the sheet in a single layer. Lightly spray the tops and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake until the slices are tender, about 35 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool; lower oven temperature to 350°F.
steps.1: Place ricotta, kale, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt into a bowl and combine. Set aside.
steps.2: Assemble the stacks: Coat the bottom of a 9" x 13" baking dish with a light layer of sauce. Lay 12 Polenta rounds side by side and season with a little salt and pepper; cover with sauce. Next, top each round with squash slices facing each other, trim to fit neatly. Top each set of squash with the ricotta-kale mixture and smooth out. Top with more sauce, followed by a layer of polenta and the last layer of squash. Pour over the remainder of sauce and top each stack with Mozzarella cheese, followed by Parmesan cheese.
steps.3: Cover with foil and bake for about 40 minutes. Uncover for the last 10 minutes or until cheese is golden and bubbly. Remove from oven and rest 15 minutes before serving.

ingredients.0: 1/2 large TJ's Spaghetti Squash (seasonally available)
ingredients.4: TJ's Grated Parmesan Cheese, to taste
ingredients.5: TJ's Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, to taste

steps.0: Cook the squash: Use a sharp knife to cut squash in half lengthwise. Use a large table spoon to scrape out the seeds and string. Season with salt and pepper, place cut side up in a microwave safe dish and add about an inch of water to the bottom of the dish. Cover dish with cling wrap and microwave on high for 10-14 minutes. Allow to cool enough to handle before unwrapping. Use a table fork to scrape squash from top to bottom to separate flesh into strands of "spaghetti."
steps.1: Prepare Meatball Marinara: Place meatballs in large skillet and cook according to package stove top directions. Once warmed through, add marinara sauce and cooked squash. Toss to cover and heat through; add Parmesan, salt and pepper, to taste. Serve right away.

ingredients.0: 1 large TJ's Butternut Squash (seasonally available), peeled, sliced lengthwise and cleaned of seeds and string
ingredients.4: 2 cups TJ's Chopped Frozen Spinach, defrosted and squeezed of some water
ingredients.7: 12 sheets TJ's No Boil Lasagna Noodles
ingredients.9: 1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375°F. Slice squash halves into 1/2" half-moon-shaped pieces. Spray a large baking sheet with a light dusting of oil and sprinkle with a little sea salt and pepper. Place the slices on the sheet in a single layer. Lightly spray the tops and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake until the slices are tender, about 35 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool; lower oven temperature to 350°F.
steps.1: Empty Alfredo sauce into a sauce pan; warm over very low heat, just enough to liquefy, and remove from heat. Place ricotta, spinach, nutmeg and a pinch of salt into a bowl and combine. Set aside.
steps.2: Assemble lasagna: Coat the bottom of a 9" x 13" baking dish with a light layer of Alfredo sauce. Place four sheets of noodles side by side and top them with more Alfredo sauce. Next, add squash in a single layer. Top squash with more Alfredo sauce and another layer of noodles. Top noodles with all of the ricotta-spinach mixture and smooth out. Top with another layer of noodles, then Alfredo sauce and the last of the squash. Pour over the remainder of Alfredo sauce and top with Mozzarella & Parmesan cheeses.
steps.3: Cover lasagna with foil and bake for 40 minutes. Remove foil and bake another 5-10 minutes or until cheese is golden and bubbly. Remove from oven and rest 15 minutes before slicing.

ingredients.0: 4 large TJ's Russet Potatoes
ingredients.2: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.3: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1 jar TJ's Corn and Chile Tomato-Less Salsa
ingredients.5: 1 cup TJ's Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend
ingredients.6: 1 cup TJ's Nacho Cheese Tortilla Chips, crushed

steps.0: Position rack in top third of oven and preheat to 425ºF. Pierce each potato several times with a knife. Pre-cook potatoes in the microwave on high for about 7 minutes or until they give when pressed. Remove from microwave, place into oven and bake directly on rack until tender, about 30 minutes. When cool enough to handle, transfer potatoes to a work surface and cut off the top (about 1/4-inch lengthwise) of each potato. Scoop center of potato from skins into large bowl, leaving about 1/4-inch of potato lining the skin. Mash with milk; season with salt and pepper, to taste. Mix in corn salsa, chips, half of the cheese, half of the cilantro and half of the onions. Fill each of the skins with the potato mixture, mounding it in the center. Top with remainder of cheese. Return to oven and bake until heated through, about 20 minutes. Garnish finished potatoes with sour cream, remainder of green onions and cilantro.

ingredients.0: 2 pouches TJ's  Fully Cooked Organic Thai Jasmine Rice, cooked according to package directions and cooled
ingredients.1: 1 jar TJ's Corn and Chile Tomato-Less Salsa
ingredients.3: 1/2  package TJ's Mélange a Trois Peppers
ingredients.4: 3/4 cup TJ's Green Olives Stuffed with Garlic, coarsely chopped
ingredients.6: 1/3 cup TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.10: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.11: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.12: 1 pound TJ's Large Fully Cooked Shrimp, defrosted

parsed_ing.0: Fully Cooked Organic Thai Jasmine Rice

steps.0: In a medium bowl, combine rice, corn salsa, green onions, peppers, olives and cilantro. Set aside. Blend oil, lime juice & zest, cumin, salt & pepper in blender or food processor until smooth. Toss mixture over shrimp, then cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate rice and shrimp separately in fridge for 30 minutes to marinate flavors and to allow shrimp to "cook" in lime juice. When ready to serve, mix the rice and shrimp together; season with salt and pepper to taste. Let dish come to room temperature and serve.

ingredients.0: 1 Tbsp TJ's Cooking Oil
ingredients.2: 1 package TJ's Chicken & Bell Pepper Sausage
ingredients.6: 1 cup TJ's Organic Tomato Basil Marinara
ingredients.8: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.9: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste

steps.0: Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. When oil shimmers, add chicken drumsticks and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes. Stir in sausage and heat for a minute and a half longer. Mix in quinoa, 21 Seasoning Salute, olive tapenade and tomato basil marinara. Pour over vegetable stock; stir and bring to a gentle boil. Cover with a lid; adjust heat to medium-low and cook until liquid is absorbed and chicken is done, about 13-15 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning.
steps.1: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2012 Quintessential Quinoa Recipe Contest Winner - Mya Zeronia.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Six Piece Organic Chicken Family Pack
ingredients.2: 2 tablespoons TJ's Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil
ingredients.3: 2 large TJ's Sweet White Onions, roughly sliced (about 4 cups)
ingredients.5: 1 jar TJ's Spanish Manzanilla Olives with Pemento Paste
ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons Baker Joseph's All Purpose White Flour
ingredients.13: 1/2 bag TJ's Jasmine White Rice, cooked

parsed_ing.0: Six Piece Organic Chicken Family Pack
parsed_ing.5: Spanish Manzanilla Olives with Pemento Paste
parsed_ing.6: Baker Joseph's All Purpose White Flour

steps.0: Rinse and thoroughly pat dry the chicken parts. Sprinkle them liberally with salt and fresh ground pepper. In a large saute pan, over medium-high flame, combine butter and olive oil and heat until butter has melted. Brown the chicken in two separate batches. Remove chicken from the pan. Lower flame to medium and add sliced onion and ginger. Saute for 8 minutes, stirring frequently. Chop 20 olives and add to the onion and ginger mixture. Saute for 1 minute. Add flour, cumin, cayenne pepper and cinnamon and cook for another minute, stirring constantly. Add the chicken broth, lemon juice and dates, scraping the pan to loosen browned bits. Bring to a slow boil and return the browned chicken to the pan. Cover and reduce heat to a simmer. Continue cooking for another 45 minutes and serve over prepared rice.

361.title: Fancy Figgy Glazed Chicken
361.description: Pair this fancy chicken with a creamy Chardonnay and lightly dressed mixed greens.

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Whole Organic Chicken
ingredients.2: 1/2 cup TJ's Whole Grain Dijon Mustard

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350°F. In a small mixing bowl, combine fig butter, mustard, and vinaigrette; set aside.
steps.1: Remove chicken from packaging and pat dry with paper towels. Place chicken in a baking dish and cover with 2/3 of the glaze mixture. Turn chicken breast-side down and roast for 30 minutes. Remove from the oven, turn chicken breast-side up and spread the remaining glaze mixture on the chicken.
steps.2: Continue roasting about 1.5 hours, basting every 20 minutes, until internal temperature registers 165°F. Allow chicken to sit for 15 minutes before carving.

ingredients.0: 1 lb bag of TJ's Fresh Pizza Dough at room temperature
ingredients.1: 1 jar TJ's Three Cheese Pomodoro Pasta Sauce
ingredients.2: 1 can TJ's Artichoke Hearts in Water, drained and quartered

parsed_ing.0: Fresh Pizza Dough at room temperature

steps.0: Preheat oven to 450°F. Roll pizza dough onto a pizza stone or baking sheet. Evenly distribute 1 1/2 - 2 cups tomato sauce out to the edges of the pizza dough. Top with artichoke hearts. Pinch off small pieces of goat cheese and scatter them around the pizza. Top with olives. Sprinkle pizza liberally with olive oil, if desired.
steps.1: Place pizza on center rack of oven. Bake 20 minutes, or until edges are nicely browned and cheese is bubbling. Let cool slightly before slicing and serving.

ingredients.0: 1 bag TJ's Broccoli Slaw
ingredients.3: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.4: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste, for seasoning
ingredients.5: 1 package (1 lb.) TJ's Frozen Cod Pieces, or TJ's Alaskan Cod Fillet, thawed & drained of excess liquid

steps.0: In a medium bowl, combine broccoli slaw with cilantro dressing and allow flavors to meld (20 minutes to overnight). Liberally season 1 cup of white flour with salt and pepper and dredge the cod in it, shaking off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat 2-3 tablespoons oil and fry fish until golden and flaky. Remove fish from pan and put aside. Wipe skillet clean with a paper towel. Heat the pan again with about 1 tablespoon of oil and heat 2 tortillas at a time, 20 seconds on each side. While tortillas are still warm, spread 1-2 tablespoons of guacamole and place 2-3 pieces of fish along one half. Using tongs, cover fish with broccoli slaw (shaking off excess liquid) and fold tortilla over. Optional Topping Suggestions: a squeeze of fresh lime, chopped fresh cilantro, a few dashes of your favorite hot sauce...

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Frozen Gourmet Pie Crusts, defrosted according to package directions
ingredients.2: 4 tablespoons TJ's Garlic Infused Olive Oil
ingredients.4: 1 cup TJ's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes, sliced
ingredients.5: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste
ingredients.6: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Pepper, or to taste
ingredients.7: 1/2-1 cup TJ's Uncured Bavarian Bratwurst (or Frozen Falafel), cut into small pieces
ingredients.8: 1/2-1 cup TJ's Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese

steps.0: Preheat oven to 350º F. In a large frying pan, heat garlic oil and add kale; add water, cover and steam, stirring occasionally for about 10-15 minutes. Add the tomatoes to the pan and continue to cook for a few more minutes (add a little more oil, if desired); season with salt and pepper. While the kale is cooking, split each pie crust in half and roll into 4 rounds of dough. Scoop kale mixture into the center of each dough round and top with desired amount of sausage (or falafel) and cheese.  Fold dough up and pinch around; kale mixture will stick out of the top. Top with more cheese, if desired. Brush dough with milk. Place in oven and bake for about 30-40 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's BBQ Pulled Pork, heated according to package instructions
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Taco Shells, heated according to package instructions
ingredients.4: 1.5 cups TJ's Mexican Blend Shredded Cheese

steps.0: Heat beans, if desired.  Layer pork, black beans, sour cream, cheese and green onions into taco shells. Serve!

366.title: Potsticker Soup's On!
366.description: Gyoza are great fried up in a skillet and dipped in TJ's Soyaki, but do you know what else they're great in? Soup! Just toss your favorite Trader Joe's Gyoza (we've got Chicken, Pork, Shrimp, and Vegetable to choose from) in some broth, add some spinach, sesame oil, and soy sauce, and-bam!-Potsticker Soup's On!

ingredients.0: TJ's 100% Greek Kalamata Olive Oil
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Gyoza (Pork, Chicken, Shrimp or Vegetable)
ingredients.3: 2 packages TJ's Low Sodium Chicken Broth
ingredients.8: 1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste

steps.0: Coat the bottom of a large frying pan with oil (about 2-3 tablespoons) and lightly fry the gyoza over medium-high heat until they get some nice browning on both sides (about 10 minutes). Remove from heat and set aside.
steps.1: Meanwhile, in a large soup pot (about 6 qt.), pour a couple tablespoons of oil and add the mirepoix. Saute the vegetables in the pot until the onions start to appear translucent. Add the broth to the pot and bring to a slow simmer. When the soup gets some energy, toss in the spinach and add the soy sauce and sesame oil.
steps.2: When the soup is officially simmering, add the potstickers. Serve it up in bowls and garnish with cilantro. (Make sure you have extra spoons on hand... never underestimate the charisma of Trader Joe's Potsticker Soup's On!)

ingredients.0: 1 TJ's Gourmet Pie Crusts, thawed and placed in 9-inch pie dish
ingredients.3: 1 package TJ's Frozen Chopped Spinach, defrosted and drained
ingredients.6: 1/2 a stick TJ's Unsalted Butter, cut into chunks

steps.0: Preheat oven to 375º F. In a large bowl, mix by hand the cottage cheese, cheddar, spinach, eggs, flour and butter. Pour mixture into the pie crust. Bake at 375º for 45 minutes. Let sit 15 minutes and serve.
steps.1: Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2011 HiiP Recipe Showdown Winner - Melinda Torres.

ingredients.0: 1 package TJ's Asian Stir Fry Veggies
ingredients.1: 1 package TJ's Firm Tofu, pressed and cubed
ingredients.2: 1 teaspoon TJ's Organic Toasted Sesame Oil

steps.0: Mix sesame oil, orange juice, soy sauce, honey and ginger. Add tofu and let marinate for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook stir fry veggies according to package directions. Add tofu to stir fry and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Add sauce to stir fry and heat through. Serve over rice noodles (or rice), if desired.

ingredients.0: 1 jar TJ's Thai Red Curry Sauce
ingredients.3: 1 cup TJ's Honey Sesame Cashews, chopped

steps.0: Marinate drumsticks in curry sauce 20 minutes to overnight. About 15 minutes before you're ready to cook, remove drumsticks from refrigerator and preheat oven to 375°F.
steps.1: Arrange drumsticks on a large, lightly greased baking sheet. Lightly spray drumsticks with canola oil.
